GK16andhvc3u:1_0: tṛtīya uddyotaḥ - - - evaṃ vyaṅgyamukhenaiva dhvaneḥ pradarśite saprabhede svarūpe
GK16andhvc3u:1_1: punarvyañjakamukhenaitatprakāśyate--- locanam tṛtīya uddyotaḥ smarāmi smarasaṃhāralīlāpāṭavaśālinaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:10_0: vivakṣitānyaparo vācya iti vyaṅgyārthapravaṇa evocyate ityevaṃ mūlabhedayoreva yathāsvamavāntarabhedasahitayorvyañjakarūpo
GK16andhvc3u:10_1: bālapriyā atha tṛtīyodyotaṭippaṇī prārabhyate athāhaṃ prauḍhamudyotaṃ tṛtīyañca yathāmati /
GK16andhvc3u:15: śambhoḥ dehārdhaṃ prasahya harantīmityanena parameśvaryāḥ tathāvidhāt parameśvarādapyatiśayitaṃ pāṭavaṃ dyotyate /
GK16andhvc3u:18: tasya saṅgāta dvitīyoyotena saha prasaṅgarūpāṃ saṅgatimityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:49: avivakṣitavācyasyātyantatiraskṛtavācye prabhede padaprakāśatā yathā maharṣervyāsasya---'saptaitāḥ samidhaḥ śriyaḥ',
GK16andhvc3u:50: yathā vā kālidāsasya---'kaḥ sannaddhe virahavidhurāṃ tvayyupekṣeta jāyām',
GK16andhvc3u:51: yathā vā--'kimiva hi madhurāṇāṃ maṇḍanaṃ nākṛtīnām',
GK16andhvc3u:52: eteṣūdāharaṇeṣu 'samidha' iti sannaddha' iti 'madhurāṇā'miti ca padāni vyañjakatvābhiprāyeṇaiva kṛtāni /
GK16andhvc3u:55: kiṃ ca yadyapyartho vyañjakastathāpi vyaṅgyatāyogyo 'pyasau bhavatīti,
GK16andhvc3u:56: śabdastu na kadācidyvaṅgyaḥ api tu vyañjaka eveti /
GK16andhvc3u:58: na ca vācyasyāvivakṣitādirūpeṇa yo bhedastatra sarvathaiva na na prakāśitaḥ kintu prakāśito 'pyadhunā punaḥ śuddhavyañjakamukhena /
GK16andhvc3u:59: tathāhi vyaṅgyamukhaprekṣitayā vinā padaṃ vākyaṃ varṇāḥ padabhāgaḥ saṅghaṭanā mahāvākyamiti svarūpata eva v.yañjakānāṃ bhedaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:60: na caiṣāmarthavatkadācidapi vyaṅgyatā sambhavatīti vyañjakaikaniyataṃ svarūpaṃ yattanmukhena bhedaḥ prakāśyata iti tātparyam /
GK16andhvc3u:62: sa evaṃ praṣṭavyaḥ---etattāvatrribhedatvaṃ na kārikākāreṇa kṛtam /
GK16andhvc3u:64: na cedānīṃ vṛttikārobhedaprakaṭanaṃ karoti bālapriyā pradarśita ityukterabhiprāyāntarañcāstītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:73: nanvevaṃ punarvyañjakamukhenetyatra punaśaśbdo 'nupapanna ityatastātparyaṃ vivṛṇoti---na cetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:77: 'vyañjakamukhatvam' iti pāṭhe vācyasyetyādeḥ vācyasambandhiyadavivakṣitādirūpaṃ avivakṣitatvādikantena hetunā yo bhedaḥ dhvaneravāntarabhedaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:87: locanam tataścedaṃ kṛtamidaṃ kriyata iti kartṛbhede kā saṅgatiḥ?
GK16andhvc3u:89: avivakṣitavācyādīnāmapi prakārāṇāṃ darśitatvādityalaṃ nijapūjyajanasagotraiḥ sākaṃ vivādena /
GK16andhvc3u:91: tenāvivakṣitavācyo dviprabhedo 'pi pratyekaṃ padavākyaprakāśa iti dvidhā /
GK16andhvc3u:92: tadanyasya vivakṣitābhidheyasya sambandhī yo bhedaḥ kramadyotyo nāma svabhedasahitaḥ so 'pi pratyekaṃ dvidhaiva /
GK16andhvc3u:93: anuraṇanena rūpaṃ rūpaṇasādṛśyaṃ yasya tādṛgvyaṅgyaṃ yattasyetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:95: atha ca rāmāyaṇamahābhārata prabhṛtini lakṣye dṛśyata iti /
GK16andhvc3u:96: dhṛtiḥ kṣamā dayā śaucaṃ kāruṇyaṃ vāganiṣṭhurā /
GK16andhvc3u:100: samicchabdena ca vyaṅgyo 'rtho 'nanyāpekṣalakṣmyuddīpanakṣamatvaṃ saptānāṃ vakrabhipretaṃ dhvanitam /
GK16andhvc3u:103: atra ca vācyasyātyantatiraskāraḥ pūrvoktamanusṛtya bālapriyā svarūpamiti /
GK16andhvc3u:106: ityasya kartṛbhede sati saṅgatatvaṃ na sambhavatītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:107: 'vyaṅgyamukhena pradarśite punarvyañjakamukhenaitatprakāśyata' ityanena pradarśanaprakāśanayorekakartṛkatvaṃ svarasataḥ pratīyate,
GK16andhvc3u:127: 'śabdena ce'tyanantaraṃ tasyaivārthāntarasaṅkramitavācye yathā---'rāmeṇa priyajīvitena tu kṛtaṃ locanam yojanīyaḥ kiṃ punaruktena /
GK16andhvc3u:129: tathaiva madhuraśabdena sarvaviṣayarañjakatvatarpakatvādikaṃ lakṣayatā sātiśayāmilāṣaviṣayatvaṃ nātrāścaryamiti vakrabhipretaṃ dhvanyate /
GK16andhvc3u:132: 'pratyākhyānaruṣaḥ kṛtaṃ samucitaṃ krūreṇa te rakṣasā soḍhaṃ tacca tathā tvayā kulajano dhatte yathoccaiḥ śiraḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:133: vyartha samprati bibhratā dhanuridaṃ tvadyvāpadaḥ sākṣiṇā' iti /
GK16andhvc3u:134: rakṣaḥsvabhāvādeva yaḥ krūro 'natilaṅghyaśāsanatvadurmadatayā ca prasahya nirākriyamāṇaḥ kodhāndhaḥ tasyaitattāvatsvacittavṛttisamucitamanuṣṭhānaṃ yanmūrdhakartanaṃ nāma,
GK16andhvc3u:135: mānyo 'pi bālapriyā vyaṅgyo 'rtha iti pāṭho dṛśyate tatsatve dhvanitamityasya bodhitamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:151: anatilaṅdhyaṃ śāsanaṃ yasya tatvena yā durmadatā ahamanatilaṅdhyaśāsana iti durabhimānaḥ tayeti krodhāndhatve hetuḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:157: taiti yathā tādṛgapi tayā na gaṇitastasyāstavetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:159: yathā yena prakāreṇa kulajana iti yaḥ kaścitpāmaraprāyo 'pi kulavadhūśabdavācyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:160: uccaiḥ śiro dhattai evaṃvidhāḥ kila vayaṃ kulavadhvo bhavāma iti /
GK16andhvc3u:161: atha ca śilaḥkartanāvasare tvayā śīghraṃ kṛtyatāmiti tathā soḍhaṃ tathoccaiḥ śiro dhṛtaṃ yathānyo 'pi kulastrījana uccaiḥ śiro dhatte netyapravṛttatayā /
GK16andhvc3u:162: evaṃ rāvaṇasya tava ca samucitakāritvaṃ nirvyūḍham /
GK16andhvc3u:173: priyaśabdasya pravṛttinimittaṃ yatpremanāma tadapyanaucityakalaṅkitamiti bālapriyā rāvaṇena hi śrīrāmasya purato māyāsītāśiraśchedaḥ kṛtaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:189: uccaiśiśaro dhatta iti prārthanāpratyākhyānena krodhāndhe kasmiṃścit kāmini śiraḥkartanāyodyukte sati śira unnataṃ karotītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:207: emea jaṇo tissā deu kavolopamāi sasibimbam /
GK16andhvc3u:208: paramatthaviāre uṇa cando cando via varāo //
GK16andhvc3u:210: avivakṣitavācyasyātyantatiraskṛtavācye prabhede vākyaprakāśatā yathā---- yā niśā sarvabhūtānāṃ tasyāṃ jāgarti saṃyamī /
GK16andhvc3u:211: yasyāṃ jāgrati bhūtāni sā niśā paśyato muneḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:219_1: pratyuta tadadhikavastukartavyaṃ tato dūranikṛṣṭaṃ śaśibimbaṃ kalaṅkavyājajihmīkṛtam /
GK16andhvc3u:221: tathāpi yadi parīkṣakāḥ parīkṣante tadvarākaḥ kṛpaikabhājanaṃ yaścandra iti prasiddhaḥ sa candra eva kṣayitvavilāsaśūnyatvamalinatvadharmāntarasaṃkrānto yo 'rthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:224: evaṃ prathamabhedasya dvāvapi prakārau padaprakāśakatvenodāhṛtya vākyaprakāśakatvenodāharati---yā niśeti /
GK16andhvc3u:226: tena hyuktena na kaścidupadeśyaṃ pratyupadeśaḥ siddhyati /
GK16andhvc3u:238: kalaṅkavyājo yaḥ śaśaḥ tena jihmīkṛtaṃ malinīkṛtam /
GK16andhvc3u:240: dvitīyacandrapadasya candrapadavācyatvena guṇaśūnyatvena vā rūpeṇa lakṣaṇātra bodhyā /
GK16andhvc3u:250: anena hi vākyena niśārtho na ca jāgaraṇārthaḥ kaścidvivakṣitaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:251: kiṃ tarhi? tattvajñānāvahitatvamatattvaparāṅmukhatvaṃ ca muneḥ pratipādyata iti tiraskṛtavācyasyāsya vyañjakatvam /
GK16andhvc3u:252: tasyaivārthāntarasaṅkramitavācyasya vākyaprakāśatā yathā--- visamaio kāṇa vi kāṇa vi vālei abhiaṇimmāo /
GK16andhvc3u:253: kāṇa vi visāmiamao kāṇa vi avisāmao kālo //
GK16andhvc3u:256: iti chāyā ) locanam niśāyāṃ jāgaratavyamanyatra rātrivadāsitavyamiti kimanenoktena /
GK16andhvc3u:257: tasmādbādhitasvārthametadvākyaṃ saṃyamino lokottaratālakṣaṇena nimittena tatvadṛṣṭāvavadhānaṃ mithyādṛṣṭo ca parāṅmukhatvaṃ dhvanati /
GK16andhvc3u:258: sarvaśabdārthasya cāpekṣikatayāpyupapadyamānateti na sarvaśabdārtānyathānupapatyāyāmartha ākṣipto mantavyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:259: sarvoṣāṃ brahmādisthāvarāntānāṃ caturdaśānāmapi bhūtānāṃ yā niśā vyāmohajananītattvadṛṣṭiḥ tasyāṃ saṃyamī jāgarti kathaṃ prāpyeteti /
GK16andhvc3u:273: nanvatra nidrākālarūpaniśāpadārthe sarvabhūtasambandhānvaye sarvapadārthaghaṭakatayā saṃyamino 'pi tadanvayaḥ prāptaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:274: sa ca jāgartītyetadarthānvayino 'nupapannastasmādanenoktavyaṅgyasyāviṣkṛtatvānna dhvanitvamiti śaṅkāṃ pariharati---sarvaśabdārthasyetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:288: locanam na tu viṣayavarjanamātrādeva saṃyamīti yāvat /
GK16andhvc3u:289: yadi vā sarvabhūtaniśāyāṃ mohinyāṃ jāgarti kathamiyaṃ heyeti /
GK16andhvc3u:290: yasyāṃ tu mithyādṛṣṭau sarvāṇi bhūtāni jāgrati atiśayena suprabuddharūpāṇi sā tasya rātriraprabodhaviṣayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:294: anyastu na paśyata na ca manyata iti /
GK16andhvc3u:296: evaṃ ca paśyata ityapi munerityapi ca na svārthamātravibhrāntam /
GK16andhvc3u:298: yattacchabdayośca na svatantrārthateti sarva evāyamākhyātasahāyaḥ padasamūho vyaṅgyaparaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:306: keṣāmapi mūḍhaprāyāṇāṃ dhārāprāptayogabhūmikārūḍhānāṃ vā aviṣābhṛtamayaḥ kālo 'tikrāmatīti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:311: na ca te sādhane sarvathā bālapriyā iyaṃ kathaṃ prāpyeteti matyā tatprāptyupāyamanutiṣṭhatītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:326: atra paśyatītyetaccaritārthabahiṣkaraṇavṛttitvena manyata ityetaccaritārthāntaḥkaraṇavṛttitvena ca rūpeṇa lakṣakamityāha---tasyaivetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:348: tanmātraviśrāntena atra hi vākye viṣāmṛtaśabdābhyāṃ duḥkhasukharūpasaṅkramitavācyābhyāṃ vyavahāra ityarthāntarasaṅkramitavācyasyā vyañjakatvam /
GK16andhvc3u:349: vivakṣitābhidheyasyānuraṇanarūpavyaṅgyasya śabdaśaktyudbhave prabhede padaprakāśatā yathā--- locanam na vivakṣite /
GK16andhvc3u:357: evaṃ kārikāprathamārdhalakṣitāṃścaturaḥ prakārānudāhṛtya dvitīyakārikārdhasvīkṛtān ṣaḍanyān prakārān krameṇodāharati--vivakṣitābhidheyasyetyādinā /
GK16andhvc3u:359: dhanairiti bahuvacanaṃ yo yenārthī tasya teneti sūcanārtham /
GK16andhvc3u:370: na ca na vivakṣite vivakṣite eva /
GK16andhvc3u:374: 'viṣaṃnimbamamṛtaṃ kapittham' ityādau nirūḍhalakṣaṇayā duḥkhasādhanaṃ nimbaṃ sukhasādhanaṃ kapitthamityevārthe vivakṣitaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:375_0: prakṛte tu kālaḥ keṣāñcidduḥkhamayaḥ keṣāñcitsukhamayaścātikrāmatītyarthasya vivakṣitatayā
GK16andhvc3u:375_1: viṣapadasya kiñcitsādhanakaduḥkhe amṛtapadasya kiñcitsādhanakasukhe ca lakṣaṇā duḥkhasukhayorviśeṣo vyaṅgyaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:378: ajñātaviśeṣadharmāvacchinnavācakasya keṣāmapīti śabdasya ca duṣkṛtināmityādyuktārthaviśeṣe saṅkrāntirityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:387: dhanairarthijanasya vāñchāṃ prātuṃ daivena na sṛṣṭo yadi nāmetyabhyupagame /
GK16andhvc3u:389: jaḍo 'haṃ pathi prasannāmbudharastaṭākaḥ athavā kūpaḥ kiṃ kasmāt /
GK16andhvc3u:398: 'asmi na sṛṣṭa' prātuṃ dhanairarthijanasya vāñchāṃ daivena sṛṣṭo yadi nāma nāsmi /
GK16andhvc3u:399: pathi prasannāmbudharastaḍāgaḥ kūpo 'thavā kiṃ na jaḍaḥ kṛto 'ham // 1 //
GK16andhvc3u:400: atra hi jaḍa iti padaṃ nirviṇṇena vakrātmasamānādhikaraṇatayā prayuktamanuraṇanarūpatayā kūpasamānādhikaraṇatāṃ svaśaktyā pratipadyate /
GK16andhvc3u:401: tasyaiva vākyaprakāśatā yatā harṣacarite siṃhanādavākyeṣu--'vṛtte 'sminmahāpralaye dharaṇīdhāraṇāyādhunā tvaṃ śeṣaḥ' /
GK16andhvc3u:404: anyo hi tāvadavaśyaṃ kaścitsṛṣṭo na tvahamiti nirvedaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:410: atha ca kūpo jaḍo 'rthitā kasya kīdṛśītyasambhavadviveka iti /
GK16andhvc3u:416: mahasya utsavasya āsamantātpralayo yatra tādṛśi śokakāraṇabhūte vṛtte dharaṇyā rājyadhurāyā dhāraṇāyāśvāsanāya tvaṃ śeṣaḥ śiṣyamāṇaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:417: itīyatā pūrṇe vākyārthe kalpāvasāne bhūpīṭhabhārodvahanakṣam eko bālapriyā ityanena gamyamarthamāha--anyo hītyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:430: vṛttau 'kūpasamānādhikaraṇatāṃ pratipadyata' ityanena jaḍapadasya kūpapadasāmānādhikaraṇyamevoktanna tu taṭākapadasāmānādhikaraṇyamapi,
GK16andhvc3u:446: atra hyasamarpitamapi kusumaśareṇa madhumāsalakṣmyā mukhaṃ gṛhītamityasamarpitamapītyetadavasthābhidhāyipadamarthaśaktyā kusumaśarasya balātkāraṃ prakāśayati /
GK16andhvc3u:447: atraiva prabhede vākyaprakāśatā yathodāhṛtaṃ prāk 'sajjehi surahimāso' ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:448: atra sajjayati surabhimāso na tāvadarpayatyanaṅgāya śarānityayaṃ vākyārthaḥ kaviprauḍhoktimātraniṣpannaśarīro manmathonmāthakadanāvasthāṃ vasantasamayasya sūcayati /
GK16andhvc3u:451: mahārghaṇa utsavaprasareṇa manoharasurasya manmathadevasya āmodaścamatkāro yatra tat /
GK16andhvc3u:460: 'prauḍhoktimātraniṣpannaśarīraḥ sambhavī svataḥ' iti prācyakārikāyā iyataivodāhṛtatvaṃ bhavedityabhiprāyeṇa /
GK16andhvc3u:461: tatra padaprakāśatā yathā--- satyaṃ manoramāḥ kāmāḥ satyaṃ ramyā vibhūtayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:465: śeṣa' ityasya nāgarāja iti ca vivaraṇam /
GK16andhvc3u:478: vāṇiaa hattidantā kutto ahyāṇa bādhakittī a /
GK16andhvc3u:480: atra lulitālakamukhītyetatpadaṃ vyādhavadhvāḥ svataḥsambhāvitaśarīrārthaśaktyā suratakrīḍāsaktiṃ sūcayaṃstadīyasya bhartuḥ satatasambhogakṣāmatāṃ prakāśayati /
GK16andhvc3u:481: locanam ityatra kavinā yo virāgī vaktā nibaddhastatprauḍhoktyā jīvitaśabdo 'rthaśaktimūlatayedaṃ dhvanayati---sarva evāmī kāmā vibhūtayaśca svajīvitamātropayoginaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:483: tadeva ca jīvitaṃ prāṇadhāraṇarūpatvātprāṇavṛtteśca cāñcalyādanāsthāpadamiti viṣayeṣu varākeṣu kiṃ doṣoddhoṣaṇadaurjanyena nijameva jīvitamupālabhyam,
GK16andhvc3u:484: tadapi ca nisargacañcalamiti na sāparādhamityetāvatā gāḍhaṃ vairāgyamiti /
GK16andhvc3u:490: atra luliteti savarūpamātreṇa viśeṣaṇamavaliptatayā cahastidantādyapāharaṇaṃ sambhāvyamiti vākyārthasya tāvatyeva na kācidanupapattiḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:491: bālapriyā kāmāḥ kāmyamānā vanitādayaḥ tadabhāve jīvitābhāve /
GK16andhvc3u:504: lulitāḥ itastato vikīrṇā alakā yatra tathāvidhaṃ mukhaṃ yasyāssā /
GK16andhvc3u:509: svatassambhāvitaṃ loke 'pyaucityātsambhāvyamānaṃ śarīraṃ ysaya tathāvidhasyārthasya śaktyā sāmarthyenetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:523: anenāpi vākyena vyādhavadhvā śikhipicchakarṇapūrāyā navapariṇītāyāḥ kasyāścitsaubhāgyātiśayaḥ prakāśyate /
GK16andhvc3u:524: tatsambhogaikaratho mayūramātramāraṇasamarthaḥ patirjātaṃ ityarthaprakāśanāt tadanyāsāṃ cirapariṇītānāṃ muktāphalaracitaprasādhanānāṃ daurbhāgyātiśayaḥ khyāpyate /
GK16andhvc3u:525: tatsambhogakāle sa eva vyādhaḥ karivaravadhavyāpārasamartha āsīdityarthaprakāśanāt /
GK16andhvc3u:526: nanu dhvaniḥ kāvyaviśeṣa ityuktaṃ katkathaṃ tasya padaprakāśatā /
GK16andhvc3u:537: avācakatvāditi yaduktaṃ so 'yamaprayojako heturiti chalena tāvaddarśayati--syādeṣa doṣa iti /
GK16andhvc3u:538: evaṃ chalena parihṛtya bālapriyā hastidantāderapāharaṇamanāharaṇaṃ dantādyanāharaṇamiti ca pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:543: 'avavakṣitavācyasye'tyādikārikāyāṃ samudāyasyaiva dhvanipadārthavādatra pakṣa eva codyasyopapatteśceti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:561: smṛtāste tvākāṅgakṣādasahakṛtā vākyārthamanubhāvayantīti mate padasmāritatvarūpaṃ padaprakāśatvaṃ tattadartha eva vartate /
GK16andhvc3u:562: tatra ca kāvyaviśeṣatvarūpaṃ dhvanitvannāstītyato dhvaneḥ na padaprakāśatvaṃ,
GK16andhvc3u:564: anena granthena padanna dhvaniprakāśakamavācakatvādityarthaḥ phalita ityabhipretya 'syādeṣadoṣa' ityādisamādhānagranthamavatārayati locane---avācakatvādityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:568_0: kiṃ ca kāvyānāṃ śarīrāṇāmiva saṃsthānavaśeṣāvacchinnasamudāyasādhyāpi cārutvapratītiranvayavyatirekābhyāṃ
GK16andhvc3u:568_1: bhāgeṣu kalpyata iti padānāmapi vyañjakatvamukhena vyavasthito dhvanivyavahāro na virodhi /
GK16andhvc3u:570: yadi paro brūyāt---na mayā avācakatvaṃ dhvanyabhāve hetūkṛtaṃ kiṃ tūktaṃ kāvyaṃ dhvaniḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:571: kāvyaṃ cānākāṅkṣapratipattikāri vākyaṃ na padamiti tatrāha--satyamevaṃ,
GK16andhvc3u:574: tathā ca padaprakāśo dhvaniriti prakāśapadenoktam. nanu padasya tatra tathāvithaṃ sāmarthyamiti kuto 'khaṇḍa eva pratītikrama ityāśaṅkyāha--kāvyānāmiti /
GK16andhvc3u:576: nanu bhāgeṣu padarūpeṣu kathaṃ sā cārutvapratītirāropayituṃ śakyā?
GK16andhvc3u:578: tataḥ kim? manohārivyaṅgyārthasmārakatvāddhi cārutvapratītinibandhanatvaṃ kena bālapriyā asādhaka ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:583: nanu vastuvṛttena parihāraḥ kimartha ityataḥ kāvyānāmityādigranthamavatārayiṣyan bhūmikāmāha--yadi para ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:588: kāvyaviśeṣo dhvaniḥ kāvyañca tathāvidhaṃ vākyamiti vākyameva dhvaniḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:590: tathāca pade dhvanyabhāve avākyatvaṃ heturiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:608: saṃsthānaviśeṣaiḥ śabdasandarbhaviśeṣaiḥ mukhādyavayavasaṃyogaviśeṣaiśca avacchinno viśiṣṭo yassamudāyastatsādhyāpītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:626: vākye saṅghaṭanāyāṃ ca sa prabandhe 'pi dīpyate // DhvK_3.2 //
GK16andhvc3u:629: vākye saṅghaṭanāyāṃ ca sa prabandhe 'pi dīpyate // 2 //
GK16andhvc3u:631: yathā śrutiduṣṭānāṃ pelavādipadānāmasabhyapelādyarthaṃ prati na vācakatvam /
GK16andhvc3u:634: tacca śrutiduṣṭatvamanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ bhāgeṣu vyavasthāpyate tathā prakṛte 'pīti tadāha--aniṣṭasyeti /
GK16andhvc3u:638: evaṃ dṛṣṭāntamabhidhāya pādatrayeṇa turyeṇa dārṣṭāntikārtha uktaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:640: yata eva miṣṭasmṛtiścārutvamāvaiti tena hetunā sarveṣu prakāreṣu nirūpitasya padamātrāvabhāsino 'pi padaprakāśasyāpi dhvane ramyatāsti smārakatve 'pi padānāmiti samanvayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:664: virodhinaḥ syuḥ śṛṅgāre te na varṇā rasa-cyutaḥ // DhvK_3.3 //
GK16andhvc3u:665: ta eva tu niveśyante bībhatsādau rase yadā /
GK16andhvc3u:666: tadā taṃ dīpayanty eva te na varṇā rasa-cyutaḥ // DhvK_3.4 //
GK16andhvc3u:669: virodhinaḥ syuḥ śṛṅgāre tena varṇā rasacyutaḥ // 3 //
GK16andhvc3u:670: ta eva tu niveśyante bībhatsādau rase yadā /
GK16andhvc3u:671: tadā taṃ dīpayantyeva tena varṇā rasacyutaḥ // 4 //
GK16andhvc3u:682: yataste varṇā bhūyasā prayujyamānā na rasāṃścyotanti sravanti /
GK16andhvc3u:683: yadi vā tena śṛṅgāravirodhitvena hetunāvarṇāḥ śaṣādayo rasācchṛṅgārāccyavante taṃ na vyañjayantīti vyatireka uktaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:705: tallakṣaṇamuktaṃ bhaṭṭedbhaṭena---“śaṣābhyāṃ rephasaṃyogaiḥ ṭavargeṇa ca yojitā /
GK16andhvc3u:707: rasaścyuta iti pāṭhe te na iti padadvayamityāśayena vyācaṣṭe---te varṇā ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:711: rasacyuta iti pāṭhe tu tenetyekaṃ padamityāha--yadi vetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:713: rasāccyavanta ityasya taṃ na vyañjayantīti ca /
GK16andhvc3u:715: śaṣāvityādiślokena śakārādivarṇasatve śṛṅgārāvyaktyabhāvarūpo vyatarekaḥ pradarśita ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:718: 'ta eve'tyādikārikāyāścaturthapāde rasaścyuta iti pade cālakṣyakramavyaṅgyasya dyotanaṃ yathā--- utkampinī bhayaparaskhalitāṃśukāntā te locane pratidiśaṃ vidhure kṣipantī /
GK16andhvc3u:719: krūreṇa dāruṇatayā sahasaiva dagdhā dhūmāndhitena dahanena na vīkṣitāsi //
GK16andhvc3u:722: asminviṣaye śṛṅgāralakṣaṇe śaṣādiprayogaḥ sukavitvamabhivāñchatā na kartavya ityevaṃphalatvādupadeśasya kārakākāreṇa pūrvaṃ vyatireka uktaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:723: na ca sarvathā na kartavyo 'pi tu bībhatsādau kartavya eveti paścādanvayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:724: vṛttikāreṇa tvanvayapūrvako vyatireka iti śailīmanusartumanvayaḥ pūrvamupāttaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:727: tena varṇānāmapi śrutisamayopalakṣyamāṇārthānapekṣyapi śrotraikagrāhyo mṛduparuṣātmā bālapriyā pāṭhe tenetyekaṃ padaṃ,
GK16andhvc3u:728: rasacyuta iti pāṭhe tu te neti tadadvayamiti bodhyam /
GK16andhvc3u:730: ślokābhāyāmiti nirdeśe dvābhyāṃ ślokābhyāṃ pratapāditau yāvanvayavyatirekau tābhyāmityarthasya pratītyā yathāsaṅkhyamanvayasya prasaktirbhavatī,
GK16andhvc3u:731: ślokadvayeneti nirdeśe tu ślokātmakadvyavayavaghaṭitasamudāyena pratipāditau yāvanvayavyatirekau tābhyāmityarthasya pratītyā yathāsaṅkhyamanvayasya prasaktirbhavati,
GK16andhvc3u:732: ślekadvayeneti nirdeśe tu ślokātmakadvyavayavaghaṭitasamudāyena pratipāditau yāvanvayavyatirekau tābhyāmityarthasya pratītyāna tatprasaktiriti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:739: śrutiḥ śravaṇaṃ yeṣāntaiḥ śabdaiḥ samarpyamāṇā ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:745: atra hi te ityetatpadaṃ rasamayatvena sphuṭamevāvabhāsate sahṛdayānām /
GK16andhvc3u:746: padāvayavena dyotanaṃ yathā--- vriḍāyogānnatavadanayā sannadhāne gurūṇāṃ baddhotkampaṃ kucakalaśayormanyumantarnigṛhya /
GK16andhvc3u:748: ata eva ca sahakāratāmevābhidhātuṃ nimittasaptamī kṛtā varṇapadādiṣviti /
GK16andhvc3u:751: śrotraikagrāhyo 'pi ca svabhāvo rasaniṣyande vyāpriyata eva,
GK16andhvc3u:756: te vibhavādayo yadā viśiṣṭena kenāpi padenārpyamāmā rasacamatkāravidhāyino bhavanti tadā padasyaivāsau mahimā samarpyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:759_0: tatra ca śoko nāmeṣṭajanavināśaprabhava iti tasya janasya ye bhrūkṣepakaṭākṣaprabhṛtayaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:759_1: pūrvaṃ rativibhāvatāmavalambante sma ta evātyantavinaṣṭāḥ santa idānīṃ smṛtigocaratayā
GK16andhvc3u:792: tallocanagatatathāvidhaguṇagaṇaṃ buddhau kṛtvā rasāviṣṭena vaktrā te ityuktam,
GK16andhvc3u:793: sa evārthaḥ pratipattrāpi parāmṛśyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:795: yatra hyanuddiśyamānadharmāntarasāhityayogyadharmayogitvaṃ vastuno yacchabdenābhidhāya tadbuddhisthadharmāntarasāhityaṃ tacchabdena nirvācyate /
GK16andhvc3u:802: te iti sātiśayavibhramaikāyatanarūpe apa locane vidhure kāndiśīkatayā nirlakṣe kṣipantī kastrātā kvāsāvāryaputra iti tayorlocanayostādṛśīcāvastheti sutarāṃ śokoddīpanam /
GK16andhvc3u:805: kiṃ kurutāṃ tathāpi ca dhūmenāndhīkṛto draṣṭumasamartha iti na tu savivekasyedṛśānucitakāritvaṃ sambhāvyate,
GK16andhvc3u:806: iti smaryamāṇaṃ tadīyaṃ saundaryamidānīṃ sātiśayaśokāveśavibhāvatāṃ prāptamiti /
GK16andhvc3u:811: yatra yo vidvān sa pūjya ityādau /
GK16andhvc3u:813: tathāvidhaṃ yaddharmāntaraṃ pūjyatvādikaṃ tatsāhityasya yogyaḥ prayojako yo dharmo vidvattvādiḥ tadyogitvaṃ tatsambandha ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:816: tadbuddhisthañca yaddharmāntaraṃ viddhattvādakaṃ tasya sāhityaṃ sambandha ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:852: te iti tiṣṭhetyuktaṃ kimiva na tayā yatsamutsṛjya bāṣpaṃ mathyāsaktaścakitahariṇīhārinetratribhāgaḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:855: tatra śuddhasyodāharamaṃ yathā rāmābhyudaye---'kṛtakakupitaiḥ' ityādi locanam tribhāgaśabda iti /
GK16andhvc3u:856_0: gurujanamavadhīryāpi sā māṃ yatā tathāpi sābhilāṣamanyudainyagarvamantharaṃ vilokitavatītyevaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:859: varṇapadatadbhāgādiṣu satsvevālakṣyakramo vyaṅgyo nirbhāsamāno 'pi samastakāvyavyāpaka eva nirbhāsate,
GK16andhvc3u:862: vākyaṃ tu dhvaneralakṣyakramasya na nimittatāmātreṇa varṇādivadupakāri,
GK16andhvc3u:863: kiṃ tu samagravibhāvādapratipattivyāpṛtatvādrasādimayameva tannirbhāsata iti 'vākya' ityetatkārikāyāṃ bālapriyā padasyaivātra prādhānyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:864: vṛttau 'jhaṭiti kanake'tyādyudāharaṇāntaraṃ prakṣiptamata eva na vivṛtaṃ locane /
GK16andhvc3u:865: pravāsodyatamātmānaṃ gurujanasannidhāne dṛṣṭavatyāḥ prayāyā darśanaprakāraṃ kaścit syayaṃ parāmṛśati ;
GK16andhvc3u:868: kucakalaśayoḥ baddhaḥ kṛta utkampaḥ yena tam /
GK16andhvc3u:870: tvaṃ tiṣṭeti māṃ prati na uktaṃ kimiva, uktameva /
GK16andhvc3u:871: yadyataḥ tayā bāṣpaṃ samutsṛjya cakitahariṇova cakitahariṇīnetramiva hāri,
GK16andhvc3u:872: yadvā--cakitahariṇyā hāri yannetraṃ tasya tribhāgaḥ tṛtīyo bhāgaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:898: etaddhi vākyaṃ parasparānurāgaṃ paripoṣaprāptaṃ pradarśayatsarvata eva paraṃ rasatattvaṃ prakāśayati /
GK16andhvc3u:903: kṛtakakupitaibāṣpāmbhobhiḥ sadainyavilokitair- vanamapi gatā yasya prītyā dhṛtāpi tathāmbayā /
GK16andhvc3u:904: navajaladharaśyāmāḥ paśyandiśo bhavatīṃ vinā kaṭhinahṛdayo jīvatyeva priye sa tava priyaḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:905: atra tathā taistaiḥ prakārairmātrā dhṛtāpītyanurāgaparavaśatvena guruvacanollaṅghanamapi tvayā kṛtamiti /
GK16andhvc3u:906: priye priya iti parasparajīvitasarvasvābhimānātmako ratisthāyibhāva uktaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:914: tadapi likhitaprakhyairaṅgaiḥ parasparamunmukhā nayananalinīnālānītaṃ pibanti rasaṃ priyāḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:919: tadrūpo yo viṣayasya artho yasya tat /
GK16andhvc3u:940: gurupadenārthāntarañja atra hi rūpakeṇa yathoktavyañjakalakṣaṇānugatena prasādhito rasaḥ sutarāmabhivyajyate /
GK16andhvc3u:941: alakṣyakramavyaṅgyaḥ saṅghaṭanāyāṃ bhāsate dhvanirityuktaṃ tatra saṅghaṭanāsvarūpameva tāvannirūpyete---
GK16andhvc3u:950: smara eva navanadīpūraḥ prāvṛṣeṇyapravāhaḥ sarabhasameva pravṛddhatvāt tenoḍhāḥ parasparasāṃmukhyamabuddhipūrvameva nītāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:953: ata ca guravo 'laṅdhyāḥ setavastaiḥ vidhṛtāḥ pratihatecchāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:956: nanu nātra rūpakaṃ nirvayūḍhaṃ haṃsacakravākādirūpeṇa nāyakayugalasyārūpitatvāt /
GK16andhvc3u:978: parasparābhilāṣātmakānāṃ parasparābhilāṣaṃ prakāśayantīnāṃ dṛṣṭicchaṭānāṃ yo miśrīkārastasya yuktyā yojanayetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:991: guṇān āśritya tiṣṭhantī mādhuryādīn vyanakti sā /
GK16andhvc3u:995: rasān--- sā saṅghaṭanā rasādīn vyanakti guṇānāśritya tiṣṭhantīti /
GK16andhvc3u:996: atra ca vikalpyaṃ guṇānāṃ saṅghaṭanāyāścaikyaṃ vyatireko vā /
GK16andhvc3u:1000_1: saṅghaṭanā locanam kārikāyāṃ dvitīyārdhasyādyaṃ padam. 'rasāṃstanniyame heturaucityaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:1004: vikalpenedamarthajātaṃ kalpayituṃ vyākhyātuṃ śakyam kiṃ tadityāha--guṇānāmiti /
GK16andhvc3u:1005: trayaḥ pakṣā ye sambhāvyante te vyākhyātuṃ śakyāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1008: svabhāvasya kalpanayā pratapādanārthaṃ pradarśitabedasya svāśrayavācoyuktirdṛśyate śiśapāśrayaṃ vṛkṣatvamiti /
GK16andhvc3u:1011: dharmāśca dharmyāśritā iti bālapriyā kutroktamityata āha---kārikāyāmiti /
GK16andhvc3u:1022: vikalpyamityasya vikalpena kalpyamiti vigraha iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1046: yadā tu nānātvapakṣe gumāśrayasaṅghaṭanāpakṣaḥ tadā gumānāśritya tiṣṭhantī gumaparatantrasvabhāvā na tu guṇarūpaivetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1048: abhidhīyate---yadi gumāḥ saṅghaṭānā cetyekaṃ tattvaṃ saṅghaṭanāśrayā vā guṇāḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:1052: mādhuryaprasādau rasabhāvatadābhāsaviṣayāveveti viṣayaniyamo locanam prasiddho mārgaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1056: tena rājāśrayaḥ prakṛtivarga ityatra yathā rājāśrayaucityenāmātyādiprakṛtaya ityayamarthaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:1057: evaṃ guṇeṣu paratantrasvabhāvā tadāyattā tanmukhaprekṣiṇī saṅghaṭanetyayamartho labhyataiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1059: prathamapakṣe tādātmyena samānayogakṣematvāditaratra tu dharmatveneti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1103: tathā hi śṛṅgāre 'pi dīrghasamāsā dṛśyate raudrādiṣvasamāsā ceti /
GK16andhvc3u:1109: yathā--'yo yaḥ śastraṃ bibharti svabhujagurumatadaḥ' ityādau /
GK16andhvc3u:1112: nanu yadi saṅghaṭanā guṇānāṃ nāśrayastatkimālambanā ete parikalpyantām /
GK16andhvc3u:1124: śabdārthālambanatve hi tadalaṅkārebhyaḥ ko viśeṣa ityuktaṃ cirantanairiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1127: bālapriyā sa vighaṭata ityatra tatpadaṃ vyācaṣṭe--yo 'yamityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:1138: anavarataṃ yannayanajalalavanipatanaṃ tena parimuṣitā apahṛtā patralekhā yasmiṃstat /
GK16andhvc3u:1160: nanu yadi śabdāśrayā guṇāstatsaṅghaṭanārūpatvaṃ tadāśrayatvaṃ vā teṣāṃ prāptameva /
GK16andhvc3u:1161: na hyasaṅghaṭitāḥ śabdā arthaviśeṣapratipādyarasādyāśritānāṃ guṇānāmavācakatvādāśrayā bhavanti /
GK16andhvc3u:1167: api tu bhavatveṣāmavivekināmabhiprāyeṇāpi śabdadharmatvaṃ śauryādīnāmiva śarīradharmatvam /
GK16andhvc3u:1173: upacāreṇa yadi śabdeṣu guṇāstadedaṃ tātparyam--śṛṅgārādirasābhivyañjakavācyapratipādanasāmarthyameva śabdasya mādhuryam /
GK16andhvc3u:1176: api tu saṅghaṭitā eva bālapriyā aikyaprasaṅgāditi /
GK16andhvc3u:1180: saṃyogarūpakāryasya dvayorutpatyā svasmin yasya saṃyogo jāyate taṃ prati tasyāpekṣāstītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1187: ayaṃ sthitaḥ mama pakṣo neti yojanā /
GK16andhvc3u:1207: kimayaṃ madhye saṅghaṭanānupraveśa ityāśaṅkya sa eva pūrvapakṣavādyāha---na hīti /
GK16andhvc3u:1208_0: arthaviśeṣairna tu padāntaranirapekṣaśuddhapadavācyaiḥ sāmānyaiḥ pratipādyā vyaṅgyā
GK16andhvc3u:1212_0: varṇavyaṅgyo hi yāvadrasa uktastāvadavācakasyāpi padasya śravaṇamātrāvaseyena svasaubhāgyena
GK16andhvc3u:1212_1: varṇavadeva yadrasābhivyaktihetutvaṃ sphuṭameva lakṣyata iti tadeva mādhuryādīti kiṃ saṅghaṭanayā?
GK16andhvc3u:1213: tathā ca padavyaṅgyo yāvaddhvaniruktastāvacchuddhasyāpi padasya svārthasmārakatvenāpi rasābhivyaktiyogyārthavabhāsakatvameva mādhuryādīti tatrāpi kaḥ saṅghaṭanāyā upayogaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1218: viśiṣṭā yā śabdāntarasaṅghaṭanā tathaiva labhyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1253: abhyupagate vā vākyavyaṅgyatve rasādīnāṃ na niyatā kācitsaṅghaṭanā teṣāmāśrayatvaṃ pratipadyata ityaniyatasaṅghaṭanāḥ śabdā evaṃ guṇānāṃ vyaṅgyaviśeṣānugatā āśrayāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1256: na hyasamāsā saṅghaṭanā kadācidojasa āśrayatāṃ pratapadyate /
GK16andhvc3u:1258: yadi na prasiddhimātragrahadūṣitaṃ cetastadatrāpi na na brūmaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1260: yato raudrādīn hi prakāśayataḥ kāvyasya dīptiroja iti prākpratipādatam /
GK16andhvc3u:1261: taccaujo yadyasamāsāyāmapi saṅghaṭanāyāṃ syāttatko doṣo bhavet /
GK16andhvc3u:1262: na locanam nanu vākyavyaṅgye dhvanau tarhyavaśyamanupraveṣṭavyaṃ saṅghaṭanayā svasaundarya vācyasaundaryaṃ v,
GK16andhvc3u:1268_0: kiṃ tu mādhuryasya na niyatā saṅghaṭanā āśrayo vā svarūpaṃ vā tayā vinā varṇapadavyaṅgye

GK16andhvc3u:1950_1: pratipipādayiṣitarasabhāvādyapekṣayā ya ucato vibhāvo bhāvo 'nu bhāvaḥ sañjārī vā
GK16andhvc3u:1955: śṛṅgāravarṇanecchunā tādṛśī kathā saṃśrayaṇīyā yasyāmṛtumālyādervibhāvasya līlāderanubhāvasya bālapriyā śeṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1974: divyasya utsāhādayaḥ kevalamānuṣāśrayema kevalamānuṣasyotsāhādayaḥ kevaladivyāśrayeṇa vā upanibadhyamānā ityanvayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1983: ata eva ca bharate prakhyātavastuviṣayatvaṃ prakhyātodāttanāyakatvaṃ ca nāṭakasyāvaśyakartavyatayopanyastam /
GK16andhvc3u:1986: locanam etaduktaṃ bhavati---yatra vineyānāṃ pratītikhaṇḍanā na jāyate tādṛgvarṇanīyam /
GK16andhvc3u:1987: tatra kevalamānuṣasya ekapade saptārṇavalaṅghanamasambhāvyamānatayānṛtamiti hṛdaye sphuradupadeśyasya caturvargopāyasyāpyalīkatāṃ buddhau niveśayati /
GK16andhvc3u:1989: ata eva tasyāpi yadā prabhāvāntaramutprekṣyate tadā tādṛśameva /
GK16andhvc3u:2006: rājñāṃ prabhāvātiśayavarṇanaṃ yaddvayaṃ tadanucitaṃ na brūma iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2021: pūrvā purātanī yā prasiddhiparamparā tayā upacito yaḥ sampratyayo viśvāsaḥ tamupārūḍhamiti hetugarbham /
GK16andhvc3u:2029_1: yo nāṭakādi utpādyavastu sat kuryāttasya mahān pramādassyāditi yojanāmmanasi kṛtya
GK16andhvc3u:2031: muninā nāṭakādi nanu yadyutsāhādibhāvavarṇane kathañciddivyamānuṣyādyaucityaparīkṣā kriyate tatkriyatām,
GK16andhvc3u:2033: ratirhi bhāratavarṣecitenaiva vyavahārema divyānāmapi varṇanīyeti sthitiḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2037: yattu divyamaucityaṃ tattatrānupakārakameveti cet---na vayaṃ divyamaucityaṃ śṛṅgāraniṣayamanyatkiñcidbrūmaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2038: kiṃ tarhi? bhāratavarṣaviṣaye yathottamanāyakeṣu rājādiṣu śṛṅgāropanibandhastathā divyāśrayo 'pi śobhate /
GK16andhvc3u:2039: na ca rājādiṣu prasiddhiṣu prasiddhagrāmyaśṛṅgāropanibandhanaṃ prasiddhaṃ nāṭakādau,
GK16andhvc3u:2041: nāṭakāderamineyārthatvādabhinayasya ca sambhogaśṛṅgāraviṣayasyāsabhyatvāttatra parihāra iti cet- na;
GK16andhvc3u:2043: tasmādabhineyārthe 'nabhineyārthe vā kāvye yaduttamaprakṛte rājāderuttamaprakṛtibhirnāyikābhiḥ saha grāmyasambhogavarṇanaṃ tatpitroḥ sambhogavarṇanamiva sutarāmasabhyam /
GK16andhvc3u:2045: locanam nirūpitaṃ munineti na kartavyamiti tātparyam /
GK16andhvc3u:2048: bālapriyā utpādyavastu sat na nirūpitamiti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2057: vyāyogastu vidhijñaiḥ karyaḥ prakhyātanāyakaśarīra ityādivyāyogalakṣaṇañja nāṭyaśāstrādāvuktam /
GK16andhvc3u:2058: nāṭakādītyatra nāṭakamādiḥ yasyeti vyutpattyā nāṭakādipadenātadguṇasaṃvijñānabahuvrīhiṇā prakāraṇaṃ vivakṣitamato na yathāśrutārthānupapattiriti kaścidāha,
GK16andhvc3u:2060: na ca sambhogaśṛṅgārasya suratalakṣaṇa evaikaḥ prakāraḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:2065: yattvevaṃvidhe viṣaye mahākavīnāpyasamīkṣyakāritā lakṣye dṛśyate sa doṣa eva /
GK16andhvc3u:2066: sa tu śaktitiraskṛtatvātteṣāṃ na lakṣyata ityuktameva /
GK16andhvc3u:2071: tena muninirūpite nāṭikālakṣaṇe 'prakaraṇanāṭakayogādutpādyaṃ vastu nāyako nṛpatiḥ' ityatra yathāsaṃkhyena prakhyātodāttanṛpatināyaktvaṃ boddhavyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2072: kathaṃ tarhi sambhogaśṛṅgāraḥ kavinā nibadhyatāmityāśaṅkyāha---na ceti /
GK16andhvc3u:2074: munināpa sthāne sthāne prakṛtyaucityameva vibhāvānubhāvādiṣu bahutaraṃ pramāṇīkṛtaṃ 'sthairyeṇottamamadhyamādhamānāṃ nīcānāṃ sambhrameṇa' ityādi vadatā /
GK16andhvc3u:2088: divyaṃ mānaṣyañja tadādi yadaucityaṃ tasya parīkṣā /
GK16andhvc3u:2114_1: svapratibhāṃ cānusaratā kavināvahatacetasā bhūtvā vibhāvā dyaucityabhraṃśaparityāge
GK16andhvc3u:2115_0: aucityavataḥ kathāśarīrasya vṛttasyotprekṣitasya vā graho vyañjaka ityanenaitatpratipādayati---yaditihāsādiṣu
GK16andhvc3u:2115_1: kathāsu rasavatīṣu vividhāsu satīṣvapa yattatra vibhāvādyaucityavatkathāśarīraṃ tadeva grāhyaṃnetarat /
GK16andhvc3u:2116: vṛttādapi ca kathāśarīrādutprekṣite viśeṣataḥ prayatnavatā bhavitavyam /
GK16andhvc3u:2132: adṛṣṭaṃ sukṛtaṃ prasādo devatādiprasādaḥ tābhyāmuditā yā svapratibhā tacchālitvamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2134: itihāsādiṣu vividhāsu rasavatīṣu kathāsu satīṣvapi tāḥ kathā anādṛtya tatra tāsāmmadhye yatkathāśarīramaucityavattadeva kavinā grāhyaṃ,
GK16andhvc3u:2135: netaradvibhāvādyaucityaśūnyaṃ kathāśarīraṃ rasavadapi na grāhyamiti vṛttyartha iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2145: tatra iti jātyuttaramapi na sambhavatīti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2150: kiñca---- santi siddharasaprakhyā ye ca rāmāyaṇādayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2152: teṣu hi kathāśrayeṣu tāvatsvecchaiva na yojya /
GK16andhvc3u:2154: svecchāpi yadi yojyā tadrasavirodhinī na yojyā /
GK16andhvc3u:2156: itivṛttavaśāyātāṃ kathañcidrasānanuguṇāṃ sthitiṃ tyaktvā punarutprekṣyāpyantarābhīṣṭarasocitakathonnayo vidheyaḥ yatā kālidāsaprabandheṣu /
GK16andhvc3u:2157: yathā ca sarvasenaviracite locanam na hi tatretihāsavaśādeva mayā nibaddhamiti jātyuttaramapi sambhavati /
GK16andhvc3u:2161: siddhaḥ āsvādamātraśeṣo na tu bhāvanīyo raso yeṣu /
GK16andhvc3u:2166: kathañcidvā yadi yojyate tattatprasiddharasaviruddhā na yojyā /
GK16andhvc3u:2167: yathā rāmasya dhīralalitatvayojanena nāṭikānāyakatvaṃ kaścitkuryāditi tvatyantāsamañjasam /
GK16andhvc3u:2173: tathārjunacarite 'rjunasya pātālavijayādi bālapriyā sahṛdayāsvāda eva śeṣaḥ śiṣṭāṃśo yasya saḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2176: siddharasāḥ prakhyāḥ prakhyātāśca siddharasaprakhyā ye rāmāyaṇādayaḥ kathāśrayāssantīti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2179: na tairityādikaṃ vākyadvaye paryavasannamityāśayena teṣvityādi vyākhyātaṃ vṛttau,
GK16andhvc3u:2189: rāmāyaṇaprasiddhastadīyo raso hi vīra iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2196: tatretivṛte yadi rasānanuguṇāṃ sthitiṃ paśyettademāṃ bhaṅktvāpi svatantratayā rasānuguṇaṃ kathāntaramutpādayet /
GK16andhvc3u:2200: yatsandhīnāṃ mukhapratimukhagarbhāvamarśanirvahaṇākhyānāṃ tadaṅgānāṃ copakṣepādīnāṃ ghaṭanaṃ locanam varṇitamithāsāprasiddham /
GK16andhvc3u:2203: iha prabhusammitebhyaḥ śrutismṛtiprabhṛtibhyaḥ kartavyamidamityājñāmātraparamārthebhyaḥ śāstrebhyo ye na vyutpannāḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:2204: na cāpyasyedaṃ vṛttamamuṣmātkarmaṇa ityevaṃ yuktiyuktakarmaphalasambandhaprakaṭanakāribhyo mitrrasammitebhya itihāsaśāstrebhyo labdhavyutpattayaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:2205: atha cāvaśyaṃ vyutpādyāḥ prajārthasampādanayogyatākrāntā rājaputraprāyāsteṣāṃ hṛdayānupraveśamukhena caturvargopāyavyutpattirādheyā /
GK16andhvc3u:2208: prītyātmā ca rasastadeva nāṭyaṃ nāṭyameva veda ityasmadupādhyāyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2215: abhīṣṭasya rasasya ucitāyāḥ kathāyā unnayaḥ ghaṭanam /
GK16andhvc3u:2229: prajānāmarthapampādane paripālane yā yogyatā rājakulaprasūtatvādirūpā tayā ākrāntā āśritā ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2231: caturvargopāyavyutpattiḥ nāntarīyakamānuṣaṅgikaphalaṃ yasya tathāvidho yo vibhāvādisaṃyogaḥ tatprasādopanataḥ tenotpādita ityarthaṃ /
GK16andhvc3u:2240: phalaṃ ca nāma yadadṛṣṭavaśāddavatā prasādādānyato vā jāyate /
GK16andhvc3u:2243: tenopāyakrameṇa pravṛttasya siddhiḥ anupāyadvāreṇa pravṛttasya nāśa ityevaṃ nāyakapratināyakagatatvenārthānarthepāyavyutpattiḥ kāryā /
GK16andhvc3u:2252: kāraṇagatā muninoktaḥ--- saṃsādhye phalayoge tu vyāpāraḥ kāraṇasya yaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2291: tadanurodhe tu svarūpāt kiñciducchūnatāmityasya svarūpamityanenānvayo bodhyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2300: prārambhādīnāmmukhādisandhīnāṃ locanam tasyānupūrvyā virjñayāḥ pañcāvasthāḥ prayoktṛbhiḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:2304: evaṃ yā etāḥ kāraṇasyāvasthāstatsampādakaṃ yatkarturitavṛttaṃ pañcadhā vibhaktam /
GK16andhvc3u:2305: ta eva mukhapratimukhagarbhāvamarśanirvahaṇākhyā anvarthanāmānaḥ pañca sandhaya itivṛttakhaṇaḍāḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:2307: teṣāmapi sandhīnāṃ svanirvāhyaṃ prati tathā kramadarśanādavāntarabhinnā ititavṛttabhāgāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2310: tathā hi svāyattasiddherbījaṃ binduḥ kāryamiti tisraḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2311: bījena sarvavyāpārāḥ bindunānusandhānaṃ kāryeṇa nirvāhaḥ sandarśanaprārthanāvyavasāyarūpā hyetāstisro 'rthasampādye kartuḥ prakṛtayaḥ svabhāvavaśeṣāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2312: sacivāyattasiddhitve tu sacivasya tadarthameva vā svārthameva vā svārthamapi vā pravṛtttvena prakīrṇapatākāśabdābhyāmukta iti /
GK16andhvc3u:2313: evaṃ prastutaphalanirvāhaṇāntasyādhikārikasya vṛttasya pañcasandhitvaṃ pūrṇasandhyaṅgatā ca sarvajanavyutpattidāyinī nibandhanīyā /
GK16andhvc3u:2314: prāsaṅgike tvitivṛtte nāyaṃ niyama ityuktam- 'prāsaṅgike parāthatvānna hyeṣa niyamo bhavet' iti muninā /
GK16andhvc3u:2328: tattataprayojanaṃ manasi kṛtya tātsiddhiṃ samprārthya tadartho vyavasāyo bhavatīti sandarśanādijanyatvādbījādayastatsvarūpā ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2342: yathā veṇīsaṃhāre vilāsākhyasya pratimukhasandhyaṅgasya prakṛtarasanibandhānanuguṇamapi dvitīye 'ṅke bharatamatānusaraṇamātrecchayā ghaṭanam /
GK16andhvc3u:2343: locanam prastāvanopakrame pañcāpi sandhayo 'vasthāpañcakasahitāḥ samucitasandhyaṅgaparipūrṇā arthaprakṛtiyuktā darśitā eva /
GK16andhvc3u:2344_1: iti 'rājyaṃ nirjitaśatru' iti ca vacobhiḥ 'upabhogasevāvasaro 'yam' ityupakṣepātprabhṛti hi nirūpitam /
GK16andhvc3u:2346: pratyekena tu pradarśyamānaṃ pūrvāparānusandhānavandhyatayā kevalaṃ saṃmohadāyi bhavatīti na vitatam /
GK16andhvc3u:2347: asyārthasya yatnāvadheyatveneṣṭatvātsvakaṇṭhena yo vyatireka ukto 'na tu kevalayā' iti tasyodāharaṇamāha---na tviti /
GK16andhvc3u:2348: kevalaśabdamicchāśabdaṃ ca prayuñcānasyāyamāśayaḥ---bharatamuninā sandhyaṅganāṃ rasāṅgabhūtamitivṛttaprāśastyotpādanameva prayojanamuktam /
GK16andhvc3u:2382: idaṃ cāparaṃ prabandhasya rasavyañjakatve nimittaṃ yaduddīpanapraśamane yathāvasaramantarā locanam iti pratimukhasandhyaṅgavilāsalakṣaṇe /
GK16andhvc3u:2388: yathā---'ayaṃ sa rāā udayaṇo tti' ityādi sāgarikāyāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2395: durlabhatvaṃ yato nāryā kāminaḥ sā parā ratiḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:2397: vīrarasādāvapi yathāvasaramuddīpanapraśamanābhyāṃ vinā jhaṭityevādbhutaphalakalpe sādhye labdhe prakaṭīcikīrṣita upāyopeyabhāvo na pradarśita evala syāt /
GK16andhvc3u:2402: yadvā---rateḥ ratyākhyasthāyinaḥ yo bhujyata iti bhogo viṣayaḥ pramadādiḥ tadarthā tatsambhogārthā ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2404: ādhikāriko yo raso varṇyamānaḥ tasya yaḥ sthāyībhāvastadupavyañjako yo vibhāvādiḥ tadupalakṣamārthatvena tadupalakṣakatvenetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2409: yathātattvamadhigato jñāto 'rtho munyabhipretārthe yasya tathābhūto na,
GK16andhvc3u:2413: nanu veṇīsaṃhāre ka āghikāriko rasa ityatrāha---prakṛta iti /
GK16andhvc3u:2421: yataśca yacca vinivāryate nāryā sambhoga iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2429: nāyakāditattadyvāpārasya caturvargasya ca hetuhetumadbhāva ityarthaḥ naiveti yojanā /
GK16andhvc3u:2433: tathāca yatra yatrā ṅgino rasasya vicchedaḥ prāpnuyāttatra rasasya,
GK16andhvc3u:2437: prabandhaviśeṣasya nāṭakāde rasavyaktinimittamidaṃ cāparamavagantavyaṃ yadalaṅkṛtīnāṃ śaktāvapyānurūpyeṇa yojanam /
GK16andhvc3u:2438: śakto hi kaviḥ kadācidalaṅkāranibandhane tadākṣiptatayaivānapekṣitarasabandhaḥ prabandhamārabhate tadupadeśārthamidamuktam /
GK16andhvc3u:2440: locanam na tu sarvarthavopanatā viśrāntirvicchedo yasya sa tathā /
GK16andhvc3u:2444: rājyapratyāpattyā hi sacivanītimahimopanatayā tadaṅgabhūtapajhāvatīlābhānugatayānuprāṇyamānarūpā paramāmabhilaṣaṇīyatamatāṃ prāptā vāsavadattādhigatireva tatra phalam /
GK16andhvc3u:2445: nirvahaṇe hi 'prāptā devī bhūtadhātrī ca bhūyaḥ saṃbandho 'bhūddarśakena' ityevaṃ devīlābhaprādhānyaṃ nirvāhitam /
GK16andhvc3u:2446: iyati cetivṛttavaicitryacitre bhittisthānīyo vāsavadattāpremabandhaḥ prathamamantrārambhātpramṛti pajhāvatīvivāhādau,
GK16andhvc3u:2448: tena sa eva vāsavadattāviṣayaḥ premabandhaḥ kathāvaśādāśaṅkyamānavicchedo 'pyanusaṃhitaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2465: dṛṣṭāyūyaṃ nirjitā vidviṣaśca prāptā devī bhūtadhātrī ca bhūyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2466: sambandho 'bhūddarśakenāpi sārdhaṃ kiṃ te duḥkhaṃ yattataśśāntamadya //
GK16andhvc3u:2474_1: tāvadaṅke sphuṭaṃ sa evopanivaddhaḥ 'tadvakrenduvilokanena divaso nītaḥ pradoṣastathā
GK16andhvc3u:2476: dvitīye 'pi 'dṛṣṭirnāmṛtavarṣiṇī smitamadhuprasyandi vaktraṃ na kim' ityādinā sa eva vicchinno 'pyanusaṃhitaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2477: tṛtīye 'pi sarvatra jvaliteṣu veśmasu bhayādālījane vidgute śvāsotkampavihastayā pratipadaṃ devyā patantyā tathā /
GK16andhvc3u:2478: hā nātheti muhuḥ pralāpaparayā dagdhaṃ varākyā tayā śāntenāpi vayaṃ tu tena dahanenādyāpi dahyāmahe //
GK16andhvc3u:2480: caturthe 'pi devīsvīkṛtamānasasya niyataṃ svapnāyamānasya me tadgotragrahaṇādiyaṃ suvadanā yāyātkathaṃ na vyathām /
GK16andhvc3u:2481: itthaṃ yantraṇayā kathaṅkathamapi kṣīṇā niśā jāgrate /
GK16andhvc3u:2482: bālapriyā praṣṭuṃ pravṛttasya me” ityādipadena grāhyam /
GK16andhvc3u:2484: tatpadenātra tatpadenātra sarvatra vāsavadattāyāḥ parāmarśaḥ divasaḥ ahasmamayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2488: manmathena kṛtaḥ utpāditaḥ utsāhaḥ yeṣāṃ taiḥ kiṃ kutaḥ baddhotkaṇṭhaṃ bhavati /
GK16andhvc3u:2495: ādipadena “nordhvārdraṃ hṛdayaṃ na candanarasasparśāni cāṅgāni vā kasmin labdhapadena te kṛtamidaṃ krūreṇa pātāgrinā /
GK16andhvc3u:2502_0: pūrvārddhena dṛṣṭyādyaṅgeṣu viroghisadbhāvādagneḥ padalābho na bhavatīti darśitamata
GK16andhvc3u:2502_2: tvaṃ krūreṇāgninā pītā dagdhā iti yadidamiti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2508: varākyā nirbhāgyayā tayā devyā tathā dagdhamiti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2516: itthaṃ yantraṇayā evaṃ locanam dākṣiṇyopahatena sā priyatamā svapte 'pi nāsāditā //
GK16andhvc3u:2518: pañcame 'pi samāgamapratyāśayā karuṇe nivṛtte vipralambhe 'ṅkurite tathābhūte tasminmunivacasi jātāgasi mayi prayatnāntargūḍhāṃ ruṣamupagatā me priyatamā /
GK16andhvc3u:2519: prasīdeti proktā na khalu kupitetyuktimadhuraṃ samudbhinā pītairnayanasalilaiḥ sthāsyati punaḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:2521: ṣaṣṭe 'pi 'tvatsamprāptivilobhitena sacivaiḥ prāṇā mayā dhāritāḥ' ityādinā /
GK16andhvc3u:2525: uddhāṭya sā praviṣṭā hṛdayagṛhaṃ me nṛpatanūjā //
GK16andhvc3u:2527: bālapriyā cintanarūpanidrāpratibandhakena jāgrato me niśā kṣīṇeti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2536: sā priyatamā tathā mama punaḥpaścādapipura itivā pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2542: yukteti yāvat pītaiḥ antaḥstambhitaiḥ samudbhinnaprītiriti pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2543: sādhiṣṭhaḥ samudbhinna prakāśitā prītiḥ yayā setyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2546: ādipadena “tanmatvā tyajataśsarīrakamidaṃ naivāsti nissnehatā āsanno 'vasarastavānugamane jātā dhṛtiḥ kintvayam /
GK16andhvc3u:2547: khedo yacca tavānugaṃ na hṛdayaṃ tasmin kṣaṇe dāruṇa //
GK16andhvc3u:2558: svañtite praveśapratibandhāya suṣṭu mithaḥ sambaddhe pakṣmaṇī eva kavāṭe yasya tat /
GK16andhvc3u:2560: svarūpatāḍena svasyarūpamākṛtiḥ tadeva tāḍaḥ tāḍanakriyā sādhanamudgāḍhanakaraṇamiti yāvat tena /
GK16andhvc3u:2563: atra nayanadvāramityetāvadeva rūpaṇaṃ śṛṅgārānuguṇatayā sundaraṃ na tvanyadapīti bhāvaḥ //14//
GK16andhvc3u:2567: dhvaner asya prabandheṣu bhāsate so 'pi keṣucit // DhvK_3.15 //
GK16andhvc3u:2571: asya vivakṣitānyaparavācyasya dhvaneranuraṇanarūpavyaṅgyo 'pi yaḥ prabheda udāhṛto dviprakāraḥ so 'pi prabandheṣu keṣuciddyotate /
GK16andhvc3u:2573: yathā vā mamaiva kāmadevasya sahacarasamāgame locanam na kevalaṃ prabandhena sākṣādvyaṅgyo yāvatpāramparyeṇāpīti darśayitumupakramate--kiñceti /
GK16andhvc3u:2575: yo dhvaneḥ prabheda udāhṛtaḥ saḥ keṣucitprabandheṣu nimittabhūteṣu vyañcakeṣu satsu vyaṅgyatayā sthitaḥ san /
GK16andhvc3u:2578: atha vānusvānopamaḥ prabheda udāhṛto yaḥ prabandheṣu bhāsate asyāpi 'dyotyo 'lakṣyakramaḥ kvacit' ityuttaraślokena kārikāvṛttyoḥ saṅgatiḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2579: etaduktaṃ bhavati---prabandhena kadācidanuraṇanarūpavyaṅgyo dhvaniḥ sākṣādvyajyate sa tu rasādidhvanau paryavasyatīti /
GK16andhvc3u:2580: yadi tu spaṣṭameva vyākhyāyate tadā grandhasya pūrvottarasyālakṣyakramaviṣayasya madhye grantho 'yamasaṅgataḥ syāt nīrasatvaṃ ca pāñcajanyoktyādīnāmuktaṃ syādatyalam /
GK16andhvc3u:2585: dhvanerityasya prabheda ityanena sambandha iti darśayati-dhvaneḥ prabheda iti /
GK16andhvc3u:2591: ya udāhṛtaḥ sa keṣucit prabandheṣu bhāsate ityanta anuvādaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2608: saviṇa vi tumammi puṇovanti a atanti paṃmusimmi //
GK16andhvc3u:2612: śmaśānāvatīrṇaṃ putradāhārthamudyoginaṃ janaṃ vipralabdhuṃ gṛdhro divā śavaśarīrabhakṣaṇārthī śīghramevāpasarata yūyamityāha /
GK16andhvc3u:2622: līlayā daṃṣṭrāgreṇa uddhṛtaṃ sakalamahīmaṇḍalaṃ yena varāharūpiṇā tasyetyanena gurutaravastuvahane anāyāsassūcyate /
GK16andhvc3u:2648: kṛt-tad dhita-samāsaiś ca dyotyo 'lakṣya-kramaḥ kvacit // DhvK_3.16 //
GK16andhvc3u:2652: alakṣyakramo dhvanerātmā rasādaḥ subviśeṣaistiṅviśeṣairvacanavaśeṣaiḥ sambandhaviśeṣaiḥ kārakaśaktibhiḥ kṛdviśeṣaistaddhitaviśeṣaiḥ samāsaiśceti /
GK16andhvc3u:2658: sa cābhiprāyo vyaktaḥ śāntarasa eva pariniṣṭhatatāṃ prāptaḥ // 15 //
GK16andhvc3u:2659: evamalakṣyakramavyaṅgyasya rasādadhvaneryadyapi varṇebhyaḥ prabhṛti prabandhaparyante vyañjakavarge nirūpite nanirūpaṇīyāntaramavaśiṣyate,
GK16andhvc3u:2660: tathāpi kavisahṛdayānāṃ śibhāṃ dātuṃ punarapi sūkṣmadṛśānvayavyatirekāvāśritya vyañjakavargamāha--suptiṅḍityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:2662: subādibhiḥ yo 'nusvānopamo bhāsate vaktrabhiprāyādarūpaḥ asyāpi subādibhirvyaktasyānusvānopamasyālakṣyakramavyaṅgyo dyotyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2665: udāharaṇe sa tvabhivyakto 'bhiprāyo yathāsvaṃ vibhāvādirūpatādvāreṇa rasādīnvyanakti /
GK16andhvc3u:2673: kanakavarṇasya hemakumbhāderābhā kāntirivābhā yasya iti vā tam /
GK16andhvc3u:2680: nirūpite nirūpite sati na avaśiṣyata iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2683: subityādīnāṃ tṛtīyāntānāṃ pūrvakārikāsthena bhāsata ityanena tatsthasyāsya dhvanerapītyasyātratyena dyotya ityanena ca sambandha iti vyācaṣṭe--subādibhirityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:2686: yathā---- nyakkāro hyayameva me yadarayastatrāpyasau tāpasaḥ so 'pyatraiva nihanti rākṣasakulaṃ jīvatyaho rāvaṇaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2687: dhigdhikchakrajitaṃ prabodhitavatā kiṃ kumbhakarṇena vā svargagrāmaṭikāviluṇṭhanavṛthocchūnaiḥ kimebhirbhujaiḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:2688_0: locanam etaduktaṃ bhavati--varṇādibhiḥ prabandhāntaiḥ sākṣādvā raso 'bhivyajyate
GK16andhvc3u:2688_1: vibhāvādipratipādanadvāreṇa yadivā vibhāvādivyañjanadvārema paramparayete tatra bandhasyaitatparamparayā
GK16andhvc3u:2691: vyañjakatvaṃ dṛśyata ityādau ca vākyaśeṣo 'dhyāhāryaḥ vibhāvādivyañjanadvāratayā parāmpartheṇetyervarūpaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2693: mama śatrusadbhāvonocita iti sambandhānaucityaṃ krodhavibhāvaṃ vyanakti asya iti bahuvacanam /
GK16andhvc3u:2694: tapovidyate yasyeti pau ṣakathāhīnatvaṃ taddhitena matvarthīyenābhivyaktam /
GK16andhvc3u:2696: matkartṛkā yadi jīvanakrayā tadā hananakriyā tāvadanucitā /
GK16andhvc3u:2697: tasyāṃ ca sa kartā apiśabdena manuṣyamātrakam /
GK16andhvc3u:2699: vibhāvādipratipādanadvāreṇa sākṣādvā vibhāvādivyañjanadvāreṇa paramparayā vā raso 'bhivyajyata iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2707: iyaṃ śrīrāmeṇa rākṣasakulakṣaye kriyamāṇe kruddhasya rāvaṇasya svādhikṣepoktiḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2714: bahutvena śatrumattā mamānuciteti sambandhānaucityarūpaṃ krodhavibhāvamaraya iti bahuvacanaṃ vyañjayatīti bahuvacanamityasyārthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2724: saḥ tāpasaḥ mānuṣamātrakaḥ kutsito manuṣya eva /
GK16andhvc3u:2726: yathā atra hi śloke bhūyasā sarveṣāmapyeṣāṃ sphuṭameva vyañjakatvaṃ dṛśyate /
GK16andhvc3u:2728: 'tatrāpyasau tāpasa' ityatra tadvitanipātayoḥ 'so 'pyatraiva nihanti rākṣasakulaṃ jīvatyaho rāvaṇaḥ' ityatra tiṅkārakaśaktīnām /
GK16andhvc3u:2730: evaṃvidhasya vyañcakabhūyastve ca ghaṭamāne kāvyasya sarvātiśāyinī bandhacchāyā samunmīlati /
GK16andhvc3u:2731: yatra hi vyaṅgyāvabhāsinaḥ padasyaikasyaiva tāvadāvirbhāvastatrāpi kāvye kāpi bandhacchāyā kimuta yatra teṣāṃ bahūnāṃ samavāyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2733: atra hi rāvama ityasmin pade 'rthāntarasaṃkramitavācyena dhvaniprabhedenālaṅkṛte 'pi punaranantaroktānāṃ vyañjakaprakārāṇāmudbhāsanam /
GK16andhvc3u:2734: dṛśyante ca mahātmanāṃ pratibhāviśeṣabhājāṃ bāhulyenaivaṃvidhā bandhaprakārāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2735: locanam deśo 'dhikaraṇam niḥśeṣema hanyamānatatāyā rākṣasabalaṃ ca karmeti tadidamasaṃbhāvyamānamupanatamiti puruṣakārāsampattirdhvanyate tiṅkārakaśaktipratipādakaiśca śabdaiḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2737: dhigdhigiti nipātasya śakraṃ jitavānityākhyāyikeyamiti upapadasamāsena sahakṛtaḥ svargetyādisamāsasya svapauruṣānusmaraṇaṃ prati vyañjakatvam /
GK16andhvc3u:2742: tena tilaśastilaśo 'pi vibhajyamāne 'tra śloke sarva evāṃśo vyañjakatvena bhātīti kimanyat /
GK16andhvc3u:2767: 'pṛthivī gatayauvanā' locanam atikrāntaṃ na tu kadācana vartamānatāmavalambamānaṃ sukhaṃ yeṣu te kālā iti,
GK16andhvc3u:2768: sarva eva na tu sukhaṃ prati vartamānaḥ sa ko 'pi kālaleśa ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2769: pratīpānyupasthitāni vṛttāni pratyāvartamānāni tathā dūrabhāvīnyapi pratyupasthitāni nikaṭatayā vartamānāni bhavanti dāruṇāni duḥkhāni yeṣu te /
GK16andhvc3u:2770: duḥkhaṃ bahuprakārameva prativartamānāḥ sarve kālāṃśā ityanena kālasya tāvannirvedamabhivyañjayataḥ śāntarasavyañjakatvam /
GK16andhvc3u:2771: deśasyāpyāha--pṛthivī śvaḥ śvaḥ prātaḥ prātardināddinaṃ pāpīyadivasāḥ pāpānāṃ sambandhinaḥ pāpiṣṭhajanasvāmikā divasā yasyāṃ sā tathoktā /
GK16andhvc3u:2772_0: svābhāvata eva tāvatkālo duḥkhamayaḥ tatrāpi pāpiṣṭhajanasvāmikapṛthivīlakṣayauvanā
GK16andhvc3u:2772_1: vṛddhastrīvadasaṃbhāvyamānasaṃbhogā gatayauvanatayā hi yo yo divasa āgacchati bālapriyā
GK16andhvc3u:2791: śvaḥ śva ityasya gatayauvanetyanenāpi sambandha ityāha---śvaḥśva ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:2792: gatayauvanetyasya mukhyārthaṃ tasya prakṛte bādhallakṣaṇānimittaṃ tatsārūpyaṃ ca darśayati--vṛddhetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:2796: gatayauvaneti pāpīyānityatra hetugarbhaṃ pāpīyapadamarthāntaraparaṃ cetyanyathā vyācaṣṭe---gatetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:2800: eṣāṃ ca subādīnāmekaikaśaḥ samuditānāṃ ca vyañjakatvaṃ mahākavīnāṃ prabandheṣu prāyeṇa dṛśyate /
GK16andhvc3u:2801: subantasya vyañjakatvaṃ yathā--- tālaiḥ śiñjadvayasubhagaiḥ kāntayā nartito me yāmadhyāste divasavigame nīlakaṇṭhaḥ suhṛdvaḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:2803: avasara rouṃ cia ṇimmiāiṃ mā puṃsa me haacchīiṃ /
GK16andhvc3u:2804: daṃsaṃṇamettumbhattehiṃ jahi hiaaṃ tuha ṇa ṇāam //
GK16andhvc3u:2805: locanam sa sa pūrvapūrvāpekṣayā pāpīyān nikṛṣṭatvāt /
GK16andhvc3u:2806: yadiveyasunanto 'yaṃ śabdo muninaivaṃ prayukto ṇijanto vā /
GK16andhvc3u:2810: samuditatve tūdāharaṇaṃ dattaṃ vyastatve cojyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2812: apasara roditumeva nirmite mā puṃsaya hate akṣiṇī me /
GK16andhvc3u:2813: darśanamātronmattābhyāṃ yābhyāṃ tava hṛdayamevaṃrūpaṃ na jñātam //
GK16andhvc3u:2814: anmatto hi na kiñcijjānātīti na kasyāpyatrāparādhaḥ daivenetthameva nirmāṇaṃ bālapriyā pṛthivyā iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2815: nanu pāpīyānityuktārthaḥ kathaṃ labhyata ityatrāha---itasunanta iti /
GK16andhvc3u:2816: nanvasmin pakṣe pāpīyo divaseti bhāvyamityata āha--muninetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:2817: ārṣo 'yaṃ prayoga ityarthaḥ. a6 pakṣāntaramāha---ṇijanto veti /
GK16andhvc3u:2818: muninā prayukta ityanuṣajyate ṇijanteyasunanto munināprayukto vetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2819: lokān pāpīyasaḥ karotītyarthe pāpīyaśśabdāṇṇaci kartaryavi ṭerṇicaśca lopādakārānto 'yaṃ pāpīyaśabda iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2833: rīditumeva nirmite sṛṣṭe me hatākṣiṇī kutsite nayane /
GK16andhvc3u:2844: mā panthaṃ rundhīo avehi bālaa ahosi ahirīo /
GK16andhvc3u:2847: aṇaṇatta vacca bālaa hṇā arnti kiṃ maṃ puloesieam /
GK16andhvc3u:2850: apasara mā vṛthā prayāsaṃ kārṣīḥ daivasya viparivartayitumaśakyatvāditi tiṅanto vyañjakaḥ tadanugṛhītāni padāntarāṇyapīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2851: mā panthānaṃ rudhaḥ apehi bālaka aprauḍha aho asi ahnīkaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2852: vayaṃ paratantrā yataḥ śūnyagṛhaṃ māmakaṃ rakṣaṇīyaṃ vartate //
GK16andhvc3u:2853: ityatrāpehīti tiṅantamidaṃ dhvanati--tvaṃ tāvadaprauḍho lokamadhye yadevaṃ prakāśayasi /
GK16andhvc3u:2855: 'anyatra vraja bālaka' aprauḍha buddhe snāntīṃ māṃ kiṃ prakarṣeṇālokayasyetat /
GK16andhvc3u:2858: atra jāyāto ye bhīravasteṣāmetatsathānamiti durāpetaḥ bālapriyā tiṅantaśabda itṣathaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2868: atra śloke śṛṅgāraḥ sambhogo vyaṅya pūrvaślorake tu vipralambha iti bhedaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2869: vṛttau--'aṇṇatte'ti anyatra vraja bālakasnāntīṃ kiṃ mā pralokayasyetat /
GK16andhvc3u:2873: jalāśaye snāntīṃ kañcidanurāgeṇa paśyantaṃ kañcana gṛhasthaṃ prati taṃ kāmayamānāyāstasyā uktiriyam /
GK16andhvc3u:2877: etattaṭaṃ jāyābhīrukāṇāṃ sambandhi na bhavatyeveti yojanā /
GK16andhvc3u:2880: tathāvidhānāmatra sthāne vartanarūpaḥ sambandho dūrāpeta ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2888: nipātānāṃ vyañjakatvaṃ yathā--- ayamekapade tayā viyogaḥ priyayā copanataḥ suduḥsaho me /
GK16andhvc3u:2892: mukhamaṃsavivarti pakṣmalākṣyāḥ kathamapyunnamitaṃ na cumbitaṃ tu //
GK16andhvc3u:2895: upasargāṇāṃ vyañcakatvaṃ yathā--- nīvārāḥ śukagarbhakoṭaramukhabhraṣṭāstaruṇāmadhaḥ prasnigdhāḥ kvacidiṅgudīphalabhidaḥ sūcyanta evopalāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2896: viśvāsopagabhādabhinnagatayaḥ śabdaṃ sahante mṛgā- stoyādhārapathāśca valkalaśikhāniṣyandalekhāṅkitāḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:2899: kṛtaḥ kapratyayaprayogo yeṣu kāvyavākyeṣu yathā jāyābhīrukāṇāmiti /
GK16andhvc3u:2900: ye hyarasajñā dharmapatnīṣu premaparatantrāstebhyaḥ ko 'nyo jagati kutsitaḥ sthāditi kapratyayo 'vajñātiśayadyotakaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2904: dvau caśabdāvevamāhatuḥ kākatālīyanyāyena gaṇḍasyopari sphoṭa itivattadviyogaśca varṣasamayaśca samamupanatau etadalaṃ prāṇaharaṇāya /
GK16andhvc3u:2907: paścāttāpasūcakassan tāvanmātraparicumbanalābhenāpi kṛtakṛtyatā syaditi dhvanatīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2920: ityādau dvitrāṇāṃ copasargāṇāmekatra pade yaḥ prayogaḥ so 'pi rasavyaktyanuguṇatayaiva nirdeṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2923: locanam vaiyākaraṇādigṛheṣu hi prākprayogasvātantryaprayogābhāvātṣaṣṭhyādyaśravaṇālliṅgasaṃkhyāvarahācca vācakavailakṣaṇyena dyotakā nipātā ityuddhoṣyata eveti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2924: prakarṣeṇa snigdhā iti praśabdaḥ prakarṣaṃ dyotayanniṅgudīphalānāṃ sarasatvamācakṣāṇa āśramasya saundaryātiśayandhvanati /
GK16andhvc3u:2931: samyagbhūtamupāṃśukṛtvā ā samantāccarantamityanena lokānujighṛkṣātiśayastattadācarataḥ parameśvarasya dhvanitaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2938_0: prākprayogaśca svātantrayeṇa prayogābhāvaśca tasmāt prākprayogāditi vyastatayā pāṭhaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:2938_1: sādhīyān upasargasaṃjñāviśiṣṭānāṃ prasākṣādityādīnāṃ nipātānāṃ dhātoḥ prāgeva prayogādivaivamādīnāṃ
GK16andhvc3u:2940: yathā candrasya candreṇa vā sadṛśaṃ mukhamityādau ṣaṣṭhyādikaṃ śrūyate,
GK16andhvc3u:2941: tathā candra ivetyādau ṣaṣṭhyādikaṃ na śrūyate yatastasmādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2952: ye prītyā vapuṣi na mānti sma,
GK16andhvc3u:2953: ye prasyandipramadāśravaḥ pulakitāḥ santaḥ pranṛtyanti smetyādyanvayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2957: ye svavapuṣīti pāṭhe tu jīvantītyādau nipātānāmapi tathaiva /
GK16andhvc3u:2959: yathā vā--- ye jīvanti na mānti ye sma vapuṣi prītyā pranṛtyanti ca prasyandipramadāśravaḥ pulakitā dṛṣṭe guṇinyūrjite /
GK16andhvc3u:2960: hā dhikkaṣṭamaho kva yāmi śaraṇaṃ teṣāṃ janānāṃ kṛte nītānāṃ pralayaṃ śaṭhena vidhinā sādhudviṣaḥ puṣyatā //
GK16andhvc3u:2963: yathā--- yadvañjanāhitamatirbahucāṭugarbhaṃ kāryonmukhaḥ khalajanaḥ kṛtakaṃ bravīti /
GK16andhvc3u:2964: tatsādhavo nana vidanta vidanti kintu kartu vṛthāprāṇayamasya na pārayanti //
GK16andhvc3u:2968: ślāghātiśayo nirvedātiśayaśca aho bateti hā dhigiti ca dhvanyate /
GK16andhvc3u:2972: ta eva hi sarvaṃ vidanti sutarāmiti dhvanyate /
GK16andhvc3u:2973: vākyapaunaruktyaṃ yathā---'paśya dvīpādanyasmādapi' iti vacanānantaraṃ 'kaḥ saṃdehaḥ dvīpādanyasmādapa' ityanenepsitaprāptiravidhnitaiva dhvanyate /
GK16andhvc3u:2974: 'kiṃ kim? svassthā bhavanti mayi jīvati' ityanenāmarṣātiśayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2991: airā hohinti pahā maṇorahāṇaṃ pi dullaṅghā //
GK16andhvc3u:2994: iti chāyā) atra hyacirādbhaviṣyanti panthāna ityatra bhaviṣyantītyasmin pade pratyayaḥ kālaviśeṣābhidhāyī rasaparipoṣahetuḥ prakāśate /
GK16andhvc3u:2995: ayaṃ hi gāthārthaḥ pravāsavipralambhaśṛṅgāravibhāvatayā vibhāvyamāno rasavān /
GK16andhvc3u:2997: yathā---tadgehaṃ natamiti mandiramidaṃ labdhāvagāhaṃ divaḥ sā dhenurjaratī caranti kariṇāmetā dhanābhā dhaṭāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2998: sa kṣudo musaladhvaniḥ kalamidaṃ saṅgītakaṃ yoṣitā- māścaryaṃ divasaurdvijo 'yamiyatīṃ bhūmiṃ samāropitaḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:3000: tiṅantapadānupravaṣṭasyāpyarthakalāpasya kārakakālasaṃkhyopagraharūpasya madhye 'nvayavyatarekābhyāṃ sūkṣmadṛśā bhāgagatamapi vyañjakatvaṃ vicāryamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3002: utprekṣyamāṇo varṣāsamayaḥ kampakārī kimuta vartamāna iti dhvanyate /
GK16andhvc3u:3013: samaviṣamāḥ samāḥ viṣamāśca deśāḥ nirviśeṣāḥ jalapravāhanimagnatayā ekarūpāḥ yeṣu te /
GK16andhvc3u:3025: atra śloke divasairityasmin pade prakṛtyaṃśo 'pi dyotakaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3027: atra ca sarvanāmnāmeva vyañjakatvaṃ hṛdi vyavasthāpya kavinā kvetyādiśabdaprayogo na kṛtaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3028: anayā diśā locanam divasārthe hyatrātyantāsambhāvyamānatāmasyārthasya dhvani /
GK16andhvc3u:3031: tena prakṛtyaṃśena sambhūta sarvanāmavyañjakaṃ dṛśyata ityuktaṃ bhavatīti na paunaruktyam /
GK16andhvc3u:3032: tathā hi taditi padaṃ natabhittītyetatprakṛtyaṃśasahāyaṃ samastāmaṅgalanidhānabhūtāṃ mūṣakādyākīrṇatāṃ dhvanati /
GK16andhvc3u:3034: na ca natabhittiśabdenāpyete daurbhāgyāyatanatvasūcakā viśeṣā uktāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3039: tadidaṃśabdādyabhāve tu sarvamasaṅgataṃ syaditi tadidamaṃśayoreva prāṇatvaṃ yojyam /
GK16andhvc3u:3040: etacca dviśaḥ sāmastyaṃ triśaḥ sāmastyamiti vyañjakamityupalakṣaṇaparam /
GK16andhvc3u:3045: nanu prakṛtyaṃśo dyotaka ityukatyaiva sarvanāmnāmapi vyañjakatve prāpte punastadvacanaṃ punaruktamityata āha---prakṛtyaṃśasya ceti /
GK16andhvc3u:3062: te locane ityatra pūrvamuktaṃ smārayati---evaṃvidha ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:3076: dvayoḥ sambhūya tathā trayāṇāṃ sambhūya vyañjakatvamityetadupalakṣaṇamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3080: etacca sarvaṃ padavākyaracanādyotanoktyaiva gatārthamapi vaicitryeṇa vyutpattaye punaruktam /
GK16andhvc3u:3084: kiñjārthaviśeṣākṣepyatve 'pi rasādīnāṃ teṣāmarthaviśeṣāṇāṃ vyañjakaśabdāvinābhāvitvādyathāpradarśitaṃ vyañjakasvarūpaparijñānaṃ vibhajyopayujyata eva /
GK16andhvc3u:3085: śabdaviśeṣāṇāṃ cānyatra ca cārutvaṃ yadvibhāgenopadarśitaṃ tadapi teṣāṃ vyañjakatvenaivāvasthitamityavagantavyam /
GK16andhvc3u:3086: yatrāpi tatsamprati na pratibhāsate tatrāpi vyañjake racanāntare yaddṛṣṭaṃ sauṣṭhavaṃ teṣāṃ pravāhapatitānāṃ tadevābhyāsādapoddhṛtānāmapyavabhāsata ityavasātavyam /
GK16andhvc3u:3094: na vācakatvaṃ dhvanivyavahāropayogi yenāvācakasya vyañjakatvaṃ na syāt iti prāgevoktam /
GK16andhvc3u:3095: nanu na gītādivadrasābhivyañjakatve 'pi śabdasya tatra vyāpāro 'styeva ;
GK16andhvc3u:3102: srakcandanādayaḥ śabdāḥ śṛṅgāre cāravo bībhatse tvacārava iti rasakṛta eva vibhāgaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3103: rasaṃ prati ca śabdasya vyañjakatvamevetyuktaṃ prāk /
GK16andhvc3u:3105: srakcandanādiśabdānāṃ tadānīṃ śṛṅgārādivyañjakatvābhāve 'pi vyañjakatvaśakterbhūyasā bālapriyā atropaṣṭambhakamāha - yadvattyatyanye 'pīti /
GK16andhvc3u:3109: vṛttāvanupadaṃ vakṣyamāṇasyādhikāṃśasya bodhanārthaṃ cākṣepaḥ kṛta ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3121: ko 'nyathā tulye vācakatve śabdānāṃ cārutvaviṣayo viśeṣaḥ syat /
GK16andhvc3u:3122: anya evāsau sahṛdayasaṃvedya iti cet kimidaṃ sahṛdayatvaṃ nāma?
GK16andhvc3u:3125: pūrvasmin pakṣe tathāvidhasahṛdayavyavasthāpitānāṃ śabdaviśeṣāṇāṃ cārutvaniyamo na syāt /
GK16andhvc3u:3128: tathāvidhaiḥ sahṛdayaiḥ saṃvedyo rasādisamarpaṇasāmarthyameva naisargikaṃ śabdānāṃ viśeṣa iti vyañjakatvāśrayyeva teṣāṃ mukhyaṃ cārutvam /
GK16andhvc3u:3130: tathāhi-'taṭī tāraṃ tāmyati' ityatra taṭaśabdasya puṇṭaśabdasya puṃstvanapuṃsakatve anādṛtya strītvamevāśritaṃ sahṛdayaiḥ 'strīti nāmāpi madhuraṃ' iti kṛtvā /
GK16andhvc3u:3131: yathā vāsmadupādhyāyasya vidvatkavisahṛdayacakravartino bhaṭṭendurājasya--- indīvaradyuti yadā bibhṛyānna lakṣma syurvismayaikasuhṛdo 'sya yadā vilāsāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3145: tathāpi kapolatalakomalakāntiḥ kiṃ kiṃ syānnāmeti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3153: candraṃ vilokya madhyasthasya kasyacidrasikasya vacana ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3157: evaṃ rasādīnāṃ vyañjakasvarūpamabhidhāya teṣāmeva virodhirūpaṃ lakṣayitumidamupakramyate---
GK16andhvc3u:3159: prabandhe muktake vāpi rasādīn bandhum icchatā /
GK16andhvc3u:3160: yatnaḥ kāryaḥ sumatinā parihāre virodhinām // DhvK_3.17 //
GK16andhvc3u:3164: prabandhe muktake vāpi rasabhāvanibandhanaṃ pratyādṛtamanāḥ kavirvirodhipahihāre paraṃ yatnamādadhīta /
GK16andhvc3u:3165: anyathā tvasya rasamayaḥ śloka eko 'pi samyaṅna samapdyate /
GK16andhvc3u:3166: locanam aniyantrītapuruṣecchāyatto hi samayaḥ kathaṃ niyataḥ syāt /
GK16andhvc3u:3172: śabdāntareṇa saha yā racanā tadapekṣo 'sau viśeṣa ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3174: ata eva racanayā prasādena cārutvena copabṛṃhitā eva śabdāḥ kāvye yojyā iti tātparyam // 15//
GK16andhvc3u:3176: rasādīnāṃ yadvyañjakaṃ varṇapadādiprabandhāntaṃ tasya svarūpamabhidhāyeti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3178: virodhināmapi lakṣaṇakaraṇe prayojanamucyate śakyahānatvaṃ nāma anayā kārikayā /
GK16andhvc3u:3180: nanu 'vibhāvabhāvānubhāvasañcāryaucityacāruṇaḥ' iti yaduktaṃ tata eva vyatirekamukhenaitadapyavagaṃsyate /
GK16andhvc3u:3181: maivam ;vyatirekeṇa hi tadabhāvamātraṃ pratīyate na tu tadviruddham /
GK16andhvc3u:3182: tadabhāvamātraṃ ca na tathā dūṣakaṃ yathā tadviruddham /
GK16andhvc3u:3183: pathyānupayogo hi na tathā vyādhiṃ bālapriyā śabdagato viśeṣa ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3190: śakyahānatvaṃ nāma prayojanamanayā kārakayā ucyata iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3191: virodhināṃ lakṣaṇe jñāte teṣāṃ parihāraḥ śakya iti tadeva prayojanamityarthaḥ // 17 //
GK16andhvc3u:3195: vibhāvādyaucityaśālinaḥ kathāśarīrasya vidhirityādinā tadaucityavirahiṇo vidhirna kārya ityādyathamātramityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3198: vṛttau 'śāntā'dīti kāni punastāni virodhīni yāni yatnataḥ kaveḥ parihartavyānītyucyate--
GK16andhvc3u:3202: akāṇḍa eva vicchittir akāṇḍe ca prakāśanam /
GK16andhvc3u:3204: rasasya syād virodhāya vṛtty-anaucityam eva ca // DhvK_3.19 //
GK16andhvc3u:3211: prastutarasāpekṣayā virodhī yo rasastasya sambandhināṃ vibhāvabhāvānubhāvānāṃ parigraho rasavirodhahetukaḥ sambhavanīyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3212: tatra virodhirasavibhāvaparigraho yathā śāntarasavibhāveṣu tadvibhāvatayaiva nirūpiteṣvanantarameva śṛṅgārādivibhāvavarṇane /
GK16andhvc3u:3213: virodhirasabhāvaparigraho yathā priyaṃ prati praṇayakalahakupitāsu kāminīṣu vairāgyakathābhiranunaye /
GK16andhvc3u:3214: virodhirasānubhāvaparigraho yathā praṇayakupitāyāṃ priyāyāmaprasīdantyāṃ nāyakasya kopāveśavivaśasya raudrānubhāvavarṇane /
GK16andhvc3u:3220: 'alaṅkṛtīnām' ityanena yaduktaṃ tadviruddhamanyadapi ca viruddhaṃ vṛtyanaucityamityanena /
GK16andhvc3u:3224: virodhinī rasasya yo bhāvo vyabhicārī tasya parigrahaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:3225: virodhinastu yaḥ sthāyī sthāyitayā bālapriyā 'śṛṅgārādī'ci ca nirdeśe bījamāha---hāsyaśṛṅgārayārityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:3230: pratipattaryekasmin śame udbuddhe tadavyavadhānena rāgodbodhāsambhavāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3231: ataḥ śāntavibhāve varṇite tadanantarameva śṛṅgārādivibhāvavarṇanaṃ na kāyam /
GK16andhvc3u:3232: virodhirasasyetyādigranthaṃ ayaṃ cānyo rasabhaṅgaheturyatprastutarasāpekṣayā vastuno 'nyasya kathañcidanvitasyāpi vistareṇa kathanam /
GK16andhvc3u:3233: yathā vipralambhaśṛṅgāre nāyakasya kasyacadvarṇayitumupakrānte kaveryamakādyalaṅkāranibandhanarasikatayā mahatā prabandhena parvatādivarṇane /
GK16andhvc3u:3234: ayaṃ cāparo rasabhaṅgaheturavagantavyo yadakāṇḍa locanam tatparigraho 'sambhavanīya eva tadanutthānaprasaṅgāt /
GK16andhvc3u:3237: vairāgyakathāmirita vairāgyaśabdena nirvedaḥ śāntasya yaḥ sthāyī sa uktaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3238: yathā---'prasāde vartasva prakaṭaya mudaṃ santyaja ruṣam' ityādyupakramyārthāntaranyāso 'na mugdhe pratyetuṃ prabhavati gataḥ kālahariṇaḥ' iti /
GK16andhvc3u:3241: na hi jñātaśuktikārajatatattvastadupādeyadhiyaṃ bhajate ṛte saṃvṛtimātrāt /
GK16andhvc3u:3242: kathābhiriti bahuvacanaṃ śāntarasasya vyabhicāriṇo dhṛtiṃ matiprabhṛtīn saṅgṛhṇāta /
GK16andhvc3u:3244: kimuta vistarata ityāha---kathañjidanvitasyeti bālapriyā vivṛṇoti---virodhina ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:3249: svata eva vyabhicāriṇaḥ vyabhicāratvena sthāyinaśca bodhanāya bhāva iti sāmānyata uktamityathaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3253: nidhānaṃ saukhyānāṃ kṣaṇamabhimukhaṃ sthāpaya mukham' iti dvitīyatṛtīyapādau /
GK16andhvc3u:3255: gataḥ kāla eva hariṇaḥ asthiratvāt pratyetuṃ pratyāgantum na prabhavati sa punarnāgacchatītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3256_0: atra śāntasya vibhāvaḥ kālānityatvalakṣaṇo nibandhaḥ tatprakāśito nirvedo vyabhicārī
GK16andhvc3u:3256_1: cetyato 'tra virodhirasavibhāvabhāvayoḥ parigrahaḥ sa ca prakṛtarasapratikūla ityāha---manāgapītyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:3261: jñātaṃ viṣayāṇāṃ satatvaṃ duḥkhamiśritatvapariṇāmavirasatvādinā heyatvarūpaṃ tattvaṃ yena saḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3276: eva vicchittiḥ rasasyākāṇḍa eva ca prakāśanam /
GK16andhvc3u:3277_0: tatrānavasare virāmo rasasya yathā nāyakasya kasyacitspṛhaṇīyasamāgamayā nāyikayā
GK16andhvc3u:3277_1: kayācitparāṃ paripoṣapadarvī prāpte śṛṅgāre vidite ca paramparānurāge samāgamopāyacintocitaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:3278_0: anavasare ca prakāśanaṃ rasasya yathā pravṛtte pravṛttavividhavīrasaṅkṣaye kalpasaṅkṣayakalpe
GK16andhvc3u:3279: na caivaṃvidhe viṣaye daivavyāmohitatvaṃ kathāpuruṣasya parihāro yato rasabandha eva kaveḥ prādhānyena pravṛttinibandhanaṃ yuktam /
GK16andhvc3u:3280: itivṛttavarṇanaṃ tadupāya evetyuktaṃ prāk 'ālokārthī yathā dīpaśikhāyāṃ yatnavāñjanaḥ' ityādinā /
GK16andhvc3u:3281: ata eva cetivṛttamātravarṇanaprādhānye 'ṅgāṅgibhāvarahitarasabhāvanibandhena ca kavīnāmevaṃvidhāni skhalitāni bhavantīti rasādirūpavyaṅgyatātparyamevaiṣāṃ locanam vyāpārāntareti /
GK16andhvc3u:3283: api tāvaditi śabdābhyāṃ duryodhanādestadvarṇanaṃ dūrāpāstamiti veṇīsaṃhāre dvitīyāṅkamevodāharaṇatvena dhvanati /
GK16andhvc3u:3288: yato rasabandha eva mukhyaḥ kavivyāpāraviṣayaḥ itivṛttamātravarṇanaprādhānye bālapriyā rāmadevaprāyasyāpi tāvadityatratyābhyāṃ tāmyāmityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3308: vṛttau prādhānye sati yadibandhanaṃ tasminniti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3310: punaścāyamanyo rasabhaṅgaheturavadhāraṇīyo yatparipoṣaṃ gatasyāpi rasasya paunaḥ--punyena dīpanam /
GK16andhvc3u:3311: ubhayukto hi rasaḥ svasāmagrīlabdhaparipoṣaḥ punaḥ punaḥ parāmṛśyamāṇaḥ parimlānakusumakalpaḥ kalpate /
GK16andhvc3u:3313: yathā nāyakaṃ prati nāyikāyāḥ kasyāściducitāṃ bhaṅgimantareṇa svayaṃ sambhogābhilāṣakathane /
GK16andhvc3u:3314: yadi vā vṛttīnāṃ bharataprasiddhānāṃ kaiśikyādīnāṃ kāvyālaṅkārāntaraprasiddhānāmupanāgarikādyānāṃ vā yadanaucityamaviṣaye nibandhanaṃ tadapi rasabhaṅgahetuḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3315: evameṣāṃ rasavirodhināmanyeṣāṃ cānayā diśā svayamutprekṣitānāṃ parihāre satkavibhiravahitairbhavitavyam /
GK16andhvc3u:3318: nīrasastu prabandho yaḥ so 'paśabdo mahān kaveḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3320: locanam sati yadaṅgāṅgibhāvarahitānāmavicāritaguṇapradhānabhāvānāṃ rasabhāvānāṃ nibandhanaṃ tannimittāni skhalitāni sarve doṣā ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3322: vyaṅgyo 'rtho bhavatu mā vā bhūt kastatrābhiniveśaḥ?
GK16andhvc3u:3324: vṛttyanaucityameva cetibahudā vyācaṣṭe tadapītyanena caśabdaṃ kārikāgataṃ vyācaṣṭe /
GK16andhvc3u:3328: nāyakasya hi dhīrodāttādibhedabhinnasya sarvathā vīrarasānuvedhena bhavitavyamiti taṃ prati kātarapuruṣocitamadhairyayojanaṃ duṣṭameva /
GK16andhvc3u:3332: nanu kālidāsaḥ bālapriyā cakārau vākyālaṅkāre ityāśayena vyācaṣṭe---itivṛttetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:3337: nāyakaṃ prati nāyakayā svayaṃ sambhogābhilāṣasya kathane nibaddhe nāyakasyādhairyayojanamāpatati,
GK16andhvc3u:3343: vṛttau 'ucitāṃ bhaṅgimantareṇe' pūrve viśṛṅkhalagiraḥ kavayaḥ prāptakīrtayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3350: bādhyānām aṅga-bhāvaṃ vā prāptānām uktir acchalā // DhvK_3.20 //
GK16andhvc3u:3354: svasāmagnyā labdhaparipoṣe tu vivakṣite rase virodhināṃ virodhirasāṅgānāṃ bādhyānāmaṅgabhāvaṃ vā prāptanāṃ satāmuktiradoṣā /
GK16andhvc3u:3355: bādhyatvaṃ hi virodhināṃ śakyābhibhavatve sati nānyathā /
GK16andhvc3u:3357: aṅgabhāvaṃ prāptānāṃ ca teṣāṃ virodhitvameva nivartate /
GK16andhvc3u:3359: tatra yeṣāṃ naisargikī teṣāṃ tāvaduktāvavirodha eva /
GK16andhvc3u:3360: yathā vipralambhaśṛṅgāre tadaṅgānāṃ locanam paripoṣaṃ gatasyāpi karuṇasya rativilāseṣu paunaḥpunyena dīpanamakārṣīt,
GK16andhvc3u:3362: na hi vasiṣṭhādibhiḥ kathañcidyadi smṛtimārgastyaktastadvayamapi tathā tyajāmaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3365: evaṃ virodhināṃ parihāre sāmānyenokte pratiprasavaṃ viyataviṣayamāha---vivakṣita itī /
GK16andhvc3u:3371: bālapriyā tyenena bhaṅgyā tatkathanaṃ duṣyantādernāyakasyeva nāyikāyā api na doṣa iti darśitam /
GK16andhvc3u:3386: tadaṅgatve ca sambhavatyapi maraṇasyopanyāso na jyāyān /
GK16andhvc3u:3388: karuṇasaya tu tathāvide viṣaye paripoṣo bhaviṣyatīti cet-na;
GK16andhvc3u:3392_1: rasabandhapradhānena kavinā locanam tatra prathamaṃ svābhāvikaprakāraṃ nirūpayati---tadaṅgānāmiti /
GK16andhvc3u:3393: nirapekṣabhāvatayā sāpekṣabhāvavapralambhaśṛṅgāravirodhinyapi karuṇe ye vyādhyādayassarvathāṅgatvena dṛṣṭāḥ teṣāmiti /
GK16andhvc3u:3394: te hi karuṇe bhavantyeva ta eva ca bhavantīti /
GK16andhvc3u:3395: śṛṅgāre tu bhavantyeva nāpi ta eveti /
GK16andhvc3u:3405: nanvevaṃ sarva eva vyabhicāriṇa iti vighaṭitamityāśaṅkyāha---śṛṅgāre veti /
GK16andhvc3u:3406: adīrghakāle yatramaraṇe viśrāntipadabandha eva notpadyate tatrāsya vyabhicāritvam /
GK16andhvc3u:3408: yadi tādṛśīṃ bhaṅgiṃ ghaṭayituṃ sukaveḥ kauśalaṃ bhavati /
GK16andhvc3u:3414: karuṇe bhavantyeva te eva bhavantīti dvedhā niyama ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3418: ālasyaugnyajugupsāvarjāssarvaṃ eva vyabhicāriṇa iti muninā uktatvādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3425: maraṇādūrdhvamadīrgho yaḥ kālastasmiṃstena vā pratyāpattiḥ nāyakayoḥ samāgamastatsambhave satītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3430_0: kāvyānuśāsane 'pyevamuktam--“śṛṅgāre tu maraṇādhyavasāyo tatra labdhapratiṣṭhe tu
GK16andhvc3u:3430_1: vivakṣite rase virodhirasāṅgānāṃ bādhyatvenoktāvadoṣo yathā--- kvākāryaṃ śaśalakṣmaṇaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:3430_2: kva ca kulaṃ bhūyo 'pi dṛśyeta sā doṣāṇāṃ praśamāya me śrutamaho kope 'pi kāntaṃ mukham /
GK16andhvc3u:3431: kiṃ vakṣyantyapakalmaṣāḥ kṛtadhiyaḥ svapne 'pi sā durlabhā cetaḥ svāsthyamupaihi kaḥ khalu yuvā dhanyo 'dharaṃ pāsyati //
GK16andhvc3u:3432: locanam pūrvākārādhikacaturayā saṅgataḥ kāntayāsau līlāgāreṣvaramata punarnandanābhyantareṣu //
GK16andhvc3u:3434: ata eva sukavinā maraṇe padabandhamātraṃ na kṛtam,
GK16andhvc3u:3436: padabandhaniveśe tu sarvathā śokodaya evātiparimitakālapratyāpattilābhe 'pi atha dūraparāmarśakasahṛdayasāmājikābhiprāyeṇa maraṇasyādīrghakālapratyāpatteraṅgatocyate,
GK16andhvc3u:3437: hanta tāpasavatsarāje 'pi yaugandharāyaṇādinītimārgākarṇanasaṃskṛtamatīnāṃ vāsavadattāmaraṇabuddherevābhāvātkaruṇasya nāmāpi na syādityalamavāntareṇa bahunā /
GK16andhvc3u:3443: bālapriyā maraṇādūrdhvaṃ jhaṭiti punaryogo vā nibadhyata'iti /
GK16andhvc3u:3452: prapūrvaślokena saṅgamāśāyā varṇitatvādatra maraṇasya vipralambhāṅgatvaṃ sphuṭamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3457: atiparimito 'lyalpaḥ kālastena pratyāpatteḥ saṅgamasya lābhaḥ sambhavaḥ pratītirvā tasminnapītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3464: ayuktakathanahetuko viṣādo vismayo vā hantetyanena prakāśyate /
GK16andhvc3u:3476: yathā vā puṇḍarīkasya mahāśvetāṃ prati pravṛttanirbharānurāgasya dvitīyamunikumāropadeśavarṇane /
GK16andhvc3u:3477: svābhāvikyāmaṅgabhāvaprāptāvadoṣo yathā--- bhramimaratimalasahṛdayatāṃ pralayaṃ mūrcchāṃ tamaḥ śarīrasādam /
GK16andhvc3u:3478: maraṇaṃ ca jaladabhujagajaṃ prasahya kurute viṣaṃ viyoginīnām //
GK16andhvc3u:3482: iyaṃ locanam vitarka autsukyena matiḥ smṛtyā śaṅkā dainyena dhṛtiścintayā ca bādhyate /
GK16andhvc3u:3488: pāṇḍukṣāmaṃ vaktraṃ hadayaṃ sarasaṃ tavālasaṃ ca vapuḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3490: atra karuṇocito vyādhiḥ śleṣabhaṅgyā sthāpitaḥ kopāditi badhveti hanyata iti ca raudrānubhāvanāṃ rūpakabalādāropitānāṃ tadanirvāhādevāṅgatvam /
GK16andhvc3u:3506: atra karuṇocatavyādheranubhāvānāṃ bhramyādīnāṃ vipralambhe 'pi sambhavānnaisargikī aṅgatā /
GK16andhvc3u:3514: kṣetriyo rogaḥ kṣayaroga iti kecit tam /
GK16andhvc3u:3517: atra karuṇocitavyādheḥ vipralambhe samāropādaṅgatetyāha locane - atretyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:3528: vṛttau aṅgabhāvagamanaṃ yadiyaṃ cāṅgabhāvaprāptiranyā yadādhikārikatvātpradhāna ekasminvākyārthe rasayorbhāvayorvā parasparavirodhinordvayoraṅgabhāvagamanaṃ tasyāmapi na doṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3532: anyaparatve 'pi virodhinoḥ kathaṃ virodhanivṛttiriti cet, ucyate--
GK16andhvc3u:3544: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ---sāmagrīviśeṣapatitatvena bhāvānāṃ virodhāvirodhau na svabhāvamātranibandhanau śītoṣṇayorapi virodhābhāvāt /
GK16andhvc3u:3546: tadeva kuru mā kārṣīriti bālapriyā cānyā aṅgabhāvaprāptiriti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3563: ayamarthaḥ---padārthānāṃ madhye kasyacitkenacitsaha virodhaścāvirodhaśca svabhāvamātrakṛtau na,
GK16andhvc3u:3565: atra tadvirodho nāma tadasāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ tadutpattipratibandhaśca ghaṭatvādīnāṃ paṭatvādibhiśśītasparśadīnāmuṇṇasparśādibhiśca sahāsāmānādhikaraṇyarūpo virodhaḥ svabhāvakṛtaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3566: evaṃ teṣāṃ dravyatvādibhiḥ rūpādiguṇaiśca saha sāmānādhikaraṇyarūpāvirodhaśca bodhyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3569: vithisthale pravṛttisāmagrīṃ niṣedhasthale nivṛttisāmagrīṃ cādāya tadanupraveśena virodhāvirodhau grāhyāviti /
GK16andhvc3u:3584: ata evātirātre ṣoḍaśinaṃ gṛhṇantīti viruddhavidhirvikalpaparyavasāyīti vākyavidaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3587: bālapriyā ata eva viruddhāyorekatraikadā prādhānyasya duṣṭatvādeva /
GK16andhvc3u:3589: atirātre atirātrayāge ṣoḍaśinaṃ somapātraviśeṣam gṛhṇanti yathā---- ehi gaccha patottiṣṭha vada maunaṃ samācara /
GK16andhvc3u:3592: atra hi vidhipratiṣedhayoranūdyamānatvena samāveśe na virodhastathehāpi bhaviṣyati /
GK16andhvc3u:3595: locanam krīḍāṅgatve na hyatra viruddhānāmarthānāmabhidhānamiti rājanikaṭavyavasthitātatāyidvayanyāyena viruddhānāmapyanyamukhaprekṣitāparatantrīkṛtānāṃ yena virodhaḥ syāt /
GK16andhvc3u:3596: kevalaṃ viruddhatvādaruṇādhikaraṇasthityā bālapriyā gṛhṇīyuḥ iti ṣoḍaśigrahaṇaṃ vihitam /
GK16andhvc3u:3597: punaśca “nātirātre ṣoḍaśinaṃ gṛhṇātī“tyanena tanniṣiddhañceti yadyapi grahaṇāgrahaṇayorviruddhayorvidhiḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:3598: tathāpi sa vidhiḥ ṣoḍaśinaṃ gṛhṇīyānna gṛhṇīyādvā iti vikalpe paryavasyatītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3606_0: atra ehīti krīḍanti gaccheti krīḍantītyādirītyā bhāvābhāvarūpayorapi gamanāgamanādyoḥ
GK16andhvc3u:3613: rājanikaṭavyavasthitau rājāśrayatvena sthitau yāvātatāthinau mitho vaireṇa vadhodyatau puruṣau tayordveyaṃ tannyāyenetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3616: autena krameṇa ehi gacchetyādiśrutikramema yaḥ svātmanāṃ parāmarśaḥ pratītaḥ tasmin satyapi /
GK16andhvc3u:3621: parasparasya yadrūpaṃ svabhāvaḥ taccintāyāṃ kā kathā taccintā nodetyevetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3626: aruṇayetyādividhivākye kārakāṇāṃ bhāvanānvayaniyamānmitho 'nanvitānāmevāruṇyapiṅgākṣītvādīnāṃ karaṇavibhaktyantapadārthānāṃ somakrayaṇabhāvanāyāṃ karaṇatvenādāvanvayaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:3627: paścāt parasparānvayaḥ--- na ca raseṣu vidhyanuvādavyavahāro nāstīti śakyaṃ vaktum,
GK16andhvc3u:3629: vākyārthasya vācyasya ca yau vidhyanuvādau tau locanam yo vākyīya eṣāṃ pāścātyaḥ sambandhaḥ sambhāvyate sa vighaṭatām /
GK16andhvc3u:3632: na ca rasasya vācyatvaṃ tvayaiva soḍhamityāśaṅkamānaḥ pariharati---na ceti /
GK16andhvc3u:3634: tau ca vyaṅgyatāyāmapi bhavata eveti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3635: mukhyatayā ca rasa eva kāvyavākyārtha ityuktam /
GK16andhvc3u:3670: dṛśyate viruddhobhayasahakāriṇaḥ kāraṇātkāryaviśeṣotpattiḥ viruddhaphalotpādanahetutvaṃ hi yugapadekasya kāraṇasya viruddhaṃ na tu viruddhobhayasahakāritvam /
GK16andhvc3u:3671: locanam yadi vā mā bhūdanūdyamānatayā viruddhayo rasayoḥ samāveśaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:3672: sahakāritayā tu bhaviṣyatīti sarvathāviruddhayoryuktiyukto 'ṅgāṅgibhāvo nātra prayāsaḥ kaściditi darśayati--yaivati /
GK16andhvc3u:3674: kāvyārtho vibhāvādirnimittaṃ yeṣāṃ rasādīnāṃ te tathā teṣāṃ bhāvastattā /
GK16andhvc3u:3675_0: anūdyamānā ye hastakṣepādayo rasāṅgabhūtā vibhāvādayastannimittaṃ yadubhayaṃ karuṇavipralambhātmakaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:3676: viruddhaṃ yadubhayaṃ vāritejogataṃ śītoṣṇaṃ tatsahakāri yasya taṇḍulādeḥ kāraṇasya tasmātkāryaviśeṣasya komalabhaktakaraṇalakṣaṇasyotpattirdṛśyate /
GK16andhvc3u:3680: nanvabhineyārthe kāvye yadīdṛśaṃ vākyaṃ bhavettadā bālapriyā anvityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:3684: anūdyamānāṅgetyādikaṃ kṣipta ityādiśloke yojayan vyācaṣṭe---anūdyamānā ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:3685: hastakṣepādayo vibhāvādaya ityatra yathāsaṃkhyenānvayo na vivakṣitaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3704_1: yaḥ karuṇo rasaḥ sa parīkṣakāṇāṃ na vaiklavyamādadhāti locanam yadi samastābhinayaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:3704_2: kriyate tadā viruddhārthaviṣayaḥ kathaṃ yugapadabhinayaḥ kartuṃ śakya ityāśayenāśaṅkamāna āha--evamiti /
GK16andhvc3u:3706: anūdyamānamevaṃvidhaṃ viruddhākāraṃ vācyaṃ yatra tādṛśo yo viṣayaḥ 'ehi gaccha patottiṣṭha' ityādistatra yā vārtā sātrāpīti /
GK16andhvc3u:3707: etaduktaṃ bhavati---'kṣipto hastāvalagna' ityādau prādhānyena bhītaviplutādidṛṣṭyupapādanakrameṇa prākariṇakastāvadarthaḥ pradarśayitavyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3708: yadyapyatra karuṇo 'pi parāṅgameva tathāpi vipralambhāpekṣayā tasya tāvannikaṭaṃ prākaraṇikatvaṃ maheśvaraprabhāvaṃ prati sopayogatvāt /
GK16andhvc3u:3710: evaṃ ca sāsranetrotpalābhiratyantaṃ prādhānyena karuṇopayogābhinayakrameṇa leśatastu vipralambhasya karuṇena sādṛśyātsūcanāṃ kṛtvā /
GK16andhvc3u:3711_0: kāmīvetyatra yadyapi praṇayakopocito 'bhinayaḥ kṛtastathāpi tataḥ pratīyamāno 'pyasau
GK16andhvc3u:3711_1: vipralambhaḥ samanantarābhinīyamāne sa dahatu duritamityādau sāṭopābhinayasamarpito
GK16andhvc3u:3717: kintu vīrasya yo 'sau krodho vyabhicāratāṃ pratipadyate tatphalarūpo 'sau karuṇarasaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3737: vaiklavyamityasya pratyuta prītyatiśayanimittatāṃ pratipadyata ityatastasya kuṇṭhaśaktikatvāttadvirodhavidhāyino na kaściddoṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3738: tasmādvākyārthībhūtasya rasasya bhāvasya vā virodhī rasavirodhīti vaktuṃ nyāyyaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:3740: locanam yathoktam--'raudrasya caiva yatkarma sa jñeyaḥ karuṇo rasaḥ' iti /
GK16andhvc3u:3742: atrodāharaṇam--- kurabaka kucāghātakrīḍāsukhena viyujyase bakulaviṭapin smartavyaṃ te mukhāsavasevanam /
GK16andhvc3u:3743: caraṇaghaṭanāśūnyo yāsyasyaśoka saśokatā- miti nijapuratyāge yasya dviṣāṃ jagaduḥ strayaḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:3745: tasmin rase sthāyinaḥ pradhānabhūtasya vyabhicāriṇo vā yathā vipralambhaśṛṅgāra autsukyasya /
GK16andhvc3u:3749: sa pādāghātādaśokastilakakuravakau vīkṣaṇālaṅganābhyām strīṇāṃ sparśātpriyaṅgurvikasati bakulaśśīdhugaṇḍūṣasekāt //
GK16andhvc3u:3771: aṅgabhūtasya kasyacidrasasya bhāvasya vā virodhī rasavirodhīti vaktuṃ na nyāyya ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3772: tathācāṅgabhūtasya kasyacidvirodhī yo lasaḥ tatsambandhiparigraho na doṣa iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3774: bhāvasya vetyatra bhāvapadena sthāyī vyabhicārī ca vivakṣita ityāha locane---tasminnityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:3777: athavā vākyārthībhūtasyāpi kasyacitkaruṇarasaviṣayasya tādṛśena śṛṅgāravastunā bhaṅgiviśeṣāśrayeṇa saṃyojanaṃ rasaparipoṣāyaiva jāyate /
GK16andhvc3u:3778: yataḥ prakṛtimadhurāḥ padārthāḥ śocaniyatāṃ prāptāḥ pragavasthābhāvibhiḥ saṃsmaryamāṇairvilāsairadhikataraṃ śokāveśamupajanayanti /
GK16andhvc3u:3779: yathā--- locanam adhunā pūrvasminneva śloke kṣipta ityādau prakārāntareṇa virodhaṃ pariharati---athaveti /
GK16andhvc3u:3781: adhunā tu sa vipralambhaḥ karuṇasyaivāṅgatāṃ pratipannaḥ kathaṃ virodhīti vyavasthāpyate---tathā hi karuṇo raso nāmeṣṭajanavinipātādervibhāvādityuktam /
GK16andhvc3u:3784: śāṃbhavaśaravahniceṣṭitāvalokane prāktanapraṇayakalahavṛttāntaḥ smaryamāṇa idānīṃ vidhvastatayā śokavibhāvatāṃ pratipadyate /
GK16andhvc3u:3787: atha veti ityasya sthāne athavetyādinā doṣābhāva ityanteneti ca pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3791: apiśabdaḥ anantaroktanītyā rasaparapoṣaṇe āpātato virodhaṃ dyotayati 'kasyacidi'ti /
GK16andhvc3u:3803: adhunā tu ityasya iti vyavasthāpyata ityanena sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3822: naṣṭatayetyarthaḥ śokavibhāvatāmityasyānantaraṃ prakṛṣṭāmiti ca kvacit pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3824: tathācātra viśiṣṭavaiśiṣṭyanyāyena vipralambhopaskṛtaḥ karuṇaḥ tripuraripuprabhāvātiśayaṃ ayaṃ sa raśanotkarṣī pīnastanavimardanaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3827: tadatra tripurayuvatīnāṃ śāmbhavaḥ śarāgnirārdrāparādhaḥ kāmī yathā vyavaharati sama tathā vyavahṛtavānityanenāpi prakāreṇāstyeva nirvirodhatvam /
GK16andhvc3u:3828: tasmādyathā yathā nirūpyate tatā tathātra doṣābhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3829: ityaṃ ca---- krāmantyaḥ kṣayakomalāṅgulivaladraktaiḥ sadarbhāḥ sthalīḥ pādaiḥ pātitayāvakairiva patadbāṣpāmbudhautānanāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3830: bhītā bhartṛkarāvalambitakarāstvadvairinārthādhunā dāvāgniṃ parito bhramanti punarapyudyadvivāhā iva //
GK16andhvc3u:3833: idānīṃ teṣāmekaprabandhaviniveśane nyāyyo yaḥ kramastaṃ pratipādayitumucyate--
GK16andhvc3u:3836: atra bhūriśravasaḥ samarabhuvi nipatitaṃ bāhuṃ dṛṣṭvā tatkāntānāmetadanuśocanam /
GK16andhvc3u:3837: raśanāṃ mekhalāṃ sambhogā vasareṣūrdhvaṃ karṣatīti rasanotkarṣī /
GK16andhvc3u:3838: amunā virodhoddharaṇaprakāreṇa bahutaraṃ lakṣyamupapāditaṃ bhavatītyabhiprāyeṇāha--itthaṃ ceti /
GK16andhvc3u:3845: bālapriyā tadālambitaṃ itibhāvaṃ vā upaskarotīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3860: eko raso 'ṅgīkartavyas teṣām utkarṣam icchatā // DhvK_3.21 //
GK16andhvc3u:3864_0: prabandheṣu mahākāvyādiṣu nāṭakādiṣu vā viprakīrṇatayāṅgāṅgibhāvena bahavo rasā upanibadhyanta
GK16andhvc3u:3864_1: ityatra prasiddhau satyāmapi yaḥ prabandhānāṃ chāyātiśayayogamicchati tena teṣāṃ
GK16andhvc3u:3864_2: rasānāmanyatamaḥ kaścidvivakṣito raso 'ṅgitvena viniveśayitavya ityayaṃ yuktataro mārgaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3865: nanu rasāntareṣu bahuṣu prāptaparipoṣeṣu satsu kathamekasyāṅgitā na virudhyata ityāśaṅkyedamucyate--
GK16andhvc3u:3872: prabandheṣu prathamataraṃ prastutaḥ san punaḥ punaranusandhīyamānatvena sthāyī yo rasastasya sakalabandhavyāpino rasāntarairantarālavartibhiḥ samāveśo yaḥ locanam prasiddhe 'piti /
GK16andhvc3u:3882_0: yadyapi ramavakārādau paryāyabandhādau ca naikasyāṅgitvaṃ tathāpi nāyuktatā tasyāpyevaṃvidho
GK16andhvc3u:3882_1: yaḥ prabandhaḥ tadyathā nāṭakaṃ mahākāvyaṃ vā tadutkṛṣṭataramiti taraśabdasyārthaḥ // 21 //
GK16andhvc3u:3885: alabdhaparipoṣatve vā kathaṃ rasatvamiti rasatvamaṅgatvaṃ cānyonyaviruddhaṃ teṣāṃ cāṅgatvāyoge kathamekasyāṅgitvamuktamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3887: prastutasya samastetivṛttavyāpinastata eva vitatavyāptikatvenāṅgibhāvocitasya bālapriyā krama ityenena teṣāmityasya sambandha ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3891: tathāpi ca tasyāpi nāyuktatā iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3903: kāryam ekaṃ yathā vyāpi prabandhasya vidhīyate /
