GK16andhvc3u:3904: tathā rasasyāpi vidhau virodho naiva vidyate // DhvK_3.23 //
GK16andhvc3u:3907: tathā rasasyāpi vidhau virodho naiva vidyate // 23 //
GK16andhvc3u:3908: locanam rasasya rasāntarairitivṛttavaśāyātatvena parimitakathāśakalavyāpibhiryaḥ samāveśaḥ samupabṛṃhaṇaṃ sa tasya sthāyitvenetivṛttavyāpitayā bhāsamānasya nāṅgitāmupahanti,
GK16andhvc3u:3910: etaduktaṃ bhavati---aṅgabhūtānyapi rasāntarāṇi svavibhāvādisāmagnyā svāvasthāyāṃ yadyapi labdhaparipoṣāṇi camatkāragocaratāṃ pratipadyante,
GK16andhvc3u:3911: tathāpi sa camatkārastāvatyeva na parituṣya viśrāmyati kiṃ tu camatkārāntaramanudhāvati /
GK16andhvc3u:3913: yathāha tatrabhavān--- guṇaḥ kṛtātmasaṃskāraḥ pradhānaṃ pratipadyate /
GK16andhvc3u:3924: tathaiva tenaiva prakāreṇa kāryāṅgāṅgibhāvarūpeṇa rasānāmapi balādevāsāvāpatatītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3927: 'svalpamātraṃ samutsṛṣṭaṃ bahudhā yadvisarpati' iti lakṣitaṃ bījam /
GK16andhvc3u:3929: 'kathamekasyāṅgitā na' ityasya sthāne ekasyāṅgiteti pāṭhaśca dṛśyate /
GK16andhvc3u:3935: anyena kṛtātmasaṃskāraḥ san tathā kṛtātmasaṃskāraḥ guṇaḥ pradhānasya aṅginaḥ bhūyasi upakāre vartate bhūyase upakārāya bhavati hi /
GK16andhvc3u:3951: sandhyādimayasya prabandhaśarīrasya yathā kāryamekamanuyāyi vyāpakaṃ kalpyate na ca tatkāryāntarairna saṅkīryate,
GK16andhvc3u:3952: na ca taiḥ saṅkīryamāṇasyāpi tasya prādhānyamapacīyate,
GK16andhvc3u:3953: tathaiva rasasyāpyekasya sanniveśe kriyamāṇe virodho na kaścit /
GK16andhvc3u:3954: pratyuta pratyuditavivekānāmanusandhānavatāṃ sacetasāṃ tathāvidhe viṣaye prahlādātiśayaḥ pravartate /
GK16andhvc3u:3955_0: nanu yeṣāṃ rasānāṃ parasparāvirodhaḥ yathā---vīraśṛṅgārayoḥ śṛṅgārahāsyayo locanam
GK16andhvc3u:3955_1: bājātprabhṛti prayojanānāṃ vicchede yadavicchedakāraṇaṃ yāvatsamāptibandhaṃ sa tu
GK16andhvc3u:3955_2: binduḥ' iti bindurūpayārthaprakṛtyā nirvahaṇaparyantaṃ vyāpnoti tadāha---anuyāyīti /
GK16andhvc3u:3958_1: kāryaṃ yāni ca tato 'pyūnavyāptitayā prakarīlakṣaṇāni kāryāṇi tairityevaṃ pañcānāmarthaprakṛtīnāṃ
GK16andhvc3u:3961: evamanena ślokenāṅgāṅgitāyāṃ dṛṣṭāntanirūpaṇamitivṛttabalāpatitatvaṃ ca rasāṅgāṅgibhāvasyeti dvayaṃ nirūpitam /
GK16andhvc3u:3985: aṅgāṅgitāyāṃ dṛṣṭāntanirūpaṇaṃ rasāṅgāṅgibhāvasya itivṛttabalāpatitatvaṃ ceti dvayamanena ślokena nirūpitamiti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3992: teṣāṃ tu sa kathaṃ bhavedyeṣāṃ parasparaṃ bādhyabādhakabhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3997: yathāha muniḥ--'vīrasya caiva yatkarma so 'dbhutaḥ' iti /
GK16andhvc3u:3999: raudrakaruṇayorapi muninaivoktaḥ---- 'raudrasyaiva ca yatkarma sa jñeyaḥ karuṇo rasaḥ' iti /
GK16andhvc3u:4003_1: ca ratiruttiṣṭhati tataḥ palāyamānarūpatayā jugupseti samānāśrayatvena tayoranyonyasaṃskāronmūlanatvam /
GK16andhvc3u:4005: śāntasyāpi tattvajñānasamutthitasamastasaṃsāraviṣayanirvedaprāṇatvena sarvato nirīhasvabhāvasya viṣayāsaktijīvitābhyāṃ ratikrodhābhyāṃ virodha eva // 23 //
GK16andhvc3u:4042: paripoṣaṃ na netavyas tathā syād avirodhitā // DhvK_3.24 //
GK16andhvc3u:4046: aṅgini rasāntare śṛṅgārādau prabandhavyaṅgye sati avirodhī virodhī vā rasaḥ paripoṣaṃna netavyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4047: tatrāvirodhino rasasyāṅgirasāpekṣayātyantamādhikyaṃ na kartavyamityayaṃ prathamaḥ paripoṣaparihāraḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4050: vāgrahaṇasyāyamabhiprāyaḥ---aṅgirasāpekṣayā yasya rasāntarasyotkarṣo nibadhyate tadā tadaviruddho 'pi raso nibaddhaścodyāvahaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4051: atha tu yuktyā ṅgini raso 'ṅgabhāvatānayenopapattirghaṭate tadviruddho 'pi raso vakṣyamāṇena viṣayabhedādiyojanenopanibadhyamāno na doṣāvaha iti virodhāvirodhāvakiñcitkarau /
GK16andhvc3u:4054: aṅginaṃ rasaviśeṣamanādṛtya paripoṣaparihāre trīn prakārānāha--tatretyādinā tṛtīya ityantena /
GK16andhvc3u:4055: nanu nyūnatvaṃ kartavyamiti vācye ādhikyasya kā sambhāvanā yenoktamādhikyaṃna kartavyamityāśaṅkyāha--utkarṣasāmya iti /
GK16andhvc3u:4057: snehena raṇarasena ca bhaṭasya dolāyitaṃ hṛdayam //
GK16andhvc3u:4075: tatrāvirodhino rasasyāṅgirasāpekṣayā nyūnatvaṃ kartavyamiti vaktavye satītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4087: tasyāṃ yā abhyasūyā tayā hetunā hasitaḥ paśupattiḥ sandhyāṃ sevamānaḥ parameśvaro yayā sā /
GK16andhvc3u:4092: ṇeheṇa raṇaraseṇa a bhaḍassa dolāiaṃ hiaam //
GK16andhvc3u:4093: yathā vā-- kaṇṭhācchittvākṣamālāvalayamiva kare hāramāvartayantī kṛtvā paryaṅkabandhaṃ viṣadharapatinā mekhalāyā guṇena /
GK16andhvc3u:4102: etacca muktakaviṣayameva bhavati na tu prabandhaviṣayamiti kecidāhustaccāsat ;
GK16andhvc3u:4104: tathāhi---ratnāvalyāṃ sacivāyattasiddhitvābhiprāyeṇa pṛthivīrājyalābha ādhikārikaṃ phalaṃ kanyāratnalābhaḥ prāsaṅgikaṃ phalaṃ,
GK16andhvc3u:4105: nāyakabhiprāyeṇa tu viparyaya iti sthite mantribuddhau nāyakabuddhau ca svāmyamātyabuddhyekatvātphalamiti nītyā ekīkriyamāṇāyāṃ samaprādhānyameva paryavasyati /
GK16andhvc3u:4116: atra prakṛto raso vīraḥ bhaṭasyetyuktabalādgamyaḥ samaprādhānyena varṇitastadavirodhī śṛṅgāraḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:4117: kaṇṭhādityādau tu prakṛto raso vipralambhaḥ tadavirodhīhāsyassamaprādhānyena darśitaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4123: trivargarūpaṃ yat phalaṃ tasya samaprādhānyaṃ yattasyetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4129: aṅgatvena punaḥ punaḥ pratyavekṣā paripoṣaṃ nīyamānasyāpyaṅgabhūtasya rasasyeti tṛtīyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4132: yathā śānte 'ṅgini śṛṅgārasya śṛṅgāre vā śāntasya /
GK16andhvc3u:4134: aṅgino hi rasasya locanam rasa iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4135: nanvevaṃ nāsau parituṣṭo bhavedityāśaṅkya matāntaramāha--niveśane veti /
GK16andhvc3u:4136: ata eva vāgrahaṇamuttarapakṣadārḍhyaṃ sūcayati na vikalpam /
GK16andhvc3u:4140_0: yathā---'kopātkomalalola' iti śloke 'ṅgibhūtāyāṃ ratāvaṅgatvena yaḥ krodha upanibaddhastatra
GK16andhvc3u:4140_1: baddhvā dṛḍhaṃ ityamarṣasya niveśitasya kṣiprameva rudatyeti hasanniti ca ratyuciterṣyautsukyaharṣānusandhānam /
GK16andhvc3u:4142: atra ca tāpasavatsarāje vatsarājasya pajhavatīviṣayaḥ sambhogaśṛṅgāra udāharaṇokartavyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4144: vibhāvānubhāvānāṃ cāpi utkarṣo na kartavyo 'ṅgirasavirodhināṃ niveśanameva vā na kāryam,
GK16andhvc3u:4146: paripoṣitā api viruddharasavibhāvānubhāvā aṅgatvaṃ pratijāgarayitavyā ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:4148: evaṃ virodhyavirodhisādhāraṇaṃ prakāramabhidhāya virodhiviṣayā sādhāraṇadoṣaparihāraprakāragatatvenaiva viśeṣāntaramapyāha---virodhina bālapriyā ratāvaṅgatveneti /
GK16andhvc3u:4163: aṅgirasasya ye vibhāvānu bhāvāḥ tadekarūpaṃ sat tadekarūpatāṃ sampādyetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4165: aṅgatvaṃ pratijāgarayitavyāḥ aṅgatāṃ netavyāḥ virodhyavirodhisādhāraṇaṃ prakāramiti /
GK16andhvc3u:4168: virodhiviṣayaḥ asādhāraṇaśca yo doṣaparihāraprakāraḥ tadgatatvena tatsambandhitvenetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4172: bahuraseṣu prabandheṣvekasya rasasya āpekṣikametatprakarṣa yogitvamaśakyapratikṣepamiti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4178_1: prakāreṇāvirodhināṃ virodhināṃ ca rasānāmaṅgāṅgibhāvena samāveśeprabandheṣu syādavirodhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4179: etacca sarvaṃ yeṣāṃ raso rasāntarasa vyabhicārībhavati iti darśanaṃ locanam iti /
GK16andhvc3u:4185_0: tadabhāve ca kathamaṅgāṅgitetyapi yeṣāṃ mataṃ tairapi kasyacidrasasya prakṛṣṭatvaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:4186: bhūyaḥ prabandhavyāpakasya ca rasasya rasāntarairyadi na kācitsaṅgatistaditivṛttasyāpi na syātsaṅgatiścedayamevopakāryopakārakabhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4187: na ca catmakāraviśrāntervirodhaḥ kaściditi samanantaramevoktaṃ tadāha--anabhyupagacchatāpīti /
GK16andhvc3u:4190: anyastu vyācaṣṭe--etaccāpekṣikamityādigrantho dvitīyamatamabhipretya yatra rasānāmupakāryopakārakatā nāsti,
GK16andhvc3u:4192: etaccāsat; evaṃ hi etacca sarvamiti sarvaśabdena ya upasaṃhāra ekapakṣaviṣayaḥ bālapriyā ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4233: etatpakṣaviṣaya locanam matāntare 'pītyādinā ca yo dvitīyapakṣopakramaḥ so 'tīva duḥśliṣṭa ityalaṃ pūrvavaṃśyaiḥ saha bahunā saṃlāpena /
GK16andhvc3u:4235: bhāvādhyāyasamāptāvasti ślokaḥ--- bahūnāṃ samavetānāṃ rūpaṃ yasya bhavedbahu /
GK16andhvc3u:4236: sa mantavyo rasasthāyī śeṣāḥ sañcāriṇo matāḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:4238_1: tu vyabhicāritayeti rasyamānatāsamaye sthāyivyabhicāribhāvasya na kaścidvirodha iti kecidvyācacakṣire /
GK16andhvc3u:4240: anye tu sthāyitayā paṭhitasyāpi rasasya rasāntare vyabhicāritvamasti,
GK16andhvc3u:4241: yathā krodhasya vīre vyabhicāritayā paṭhitasyāpi sthāyitvameva rasāntare,
GK16andhvc3u:4243: vyabhicāriṇo vā sata eva vyabhicāryantarāpekṣyā sthāyitvameva,
GK16andhvc3u:4244: yathā vikramorvaśyāmunmādasya caturthe 'ṅke itīyantamarthamavabodhayitumayaṃ ślokaḥ bahunāṃ cittavṛttirūpāṇāṃ bhāvānāṃ madhye yasya bahulaṃ rūpaṃ yathopalabhyate sa sthāyī bhāvaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:4248: ata evānye rasasthāyīti ṣaṣṭhyā saptamyā dvitīyayā vāśritādiṣu bālapriyā iti ca pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4258: saḥ sthāyī raso mantavya iti yojanā /
GK16andhvc3u:4262: tatroktakrameṇa tasmin śloke ukto yaḥ kramastena /
GK16andhvc3u:4276: saḥ sthāyī rasaśca mantavya iti yojanā /
GK16andhvc3u:4286: rasasya rase rasaṃ sthāyīti vigraha iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4288: matāntare tu rasānāṃ sthāyino bhāvā upacārādrasaśabdenoktāsteṣāmaṅgatvaṃ nirvirodhameva /
GK16andhvc3u:4289: evamavirodhināṃ virodhināṃ ca prabandhasthenāṅginā rasena samāveśe sādhāraṇamavirodhopāyaṃ pratipādyedānīṃ virodhiviṣayameva taṃ pratipādayitumidamucyate /
GK16andhvc3u:4291: viruddhaikāśrayo yas tu virodhī sthāyino bhavet /
GK16andhvc3u:4292: sa vibhinnāśrayaḥ kāryas tasya poṣe 'py adoṣatā // DhvK_3.25 //
GK16andhvc3u:4298: tatra prabandhasthena sthāyināṅginā rasenaucityāpekṣayā viruddhaikāśrayo yo virodhī yathā vīreṇa bhayānakaḥ sa vibhinnāśrayaḥ kāryaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4299: tasya vīrasya ya āśrayaḥ kathānāyakastadvipakṣaviṣaye sanniveśayitavyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4300: tathā sati ca tasya virodhino 'pi yaḥ paripoṣaḥ sa nirdeṣaḥ vipakṣaviṣaye hi bhayātiśayavarṇane locanam gamigāmyādīnāmiti samāsaṃ paṭhanti /
GK16andhvc3u:4308: yastu sthāyīṃ sthāyyantareṇāsaṃbhāvyamānaikāśrayatvādvirodhī bhavedyathotsāhena bhayaṃ sa vibhinnāśrayatvena nāyakavipakṣādigāmitvena kāryaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4310: tasya virodhino 'pi tathākṛtasya tathānibaddhasya bālapriyā āśritādiṣu gamyādīnāmiti /
GK16andhvc3u:4330: evamaikādhikaraṇyavirodhinaḥ prabandhasthena sathāyinā rasenāṅgabhāvagamane nirvirodhitvaṃ yathā tathā taddarśitam /
GK16andhvc3u:4338: yaḥ punarekādhikaraṇatve nirvirodho nairantarye tu virodhī sa rasāntakhyavadhānena locanam paripuṣṭatāyāḥ pratyuta nirdeṣatā nāyakotkarṣādhānāt /
GK16andhvc3u:4344: ekāśrayatve 'pi sambhavati kaścinni rantaratvena nirvyavadhānatvena virodhī,
GK16andhvc3u:4347: 'samutthite dhanurdhvanau bhayāvahe kirīṭino mahānuplavo 'bhavatpure purandaradviṣām' ityādinā // 25 //
GK16andhvc3u:4373_0: locanam nimittena yo nirdeṣaḥ na virodhī kiṃ tu nirantaratvena nimittena virodhameti
GK16andhvc3u:4373_1: sa tathāvidhaviruddharasadvayāvaruddhena rasāntareṇa madhye niveśitena yuktaḥ kārya iti kārikārthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4378_0: tatra hi--'rāgasyāspadamityavaimi na hi me dhvaṃsīti na pratyayaḥ' ityādinopakṣepātprabhṛti
GK16andhvc3u:4387: parārthaṃ yaccharīravitaraṇaṃ tadātmakaṃ yannirvahaṇaṃ tatparyanta ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4392: krameṇa yaḥ prasaraḥ ratirūpaśṛṅgārasya nāyake prasaraṇaṃ tasya sambhāvanārūpo ya abhaprāyastenetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4395: nirdeṣadarśanāḥ kanyakā ityuktyā vaktari ratyanāvirbhāvaprakāśanāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4398: yadvā cittavṛttīnāṃ prasaro yeṣu viṣayeṣu teṣu yatprasaṃkhyānaṃ doṣadarśanaṃ,
GK16andhvc3u:4403: nimittaṃ dharmādinaimittikaṃ dharmādikāraṇaṃ sthūladehādi tayoḥ prasaṅgena sambandhena /
GK16andhvc3u:4405: 'naṭavadvyavatiṣṭhate' yathā naṭo vividhaṃ rūpaṅgṛhītvā vyavaharati tathā devādiśarīraṃ gṛhītvā vyavaharati /
GK16andhvc3u:4411: śāntaśca tṛṣṇākṣayasuravasya yaḥ paripoṣastallakṣaṇo rasaḥ pratīyata eva /
GK16andhvc3u:4412: tathā coktam--- yacca kāmasukhaṃ loke yacca divyaṃ mahatsukham /
GK16andhvc3u:4414: locanam mitrāvasoḥ praviṣṭasya malayavatīnirgamanakāriṇaḥ 'saṃsarpadbhiḥ samantāt' ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:4416: nanu nāstyeva śānto rasaḥ tasya tu sthāyyeva nopadiṣṭo muninetyāśaṅkyāha--śāntaśceti /
GK16andhvc3u:4417: tṛṣṇānāṃ viṣayābhilāṣāṇāṃ yaḥ kṣayaḥ sarvato nivṛttirūpo nirvedaḥ tadeva sukhaṃ tasya sthāyibhūtasya yaḥ paripoṣo rasyamānatākṛtastadeva lakṣaṇaṃ yasya sa śānto rasaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4420: anye tu sarvacittavṛttipraśama evāsya sthāyīti manyante /
GK16andhvc3u:4423: bālapriyā kāmāditattatpuruṣārthalābhaḥ krameṇaiva bhavatītyaṃśe upaṣṭambhakamidaṃ vacanamiti bodhyam /
GK16andhvc3u:4437: nivṛttaḥ bhojanādyaśeṣaviṣayāyā icchāyāḥ prasaro yataḥ puruṣāttasya bhāvastatvaṃ tasya kāle prasarakāle iti vā pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4442: sarvāsāṃ cittavṛttīnāṃ ratyādirūpāṇāṃ praśamaḥ prakarṣeṇa śama ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4446: sarvacittavṛttipraśama ityanena sarvāsāṃ cittavṛttīnāmabhāvasya vivakṣaṇedoṣaṃ darśayannāha--tṛṣṇetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:4447: tṛṣṇānāṃ sarvāsāṃ cittavṛttīnāṃ sadbhāvasya prasarasya yaḥ prasajyapratiṣedho 'tyantābhāvastadrūpatve /
GK16andhvc3u:4457: tathā tṛṣṇākṣayapadasya sarvañcittavṛttipraśamapadasya vā sarvacittavṛttivirodhī locanam anye tu--- svaṃ svaṃ nimittamāsādya śāntādbhāvaḥ pravartate /
GK16andhvc3u:4459: iti bharatavākyaṃ dṛṣṭavantaḥ sarvarasasāmānyasvābhāvaṃ śāntamācakṣaṇā anupajātaviśeṣāntaracittavṛttirūpaṃ śāntasya sthāyibhāvaṃ manyante /
GK16andhvc3u:4467: na ca tadīyā paryantāvasthā varṇanīyā yena sarvaceṣṭoparamādanubhāvābhāvenāpratīyamānatā syāt /
GK16andhvc3u:4469: tacchidreṣu pratyayāntarāṇa saṃskārebhyaḥ' bālapriyā cittavṛttiviśeṣo yadi vivakṣitastadeti yāvat /
GK16andhvc3u:4474: asmātpūrvo 'yaṃ ślokaḥ--- bhāvā vikārā ratyādyāḥ śāntastu prakṛtarmataḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4483: anupajātaviśeṣā bāhyavanitādiviṣayaviśeṣānāśrayā āntarī ātmaviṣayikā ca yā cittavṛttiḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:4490: pakṣasyāsya sarvacittavṛtitiprāgabhāve paryavasānamasmatpakṣasya tu sarvacittavṛttipradhvaṃsābhāva iti viśeṣa ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4499: janmanaḥ adarśanāt yato janma na bhavati,
GK16andhvc3u:4506: ceṣṭoparamādayo hi śāntasyānubhāvā vaktavyāste ca na prayogayogyāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4517: pūrvabhūmau tu śāntasyāpi janakādeśceṣṭā dṛṣṭeveti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4518_0: cittasya kṣiptādyā locanam ita sūtradvayanītyā citrākārā yamaniyamādiceṣṭā rājyadhurodvahanādalakṣaṇā
GK16andhvc3u:4519: nanu na pratīyate nāsya vibhāvāḥ santīta cet--na;
GK16andhvc3u:4525: nanu pratīyate sarvasya ślāghāspadaṃ na bhavati /
GK16andhvc3u:4526: tarhi vītarāgāṇaṃ śṛṅgāro na bālapriyā nānāvasthāḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:4531: atrādyasyeyaṃ bhojavṛttiḥ-- “tasya cetasaḥ uktānnirodhasaṃskārāt praśāntavāhitā bhavati parihṛtavikṣepatayā sadṛśapravāhapariṇāma cittaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ” iti /
GK16andhvc3u:4534: asyāpīyaṃ bhojavṛttiḥ---“tasmin samādhau sthitasya chidrevyantarāleṣu yāni pratyayāntarāṇi vyutthānarūpāṇi jñānāni tāni,
GK16andhvc3u:4535: prāgbhūtebhyo vyutthānānubhavajebhyaḥ saṃskārebhyaḥ ahaṃ mametyevaṃrūpāṇi kṣīyamāṇebhyo 'pi bhavanti” iti /
GK16andhvc3u:4540: atra samādhikāle yamādiceṣṭā vyatthānakāle rājyadhurodvahanādiceṣṭeti vibhāgaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4545: yamaniyamādīnāṃ yogāṅgānāṃ madhye antare sambhāvyamānāḥ bhūyāṃsaśca ye vyabhicāriṇaḥ matidhṛtismṛtyādayaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:4557: prāktanānāṃ kuśalānāṃ satkarmaṇāṃ paripākaḥ tathā parameśvarānugrahaḥ tathādhyātmarahasyaśāstreṣu vedāntādiṣu bītarāgeṣu ca pariśīlanaṃ tadādibhirityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4574: asau dharmapradhāno yadi nāma sarvajanānabhavagocaratā tasya nāsti naitāvatāsāvalokasāmānyamahānubhāvacittavṛttiviśeṣaḥ pratikṣeptuṃ śakya- /
GK16andhvc3u:4575: na ca vīre tasyāntarbhāvaḥ kartaṃ yukta- /
GK16andhvc3u:4578: tayoścaivaṃvidhaviśeṣasadbhāve 'pi yadyaikyaṃ locanam ślādhya iti so 'pi rasatvāccyavatāmiti tadāha--yada nāmeti /
GK16andhvc3u:4579: nanu dharmapradhāno 'sau vīra eveti sambhāvayamāna āha--na ceti /
GK16andhvc3u:4589: nanvevaṃ dayāvīro dharmavīro dānavīro vā nāsau kaścit,
GK16andhvc3u:4591: tathā hi muniḥ-- dānavīraṃ dharmavīraṃ yuddhavīraṃ tathaiva ca /
GK16andhvc3u:4599: 'tasya' śāntasya na ca yukta iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4606: evaṃvidha ityādi sarvaṃ sādhayituṃ śaknomītyādi buddhireva prāṇā jīvitaṃ yasya sa ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4632: itarathā tu vīraprabhedatvamiti vyavasthāpyamāne na kaścidvirodhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4634: tasya cāviruddharasavyavadhāne prabandhe virodhirasasamāveśe satyapi nirvirodhatvam /
GK16andhvc3u:4639: sā tvasya vyabhicāriṇī bhavati na tu sthāyitāmeti,
GK16andhvc3u:4641: ādhikārikatvena tu śānto raso na nibaddhavyaiti candrikākāraḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4652: 'dayāvīrādīnāṃ ce' tītyasyānantaraṃ viṣayetyādeḥ pūrvamādigrahaṇeneti pāṭhaḥ sarveṣu dṛṣṭagrantheṣu dṛśyate,
GK16andhvc3u:4653: tasya ca viṣayetyādinā sambandho na ghaṭate cāto 'tra dharmavīradānavīrayorgrahaṇamiti pūraṇīyam /
GK16andhvc3u:4654: yadi vā tathā granthe paṭhanīyamiti bodhyam /
GK16andhvc3u:4679: vahutaraṃ yathā tathā kṛtanirṇayau kṛtavicārau pūrvapakṣasiddhāntau yasya saḥ // 26 //
GK16andhvc3u:4683: nivartate hi rasayoḥ samāveśe virodhitā // DhvK_3.27 //
GK16andhvc3u:4721_1: śṛṅgāra iti tayoḥ kathamekālambanakatmarūpaikāśrayatvamiti śaṅkāṃ pariharannāha--svetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:4725: atra hi śṛṅgārabībhatsayostadaṅgayorvā vīrarasavyavadhānena samāveśo na virodhī /
GK16andhvc3u:4728: viśeṣatas tu śṛṅgāre sukumāratamā hy asau // DhvK_3.28 //
GK16andhvc3u:4732: yathoktalakṣaṇānusāreṇa virodhāvirodhau sarveṣu raseṣu prabandhe 'nyatra ca nirūpayetsahṛdayaḥ;
GK16andhvc3u:4734: sa hi ratapāripoṣātmakatvādrateśca locanam anyathā vibhinnaviṣayatvātko virodhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4735: nanu vīra evātra raso na śṛṅgāro na bībhatsaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:4736: kintu ratijugupase hi vīraṃ prati vyabhicārībhūte /
GK16andhvc3u:4742: 'vīrāḥ svadehān' ityādinā tadīyotsāhādyavagatyā kartṛkarmaṇoḥ samastavākyārthānuyāyitayā pratītiriti madhyapāṭhābhāve 'pi sutarāṃ vīrasya vyavadhāyakateti bhāvaḥ // 27 //
GK16andhvc3u:4748: tathā ca svarlalanāgatasya śṛṅgārasya bībhatsasya ca dehadvayaikyābhimānī vīra eka eva viṣaya iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4751: sāhasena raṇamadhyanipātanādyanubhāvenākṣepalabhyagarvādisañcāriṇā ca vīrarasa eva pratīyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4761: atra vākyaṃ padasamudāyaḥ bhūroṇvityādivākyārthānvayitayā karmaṇaḥ na vetyādivākyārthānvayitayā kartuśca pratītirityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4765: na vetyādiviśeṣaṇārthabodhe śṛṅgārastadviśeṣyārthabodhe vīraścāsvādyata iti rītyā vīrasya madhye madhye āsvādaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4767: yojana yā bodhe tvādau śṛṅgāra iti // 27 //
GK16andhvc3u:4769: 'sukumāratamo hi svalpenāpi nimittena bhaṅgasambhavātsukumāratamaḥ sarvebhyo rasebhyo manāgapi virodhisamāveśaṃ na sahate /
GK16andhvc3u:4772: bhavet tasmin pramādo hi jhaṭity evopalakṣyate // DhvK_3.29 //
GK16andhvc3u:4776: tatraiva ca rase sarvebhyo 'pi rasemyaḥ saukumāryātiśayayogini kaviravadhānavān prayatnavānsyāt /
GK16andhvc3u:4777: tatra hi pramādyatastasya sahṛdayamadhye kṣipramevāvajñānaviṣayatā bhavati /
GK16andhvc3u:4778: śṛṅgāraraso hi saṃsāriṇāṃ niyamenānubhavaviṣayatvātsarvarasebhyaḥ kamanīyatayā pradhānabhūtaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4786: locanam tato 'pi karuṇastato 'pi śṛṅgāra iti tamapratyayaḥ // 28-29 //
GK16andhvc3u:4790: śṛṅgārasya viruddhā ye śāntādayasteṣvapi tadaṅgānāṃ śṛṅgārāṅgānāṃ sambandhī sparśo na duṣṭaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4791: tayā bhaṅgyā rasāntaragatā api vibhāvānubhāvādyā varṇanīyā yayā śṛṅgārāṅgabhāvamupāgaman /
GK16andhvc3u:4792: yathā mamaiva stotre--- tvāṃ candracūḍaṃ sahasā spṛśantī prāṇaiśvaraṃ gāḍhaviyogataptā /
GK16andhvc3u:4794: bālapriyā sa' iti kārikāpāṭhābhiprāyeṇa vyācaṣṭe---sa hītyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:4804: yayā bhaṅgyā varṇanayā śṛṅgāravibhāvāditvaṃ prāpnuvanto bhavantītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4806: gāḍhaviyogena gāḍhaṃ gāḍhena vā tvadasparśena taptā saṃsāratāpamanubhavantī /
GK16andhvc3u:4807_0: sā viṣayāntarasañcāriṇī me saṃvit antaḥkaraṇaṃ tadvṛttirvātvāṃ spṛśantī kiñcidviṣayīkurvāṇā
GK16andhvc3u:4807_2: śṛṅgārāṅgānāṃ yaḥ sa na kevalamavirodhalakṣaṇayoge sati na duṣyati yāvadvineyānunmukhīkartuṃ
GK16andhvc3u:4807_3: kāvyaśobhārthameva vā kriyamāṇo na duṣyati yāvadvineyānunmukhīkartuṃ kāvyaśobhārthameva
GK16andhvc3u:4808: śṛṅgārarasāṅgairunmukhīkṛtāḥ santo hi vineyāḥ sukhaṃ vinayopadeśān gṛhṇanti /
GK16andhvc3u:4809: sadācāropadeśarūpā hi nāṭakādigoṣṭhī locanam ityatra śāntavibhāvānubhāvānāmapi śṛṅgārabhaṅgyā nirūpaṇam /
GK16andhvc3u:4810: vineyānunmukhīkartuṃ yā kāvyaśobhā tadarthaṃ naiva duṣyatīti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4815: vineyānunmukhīkartuṃ yā kāvyaśobhā tadarthamapi vā viruddhasamāveśaḥ na kevalaṃ pūrvoktaiḥ prakāraiḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:4820: nanu kāvyaṃ krīḍārūpaṃ kva ca vedādigocarā upadeśakathā ityāśaṅkyāha--sadācāreti /
GK16andhvc3u:4825: yadvā--vilīyāpi vilīyate dravībhūyāpi atyantaṃ drutā bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4826: bhaktānāṃ cittadrutiḥ prasiddhā putrikāpakṣe tu candrakarasparśena kiñcidārdrībhūya punassarvāvayavāvacchedenārdrībhavatītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4851: anyavyākhyānañca vineyānunmukhīkartuṃ vā kāvyaśobhārthaṃ veti vikalpaparaṃ bodhyam /
GK16andhvc3u:4854: kiṃ ca śṛṅgārasya sakalajanamanoharābhirāmatvāttadaṅgasamāveśaḥ kāvyeśobhātiśayaṃ puṣyatītyanenāpi prakāreṇa virodhini rase śṛṅgārāṅgasamāveśo na virodhī /
GK16andhvc3u:4855: tataśca satyaṃ manoramā rāmāḥ satyaṃ ramyā vibhūtayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4859: etacca prabhumitrasammitebhyaḥ śāstretihāsebhyaḥ prītapūrvakaṃ jāyāsammitatvena nāṭyakāvyagataṃ vyutpattikāratvaṃ pūrvameva nirūpitamasmābhiriti na punaruktabhayādiha likhitam /
GK16andhvc3u:4867: atra hi śāntavibhāve sarvasyānityatve varṇyamāne na kasyacidvibhāvasya śṛṅgārabhaṅgyā nibandhaḥ kṛtaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:4868: kiṃ tu satyamiti bālapriyā tatra sukhamityetadvyācaṣṭe--rañjaneti /
GK16andhvc3u:4879: śobhāyā atiśayo yeneti vyutpattimabhipretya prakṛtānuguṇaṃ vyācaṣṭe--alaṅkāretyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:4882: 'rāmāḥ' ramaṇyaḥ kāmā iti ca pāṭhaḥ 'vibhūtayaḥ' aiśvaryāṇi /
GK16andhvc3u:4884: mattā yauvanādimadayuktāyā aṅganā praśastāṅgā nārī tasyāḥ apāṅgabhaṅgaḥ kaṭākṣa- sa iva lolamasthiram /
GK16andhvc3u:4886: rāmādīnāṃ manoramatve 'pi satyeva jāvite janaiḥ svopabhoghāyopādeyāstāḥ jīvitaṃ cāsthiramiti kiḍkṛtaṃ tāsāmupādeyatvamato ramyatve 'pi tāssarvā niṣphalā eveti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4897: viṣayaṃ sukaviḥ kāvyaṃ kurvan muhyati na kvacit // DhvK_3.31 //
GK16andhvc3u:4900: viṣayaṃ sukaviḥ kāvyaṃ kurvanmuhyati na kvacit // 31 //
GK16andhvc3u:4901_0: itthamanenānantaroktena prakāreṇa rasādīnāṃ rasabhāvatadābhāsānāṃ parasparaṃ virodhasyāvirodhasya
GK16andhvc3u:4901_1: ca viṣayaṃ vijñāya sukaviḥ kāvyaviṣaye pratibhātiśayayuktaḥ kāvyaṃ kurvatra kvacinmuhmati /
GK16andhvc3u:4902: evaṃ rasādiṣu virodhāvirodhanirūpaṇasyopayogitvaṃ pratipādya vyañjakavācyavācakanirūpaṇasyāpi tadviṣayasya tatpratipādyate--
GK16andhvc3u:4904: vācyānāṃ vācakānāṃ ca yad aucityena yojanam /
GK16andhvc3u:4911: api tu yasya kṛte sarvamabhyarthyate tadevedaṃ calamiti;
GK16andhvc3u:4912_1: lolatāyāmupamānatoktati priyatamākaṭākṣo hi sarvasyābhilaṣaṇīya iti ca tatprītyā
GK16andhvc3u:4912_2: pravṛttimān guḍajihvikayā prasaktānuprasaktavastutattvasaṃvedanena vairāgye paryavasyati vineyaḥ // 3.0 //
GK16andhvc3u:4914: rasādiṣu rasādiviṣaye vyañjakāni yāni vācyāni vibhāvādīni vācakāni ca suptiṅādīni teṣāṃ yannirūpaṇaṃ tasyeti /
GK16andhvc3u:4928: sambhāvyamānena nāyakavibhāvatvena nāyikānubhāvatvena ca hetunā śṛṅgārāṅgasyetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4934: tathā ca yayā kayāpi vidhayā śṛṅgārāṅgayojanaṃ kāvyaśobhākaramiti bhāvaḥ // 3.0 //
GK16andhvc3u:4937: 'vyañjakavācye'tyādigranthaṃ vācyānāmitivṛttaviśeṣāṇāṃ vācakānāṃ ca tadviṣayāṇāṃ rasādiviṣayeṇaucityena yadyojanametanmahākaverbhukhyaṃ karma /
GK16andhvc3u:4938: ayameva hi mahākavermukhyo vyāpāro yadrasādīneva mukhyatayā kāvyārthīkṛtya tadyvaktyanuguṇatvena śabdānāmarthānāṃ copanibandhanam /
GK16andhvc3u:4939: etacca rasāditātparyeṇa kāvyanibandhanaṃ bharatādāvapi suprasiddhameveti pratipādayitumāha--
GK16andhvc3u:4942: aucityavānyastā etā vṛttayo dvividhāḥ sthitāḥ // DhvK_3.33 //
GK16andhvc3u:4947: tatra rasānuguṇa aucityavānvācyāśrayo yo vyavahārastā etāḥ kaiśikyādyā vṛttayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4949: vṛttayo hi rasāditātparyeṇa saṃniveśitāḥ kāmapināṭyasya kāvyasya ca cchāyāmāvahanti /
GK16andhvc3u:4968: 'vṛttayaḥ kāvyamātṛkāḥ' iti bruvāṇena muninā rasocitetivṛttasamāśrayaṇopadeśena rasasyaivajīvitatvamuktam /
GK16andhvc3u:4973: ālokārthītyādikārikayā prathamodyote yaduktaṃ tadevānayā kārikayā upasaṃhṛtamityarthaḥ // 3.2 //
GK16andhvc3u:4976: rasādimayaṃ hi vācyaṃ pratibhāsate na tu rasādibhiḥ pṛthagbhūtam' iti /
GK16andhvc3u:4977: atrocyate--yadi rasādimayameva vāyyaṃ yathā gauratvamayaṃ śarīram /
GK16andhvc3u:4978: evaṃ sati yathā śarīre pratibhāsamāne niyamenaiva gauratvaṃ pratibhāsate sarvasya tathā vācyena sahaiva rasādayo 'pi sahṛdayasyāsahṛdayasya ca pratibhāseran /
GK16andhvc3u:4980: locanam ityādinā rasopayogajīvitaḥ śabdavṛttilakṣaṇo vyavahāra uktaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4990: bālapriyā kārikāyāmarthaśabdayoḥ rasādyanuguṇatvena aucityavān vyavahāro yaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:4993: rasopayoga eva jīvitaṃ yasya sa ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4998: atra guṇasthānīyo rasādiḥ guṇisthānīya itivṛttādirūpo vācyārthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5013: yadi rasādimayo vācyārthastarhi sa niyamato rasādibhiḥ sahaiva sarvaiḥ pratīyamānassyādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5018: ratnānāmiva jātyatvaṃ pratipattṛviśeṣataḥ saṃvedyaṃ vācyanāṃ rasādirūpatvamiti /
GK16andhvc3u:5019: naivam; yato yathā jātyatvena pratibhāsamāne ratne ratnasvarūpānatiriktatvameva tasya lakṣyate tathā rasādīnāmapi vibhāvānubhāvādirūpavācyāvyatiriktatvameva lakṣyeta /
GK16andhvc3u:5020: na caivam; locanam nanu yadyasya dharmarūpaṃ tattatpratibhāne sarvasya niyamena bhātītyanaikāntikametat /
GK16andhvc3u:5021: māṇikyadharmo hi jātyatvalakṣaṇo viśeṣo na tatpratibhāse 'pi sarvasya niyamena bhātītyāśaṅkate---syāditi /
GK16andhvc3u:5023: etaduktaṃ bhavati---atyantonmagnasvabhāvatve sati taddharmatvāditi viśeṣaṇamasmābhiḥ kṛtam /
GK16andhvc3u:5036: tatpratibhāne śarīrādipratibhāse ityetaditi sambandhaḥ iti niyama ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5037: yatra yatra yaddharmatvaṃ tatra pratyakṣīyatadviṣayitāvyāpakaviṣayitākatvamiti vyāptiriti yāvat /
GK16andhvc3u:5043: tathā ca māṇikyadharme jātyatve vyabhicāra iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5056: yata ityādi na caivamityantasya parihāragranthasya bhāvamāha locane--etaduktamityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:5065: yatra yatra taddharmatvabhityatra atyantonmagnasvabhāvatve satītyapi niviṣṭamastītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5067: unmagnarūpatā yathārūpasya gauratvāderasti tathā jātyatvasya netyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5072: na hi vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicāriṇa eva rasā iti kasyācidavagamaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5073: ata eva ca vibhāvādipratītyavinābhāvinī rasādīnāṃ pratītiriti tatpratītyoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvena vyavasthānātkramo 'vaśyambhāvī /
GK16andhvc3u:5074: sa tu lāghavānna prakāśyate 'ityalakṣyakramā eva santo vyaṅgyā rasādayaḥ' ityuktam /
GK16andhvc3u:5075: locanam vācyānāṃ dharmāstathāsati dvau pakṣau rūpādisadṛśā vā syurmāṇikyagatajātyatvasadṛśā vā /
GK16andhvc3u:5080: eṣa ca heturādye 'pi pakṣe saṅgacchata eva /
GK16andhvc3u:5085: yataśca tatpratītau vācyapratītiḥ sarvathānupayoginī tata eva hetoḥ krameṇāvaśyaṃ bhāvyaṃ,
GK16andhvc3u:5087: sa tu sahṛdayabhāvanābhyāsānna lakṣyate anyathā tu lakṣyetāpītyuktaṃ prāk /
GK16andhvc3u:5090: nanu bhavantu vācyādatiriktā rasādayastatrāpi kramo na lakṣyata iti tāvattvayaivoktam /
GK16andhvc3u:5102: vṛttāvata evetyeko hetuḥ vyavasthānādityaparaścetyāśayena vyācaṣṭe--yato netyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:5127: nanu śabda eva prakāraṇādyavacchinno vācyavyaṅgyayoḥ samameva pratītimupajanayatīti kiṃ tatra kramakalpanayā /
GK16andhvc3u:5128: na ha śabdasya vācyapratītiparāmarśa eva vyañjakatve nibandhanam /
GK16andhvc3u:5132: kiṃ tu tadyvañjakatvaṃ teṣāṃ kadācitsvarūpaviśeṣanibandhanaṃ kadācidvācakaśaktinibandhanam /
GK16andhvc3u:5133: tatra yeṣāṃ vācakaśaktinibandhanaṃ teṣāṃ yadi vācyapratītimantareṇaiva svarūpapratītyā niṣpannaṃ tadbhavenna tarhi vācakaśaktinibandhanam /
GK16andhvc3u:5135: tataścaikayaiva sāmagnyā sahaiva vācyaṃ vyaṅgyābhimataṃ ca rasādi bhātīti vacanavyañjanavyāpāradvayena na kiñcinditi tadāha--nanviti /
GK16andhvc3u:5136: yatrāpi gītaśabdānāmartho 'sti tatrāpi tatpratītiranupayoginī grāmarāgānusāreṇāpahastitavācyānusāratayā rasodayadarśanāt /
GK16andhvc3u:5137: na cāpi sā sarvatra bhavantī dṛśyate,
GK16andhvc3u:5154: apahastitaḥ anādṛtaḥ vācyānusāraḥ vācyarthapratītyanusaraṇaṃ yena rasodayena tasya bhāvastattā tayā /
GK16andhvc3u:5165: vācakaśaktirabhidhā saiva nibandhanaṃ prayojakaṃ yasya tat /
GK16andhvc3u:5174: na caivaṃ evaṃ na bhavati ca /
GK16andhvc3u:5179: sa tu kramo yadi lāghavānna lakṣyate tatkiṃ kriyate /
GK16andhvc3u:5183: astu śabdādeva tatpratītistathāpi tena svavācakaśaktistasyāṃ kartavyāyāṃ sahakāritayāvaśyāpekṣaṇīyetyāyātaṃ vācyapratīteḥ pūrvabhāvitvamiti /
GK16andhvc3u:5185: yattukvacacchrute 'pi kāvyerasapratītirna bhavati tatrocitaḥ prakaraṇāvagamādiḥ sahakārī nāstītyāśaṅkyāha--yadi ceti /
GK16andhvc3u:5219: nanvevaṃ yatra śabdaḥ śruto 'rtho nādhigataśca tatra rasapratītiḥ syādityata āha--yattvityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:5233: vākyāntaraṃ sahāyaḥ sahakāri yasya tattvaṃ sahakāri vāntaramityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5237: yeṣāmapi svarūpaviśeṣapratītinimittaṃ vyañjakatvaṃ yathā gītādiśabdānāṃ teṣāmapi svarūpapratītervyaṅgyapratīteśca niyamabhāvī locanam svayamiti /
GK16andhvc3u:5239: na cānvayavyatirekavatīṃ vācyapratītimapahnutyādṛṣṭasadbhāvābhāvau śaraṇatvenāśritau mātsaryādadhikaṃ kiñcitpuṣṇīta ityabhiprāyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5242: evaṃ hyupayoga iti anupakārake sañjñākaraṇamātraṃ vastuśūnyaṃ syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5244: taddṛṣṭāntenaiva vayaṃ vācyapratīterapi pūrvabhāvitāṃ samarthayiṣyāma iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5259: nanu vākyena rasādipratītau kartavyāyāmadṛṣṭaviśeṣo 'pi sahakārī tadabhāvādeva vācyapratītivirahakāle rasāderapratītiriti śaṅkāṃ pariharati--na cetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:5287: tattu śabdasya kriyāpaurvāparyamananyasādhyatatphalaghaṭanāsvāśubhāvanīṣu vācyenāvirodhinyabhidheyāntaravilakṣaṇe rasādau na pratīyate /
GK16andhvc3u:5288: locanam nanu saṃścetkramaḥ kiṃ na lakṣyata ityāśaṅkyāha--tattviti /
GK16andhvc3u:5290: kriye vācyavyaṅgyapratīti yadi vābhidhāvyāpāro vyañjanāparaparyāyo dhvananavyāpāraśceti kriye tayoḥ paurvāparyaṃ na pratīyate /
GK16andhvc3u:5295: kuto na lakṣyate iti nimittasaptamīnirdiṣṭaṃ hetvantaragarbhaṃ hetumāha--āśubhāvinīṣviti /
GK16andhvc3u:5296: ananyasādhyatatphalaghaṭanāsu ghaṭanāḥ pūrvaṃ mādhuryādilakṣaṇāḥ pratipāditā guṇānirūpaṇāvasare tāśca tatphalāḥ rasādipratītiḥ phalaṃ yāsām,
GK16andhvc3u:5299: etaduktaṃ bhavati---yato guṇavati kāvye 'saṅkīrṇaviṣayatayā saṅghaṭanā prayuktā tataḥ kramo na lakṣyate /
GK16andhvc3u:5301: kramastu kiṃ na lakṣyate ata āha--āśubhāvinīṣu vācyapratītikālapratīkṣaṇena vinaiva jhaṭityeva tā rasādīn bhāvayanti bālapriyā śabdajanyakriyetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5331: ojoghaṭanayā karuṇādipratītirna hi sādhyetyanvayaḥ kintu vīrādipratītireveti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5338_1: eva yata āsūtrito rasāsvādastena vācyapratītyuttarakālabhavena parisphuṭāsvādayukto
GK16andhvc3u:5339: abhyaste hi viṣaye 'vinābhāvapratītikrama itthameva na lakṣyate /
GK16andhvc3u:5340_0: abhyāso hyayameva yatpraṇidhānādināpi vinaiva saṃskārasya balavattvātsadaiva prabubhutsutayā
GK16andhvc3u:5341: jhaṭityutpannehi dhūmajñāne tadvyāptismṛtyupakṛte tadvijātīyapraṇidhānānusaraṇādipratītyantarānupraveśavirahādāśubhāvinyāmagnipratītau bālapriyā ghaṭanā ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5343: tattvityādigranthena labdhaṃ kramastu kinna lakṣyata iti codyasyottaraṃ vivṛṇoti---etadityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:5352: vācyapratītyuttarakāle yo bhavaḥ jananaṃ tena hetunā yaḥ parisphuṭāsvādaḥ tena yukto 'pi viśiṣṭo 'pi;
GK16andhvc3u:5369: abhyasta ityādinā samānyata uktaṃ viśiṣya darśayati--evamityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:5384: tābhyāṃ dhūmajñānavyāptismṛtibhyāṃ vijātīyaṃ yat praṇidhānānukaraṇādinā praṇidhānakaraṇādinā pratītyantaramālocanarūpaṃ kvacittu lakṣyata eva /
GK16andhvc3u:5389: tathāvidhe ca viṣaye vācyavyaṅgyeyoratyantavilakṣaṇatvādyaiva ekasya pratītiḥ saivetarasyeti na śakyate vaktum /
GK16andhvc3u:5390: śabdaśaktimūlānuraṇanarūpavyaṅgye tu dhvanau--- gāvo vaḥ pāvanānāṃ paramaparimitāṃ prītimutpādayantu locanam kramo na lakṣyate tadvadihāpi /
GK16andhvc3u:5391: yadi tu vācyāvirodhī raso na syāducitā ca ghaṭanā na bhavettallakṣyetaiva krama iti /
GK16andhvc3u:5392_0: candrikākārastu paṭhitamanupaṭhatīti nyāyena gajanimīlikayā vyācacakṣe--tasya śabdasya
GK16andhvc3u:5392_1: phalaṃ tadvā phalaṃ vācyavyaṅgyapratītyātmakaṃ tasya ghaṭanā niṣpādanā yato 'nanyasādhyā
GK16andhvc3u:5393: na cātrārthasatattvaṃ vyākhyāne kiñcidutpaśmāma ityalaṃ pūrvavaṃśyaiḥ saha vivādena bahunā /
GK16andhvc3u:5394: yatra tu saṅghaṭanāvyaṅgyatve nāsti tatra lakṣyata evetyāha--kvacittviti /
GK16andhvc3u:5399: iti hi pūrvaṃ varṇasaṅghaṭanādikaṃ nāsya vyañjakatvenoktamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5413: iti hi pūrvamuktaṃ varṇasaṅghaṭanādikamasya vyañjakatvena noktamiti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5429: kūpa iti ca ahamiti cobhayasamānādhikaraṇatayā saṃvalanam /
GK16andhvc3u:5442: abhidheyasya vyaṅgyālaṅkārasya ca ye pratītī tayorityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5461: abhidheyaṃ ca tatsāmarthyākṣiptālaṅkāraśca tāveva tanmātre iti ca vṛttyartho bodhyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5465: ārthyapi ca pratipattisyathāvide viṣaye ubhayārthasambandhayogyaśabdasāmarthyaprasāviteti śabdaśaktimūlā kalpyate /
GK16andhvc3u:5467: tatrāvivakṣitavācyatvādeva vācyeva saha vyaṅgyasya kramapratītivicāro na kṛtaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5468: tasmādabhidhānābhidheyapratītyoriva locanam nanvevamārthatvaṃ śabdaśaktimūlatvaṃ ceti viruddhamityāśaṅkyāha---ārthyapīti /
GK16andhvc3u:5470: etacca vitatya pūrvameva nirṇītamiti na punarucyate /
GK16andhvc3u:5477_2: tatprasaṅgena rasādīnāṃ vācyātiriktatvaṃ samarthayituṃ kramo vicārita ityetadupasaṃharati--tasmāditi /
GK16andhvc3u:5485: evaṃ vivakṣitānyaparavācye vyaṅgyavyañjakayoḥ kramaṃ pratipādya sarvatrāpi vyaṅgyavyañjakayoḥ kramo 'stīti darśayitumāha--vṛttau 'avivakṣite'tyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:5497: krameṇa yā pratītiḥ tadvicāraḥ vācyārthavyaṅgyārthapratītyoḥkramasya vicāra ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5502: nanu rasādeḥ vṛttijīvitatvamupakrāntaṃ vācyavyaṅgyapratītikramaśca tasmādityādinā upasaṃhṛtaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5511: tadevaṃ vyañjakamukhena dhvaniprakāreṣu nirūpiteṣu kaścidbrūyāt---kimidaṃ vyañjakatvaṃ nāma vyaṅgyārthaprakāśanam,
GK16andhvc3u:5512: na hi vyañjakatvaṃ vyaṅgyatvaṃ cārthasya vyañjakasidydhadhīnaṃ vyaṅgyatvam,
GK16andhvc3u:5514: nanu vācyavyatiriktasya vyaṅgyasya locanam śabdarūpasya pūrvaṃ pratītistato 'bhidheyasya /
GK16andhvc3u:5515: yadāha tatra bhavān--- 'viṣayatvamanāpannaiḥ śabdairnārthaḥ prakāśyate' ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:5517_0: udyotārambhe yaduktaṃ vyañjanamukhena dhvaneḥ svarūpaṃ pratipādyata iti tadidānīmupasaṃharanvyañjakabhāvaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:5517_1: prathamodyote samarthitamapi śiṣyāṇāmekapraghaṭṭakena hṛdi niveśayituṃ pūrvapakṣamāha--tadevamiti /
GK16andhvc3u:5522: bālapriyā vṛttyuktānumāne dṛṣṭāntasya sādhanavaikalyaśaṅkāṃ parihartuṃ vyācaṣṭe--abhidhānasyetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:5529: ityādītyādipadena sūciteṣu kiñcit padyārddhamapi darśayati---ata ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:5543: kaścidityādinā vyañjakatvanirūpaṇaṃ punaruktaṃ cetyatastatphalaṃ darśayannavatārayati---udyotārambha ityādinā /
GK16andhvc3u:5554: śabdasya siddhiḥ prāgeva pratipāditā tatsadydhadhīnā ca vyañjakasiddhiriti kaḥ paryanuyogāvasaraḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5565: tasya yadi vyaṅya iti nāma kṛtam,
GK16andhvc3u:5567: vyaṅgya iti vā vācyābhimatasyāpi kasmānna kriyate?
GK16andhvc3u:5569: abhidhā bālapriyā vyañjakatvamarthasya vyaṅgyatvaṃ ca 'na hi'svato na bhavati hi /
GK16andhvc3u:5581: tathā ca yato 'rthasya vyaṅgyatvamato vyañjakatvaṃ śabdasyaiva tacca vyaṅgyārthaprakāśanaṃ na hīti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5583: vyañjakatvasiddhyadhīnamityasyānantaraṃ vyaṅgyatvamiti pāṭhābhāve tvevaṃ yojanā--vyañjakatvaṃ vyaṅgyārthaprakāśanaṃ na hi /
GK16andhvc3u:5586: vismaraṇamāśaṅkya tatratyaṃ prāgiti padaṃ vyācaṣṭe locane---prathametyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:5593: 'satyam' ityādinā siddhāntyuktamanūdya pūrvapakṣī 'sa tvi'tyādinā dūṣaṇamabhihitavāṃstaṃ granthaṃ vyācaṣṭe--astvasāvityādinā /
GK16andhvc3u:5594: sa tvartha ityasya vyākhyānam--asau dvitīyo 'rtha iti /
GK16andhvc3u:5609: yo 'rthaḥ paryanto yasyāḥ tatra vācyatayaivāsau vyapadeṣṭuṃ yuktaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:5614: yā tvantarā tathāvidhe viṣaye vācyāntarapratītiḥ sā tatpratīterupāyamātraṃ padārthapratītiriva vākyārthapratīteḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5616: tatparyantatā ca pradhānībhūte tasminnartha iti mūrdhābhiṣiktaṃ dhvaneryadrūpaṃ nirūpitaṃ,
GK16andhvc3u:5621: upāyamātramityanena sādhāraṇyoktyā bhāṭṭaṃ prābhākaraṃ vaiyākaraṇaṃ ca pūrvapakṣaṃ sūcayati /
GK16andhvc3u:5622: bhāṭṭamate hi--- vākyārthamitaye teṣāṃ pravṛttau nāntarīyakam /
GK16andhvc3u:5628: tatparyantatā tāmabhidhāṃ prati paryantatā avadhitā tātparyaviṣayateti yāvat /
GK16andhvc3u:5652: teṣāṃ padānāṃ vākyajananadvāreṇa vākyārthamitaye eva pravṛttiḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:5654: yathānnapākārthaṃ atrocyate---yatra śabdaḥ svārthamabhidadhāno 'rthāntaramavagamayati tatra yattasya svārthābhidhāyitvaṃ yacca tadarthāntarāvagamahetutvaṃ tayoraviśeṣo viśeṣo vā /
GK16andhvc3u:5656: yasmāttau dvau vyāpārau bhinnaviṣayau bhinnarūpau ca pratīyete eva /
GK16andhvc3u:5657: tathāhi vācakatvalakṣaṇo vyāpāraḥ śabdasya svārthaviṣayaḥ gamakatvalakṣaṇastvarthāntaraviṣayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5658: locanam iti śabdāvagataiḥ padārthaistātparyeṇa yo 'rtha utthāpyate sa eva vākyārthaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:5663: etaccāsmābhiḥ prathamoddyota eva vitatya nirṇītamiti na punarāyasyate granthayojanaiva tu kriyate /
GK16andhvc3u:5667: vācakatvaṃ gamakatvaṃ ceti svarūpato bhedaḥ svārthe 'rthāntare ca krameṇeti viṣayataḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5669: no cetsa tasya na kaściditi ko viṣayārthaṃ bālapriyā pravṛttānāṃ kāṣṭhānāṃ jvalanam /
GK16andhvc3u:5670: ataḥ padānāṃ vākyārthamitiparyanta evābhidhāvyāpāro yathā kāṣṭhavyāpāraḥ pākānta ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5681: vākyārthasya naimittikatvoktyaiva padārthānāṃ nimittatve siddhe 'pi vaiyākaraṇamatādviśeṣaṃ darśayitumāha--padārthānāntviti /
GK16andhvc3u:5683: pratītistu prathamaṃ vākyārthasya prābhākaramate kāryānvitābhidhānāditi bodhyam /
GK16andhvc3u:5693: samayāpekṣatvātsvārthe abhidhā tadanapekṣatvādanyatrārthe avagamanavyāpāra iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5698: nanu na gamyate tasmācchabdātkintu tatsambandhivaśādityata āha--no cedityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:5703: yadi ca svasambandhitvaṃ sākṣāttasya syāttadārthāntararatvavyavahāra eva na syāt /
GK16andhvc3u:5713: yāvatā na sākṣātsambandhitvaṃ tena yukta evārthāntaravyavahāra iti viṣayabheda uktaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5714: nanu bhinne 'pi viṣaye akṣaśabdāderbahvarthasya eka evābhidhālakṣaṇo vyāpāra ityāśaṅkya rūpabhedamupapādayati--rūpabhedo 'pīti /
GK16andhvc3u:5717: yadeva vācakatvaṃ tadeva gamakatvaṃ yadi syādavācakasya gamakatvamapi na syāt,
GK16andhvc3u:5719: na caitadubhayamapi gītaśabde śabdavyatirikte cādhovaktratvakucakampanabāṣpāveśādau bālapriyā tasya arthāntarasya /
GK16andhvc3u:5738: āvṛttyapekṣatve 'pi tatra tatrārthe abhidhaiva vyāpāra iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5739: svarūpabhede prasiddhiṃ hetumuktvā punarhetvantaroktau bījaṃ darśayati--vipratipannaṃ pratīti /
GK16andhvc3u:5740: vipratipannaṃ vācakatvameva gamakatvaṃ nānyadanubhūyata iti vadantam /
GK16andhvc3u:5743: gamakatve sati vācakatvamapi naiva na syāditi yojanā /
GK16andhvc3u:5748: tasmādbhinnaviṣayatvādbhinnarūpatvācca svārthābhidhāyitvamarthāntarāvagamahetutvaṃ ca śabdasya yattayoḥ spaṣṭa eva bhedaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5757: nanu gītādau mā bhūdvācakatvamiha tvarthāntare 'pa śabdasya vācakatvamevocyate,
GK16andhvc3u:5782: vyañjanāvyāpāraviṣayatāyā asmanmatasiddhāyāssādhanāt siddhasādhanaṃ nāma doṣa ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5797: tatra ca tasyārthāntarasya pratīteḥ śabdāntareṇa svārthābhidhāyinā yadviṣayīkaraṇaṃ tatra prakāśanoktireva yuktā /
GK16andhvc3u:5799: yataḥ padārthapratītirasatyaiveti locanam yadviṣayīkaraṇaṃ tatra prakāśanoktireva yuktā na vācakatvoktiḥ śabdasya,
GK16andhvc3u:5804: vācyatvaṃ hi samayabalena nirvyavadhānaṃ pratipādyatvaṃ yathā tasyaivārthasya śabdāntaraṃ prati padāha--prasiddheti /
GK16andhvc3u:5805: prasiddhena vācakatayābhidhānāntareṇa yaḥ sambandho vācyatvaṃ tadeva tatra vā yadyogyatvaṃ tenopalakṣitasya /
GK16andhvc3u:5807: nāpi taṃ śabdaṃ prati tasyārthasyoktarūpaṃ vācyatvam /
GK16andhvc3u:5809: atha ca pratīyate so 'rtho na ca vācyavācakatvavyāpāremeti vilakṣaṇa evāsau vyāpāra iti yāvat /
GK16andhvc3u:5814: na vācakatvoktiryuktetyatra hetutvena svārthābhidhāyineti padaṃ vācakatvanirvacanapūrvakamavatārayati---vācakatvaṃ hītyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:5844: yathāhi ghaṭe niṣpanne tadupādānakāraṇānāṃ na pṛthagupalambhastathaiva vākye tadarthe vā pratīte padatadarthānāṃ teṣāṃ tadā vibhaktatayopalambhe vākyārthabuddhireva dūrībhavet /
GK16andhvc3u:5852: saugatakāpilamate tu yadyapyupādātavya ghaṭakāle upādānānāṃ na sattā ekatra kṣaṇakṣayitvena paratra tirobhūtatvena tathāpi pṛthaktayā nāstyupalambha itīyatyaṃśe dṛṣṭantaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5856: arthāntarapratītyanukūlā vākyasya yā śaktissā tātparyaśaktireva na tvadabhimateti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5858: yathā padārthe pratīte tātparyaśaktyā vākyārtho gamyate,
GK16andhvc3u:5873: nanu yairapīti sāmānyenoktirnaṃ ghaṭate sautagakāpilamatayorupādeyakāle upādānābhāvāditi śaṅkate--saugatetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:5887: vākye pratīte tasmātpadānāṃ vākyārthe pratīte tasmātpadārthanāñca pṛthaktayā upalambho nāstītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5894: atra gamyaṃ hetuṃ darśayati locane--arthaikatvasyābhāvāditi padārthavākyārthapratītyoḥ vācyāvabhāsāvinābhāvena tasya prakāśanāt /
GK16andhvc3u:5896: yathaiva hi pradīpadvārema ghaṭapratītāvutpannāyāṃ na pradīpaprakāśo nivartate tadvadyvaṅgyapratītau vācyāvabhāsaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5898: nanvevaṃ yugapadarthadvayayogitvaṃ vākyasya prāptaṃ tadbhāve ca tasya vākyataiva vighaṭate,
GK16andhvc3u:5902_0: vyaṅgyasya hi kvacitprādhānyaṃ vācyasyopasarjanabhāvaḥ locanam evaṃ padārthavākyārthanyāyaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:5902_1: tātparyaśaktisādhakaṃ prakṛte viṣaye nirākṛtyābhimatāṃ prakāśaśakti sādhayituṃ taducitaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:5903: yato 'sau padārthavākyāthanyāyo neha yuktastasmāt prakṛtaṃ nyāyaṃ vyākaramapūrvakaṃ dārṣṭāntike yojayati--yathaiva hīti /
GK16andhvc3u:5904: nanu pūrvamuktam--- yathā padārthadvāreṇa vākyārthaḥ sa pratīyate /
GK16andhvc3u:5906: iti tatkathaṃ sa eva nyāya iha yatnena nirākṛta ityāśaṅkyāha--yattviti /
GK16andhvc3u:5914: dūrībhāvaśca neṣṛ ityatastayoḥ pṛthagupalambhonābhyupeya iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5925: ekaḥ artho yasya tasya bhāvaḥ aikārthyam /
GK16andhvc3u:5927: nanvekārthatvaṃ na lakṣaṇaṃ śleṣālaṅkāraviṣayasyānekārthasyāpi vākyatvāditi śaṅkāmabhiprāyapradarśanena pariharati--sakṛdityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:5931: tasmātsthitametat--vyaṅgyaparatve 'pi kāvyasya na vyaṅgyasyāvideyatvamapi tu vyaṅgyatvameva /
GK16andhvc3u:5934: yatrāpi tasya prādhānyaṃ tatrāpi kimiti tasya svarūpamapahnūyate /
GK16andhvc3u:5935: locanam śruto hi śabdo yatraiva samayasmṛtiṃ karoti sa cedanenaivāgamitaḥ tadviramyavyāpārābhāvātsamayasmaraṇānāṃ bahūnāṃ yugapadayogātko 'rthabhedasyāvasaraḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5936: punaḥ śrutastu smṛto vāpi nāsāviti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5943: nanu yatparaḥ śabdaḥ sa śabdārtha iti vyaṅgyasya prāghānye vācyatvameva nyāyyam,
GK16andhvc3u:5944: tarhyaprādhānye kiṃ yuktaṃ vyaṅgyatvamiti cetsiddho naḥ pakṣaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:5955: tarhi tānyapi bahūni bhavantityāśaṅkāyāṃ tāni krameṇa yugapadveti vikalpādyaṃ nirākaroti--viramyavyāpārābhāvāditi /
GK16andhvc3u:5957: nanu śleṣaviṣaye vahvarthatvaṃ dṛśyata ityata āha--punarityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:5958: śrutastu smṛto vāpītyubhayatra śabda iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5959: yadvā śrutaḥ anusaṃhitaḥ śabda iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5963: tathāca śleṣasthale āvṛtyā bodhādvākyatadartho bhinnau payorekatvañcaupacārikamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5967: tathāca vācyopasarjanako vyaṅgyo vyaṅgyopasarjanakavācyo vaika evārtho vākye na pratipādyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5970: tahyaprādhānye kiṃ yuktamiti siddhāntī pṛṣṭvā pūrvapakṣiṇa uttaramanuvadannāha--vyaṅgyatvamiti cedityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:5976: itaśca vācakatvādyvañjakatvasyānyatvaṃ yadvācakatvaṃ śabdaikāśrayamitarattu śabdāśrayamarthāśrayaṃ ca śabdārthayordvayorapi vyañjakatvasya pratipāditatvāt /
GK16andhvc3u:5978: kintu tato 'pi vyañjakatvaṃ svarūpato viṣayataśca bhidyate /
GK16andhvc3u:5980: tacca prādhānye 'pi vidyata iti svarūpamaheyameveti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5986: etacca vitatya dhvanilakṣaṇe 'yatrārthaḥ śabdo vā' iti vāgrahaṇaṃ,
GK16andhvc3u:5987: 'vyaṅktaḥ' iti dvirvacanaṃ ca vyācakṣāṇairasmābhiḥ prathamoddyota eva darśitamiti punarna vistāryate /
GK16andhvc3u:5990: bālapriyā śabdasya sambandhī vācyo lakṣyo vārthaḥ tatsambandhitvamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6003: vṛttāvita ityanena yadityādivakṣyamāṇaḥ āśrayabhedarūpo hetuḥ parāmṛśyata ityakṣipretya vyācaṣṭe--anenetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:6009: arthasya vayañjakatvāśrayatvaṃ śabdāyattameveti yadyapi śabda eva vācakatvasyeva vyañjakatvasyāpi mukhya āśraya iti kāraṇaikyamasti,
GK16andhvc3u:6013: evaṃ mukhyādvācakatvādabhedaṃ pratipādya amukhyādapi pratipādayitumāheti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6023: na hyarthādyvaṅgyatrayapratītiryā tasyā amukhyatvaṃ manāgapi lakṣyate /
GK16andhvc3u:6030: vyañjakatvamārge tu yadārtho 'rthāntaraṃ dyotayati tadā svarūpaṃ prakāśayannevāsāvanyasya prakāśakaḥ pratīyate pradīpavat /
GK16andhvc3u:6032: yadi ca yatrātiraskṛtasvapratītirartho 'rthāntaraṃ lakṣayati tatra lakṣaṇāvyavahāraḥ kriyate,
GK16andhvc3u:6033: tadevaṃ sati lakṣaṇaiva mukhyaḥ śabdavyāpāra iti prāptam /
GK16andhvc3u:6035: locanam upacāralakṣaṇayoḥ prathamoddyota eva vibhajya nirṇītaṃ svarūpamiti na punarlikhyate /
GK16andhvc3u:6046: bālapriyā ca yā guṇavṛttiḥ sā ubhayāśrayāpīti vṛttau yojaneti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6048: mukhyatayaivetyatra mukhyatevaṃ prakṛtānurodhena vyācaṣṭe--askhalavadgatitveneti vācakatvameva guṇavṛttirityetadvivaṇoti--tatrāpītyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:6067: tadanyasthale nanu tvatpakṣe 'pi yadārtho vyaṅgyatrayaṃ prakāśayati tadā śabdasya kīdṛśo vyāpāraḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6071: yato vyañjakatvasya rasādayo 'laṅkāraviśeṣā vyaṅgyarūpāvacchinnaṃ vastu ceti trayaṃ viṣayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6072: tatra rasādipratītirguṇavṛttiriti locanam kīdṛśa iti mukhyo vā na vā prakārāntarābhāvāt /
GK16andhvc3u:6074: guṇonimittaṃ sādṛśyādi taddvārikā vṛttiḥ śabdasya vyāpāro guṇavṛttiriti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6075: mukhya evāsau vyāpāraḥ sāmagrobhedācca vācakatvādyvatiricyata ityabhiprayeṇāha--ucyata iti /
GK16andhvc3u:6077: samayānupayogātpṛthagābhāsamānatvācceti tribhiḥ prakāraiḥ prakāśakatvasyaitadviparītarūpatrayāyāśca guṇavṛtteḥ svarūpabhedaṃ vyākhyāya viṣayabhedamapyāha--viṣayabhedo 'pīti /
GK16andhvc3u:6079: bālapriyā tu syādityāśaṅkya pariharati--'yadi ce' tyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:6089: tasminsati kiṃ syādityataḥ krameṇa dūṣaṇamāha--mukhyatva ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:6098: guṇavṛttivyañjakatvayoḥ svarūpabhedahetūn bahugranthoktān sugrahatvāyaikagranthena vṛtyabhiprāyatayā upasaṃharannuttaragranthaṃ tātparyoktyāvatārayati--evamityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:6111: na kenaciducyate na ca śakyate vaktum /
GK16andhvc3u:6114: tacca na sarvaṃ guṇavṛtterviṣayaḥ prasidydhanuroghābhyāmapi gauṇānāṃ śabdānāṃ prayogadarśanāt /
GK16andhvc3u:6118: locanam vyañjakatvasya yo viṣayaḥ sa guṇavṛtterna viṣayaḥ anyaśca tasyā viṣayabhedo yojyaḥ tatra prathamaṃ prakāramāha--tatreti /
GK16andhvc3u:6123: vastuno yatpūrvaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ kṛtaṃ tadyvācaṣṭe--cārutvapratītaya iti /
GK16andhvc3u:6132: na sarvamiti yathāsmābhirvyākhyātaṃ tathā sphuṭayati--yadapi ceti /
GK16andhvc3u:6134_1: paryāyeṇa vācakatvādguṇavṛtteśca bālapriyā vastumātraṃ bhavatu guṇavṛtterviṣayaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:6140: na ca śakyate vaktumityatra gamyaṃ hetumāha--lakṣaṇetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:6173: tadubhayāśrayatvapratipādanāyaiva ca dhvaneḥ prathamataraṃ dvau prabhedāvupanyastau /
GK16andhvc3u:6174: tadubhayāśritatvācca tadekarūpatvaṃ tasya na śakyate vaktum /
GK16andhvc3u:6177: na ca lakṣaṇaikarūpamevānyatra locanam dvitayādapi bhinnaṃ vyañjakatvamityupapādayati--vācakatveti /
GK16andhvc3u:6179: apiśabdo 'pi na kevalaṃ pūrvokto hetukalāpo yāvattadubhayāśrayatvena mukhyopacārāśrayatvena yadvyavasthānaṃ tadapi vācakaguṇavṛttivilakṣaṇasyaiveti vyāptighaṭanam /
GK16andhvc3u:6226: na ca teṣāṃ vācakatvaṃ lakṣaṇā vā kathañcillakṣyate /
GK16andhvc3u:6228: yadi ca vācakatvalakṣaṇādīnāṃ śabdaprakārāṇāṃ prasiddhaprakāravilakṣaṇatve 'pi vyañjakatvasya darśanādvācakatvādiśabdadharmaprakāratvamayuktaṃ vaktum /
GK16andhvc3u:6229: yadi ca vācakatvalakṣaṇādīnāṃ śabdaprakārāṇāṃ prasiddhaprakāravilakṣaṇatve 'pi vyañjakatvaṃ prakāratvena parikalpyate tacchabdasyaiva prakāratvena kasmānna parikalpyate /
GK16andhvc3u:6266: parikalpanaṃ tadevaṃ śābde vyavahāre trayaḥ prakārāḥ---vācakatvaṃ guṇavṛttirvyañjakatvaṃ ca /
GK16andhvc3u:6267: tatra vyañjakatve yadā vyaṅgyaprādhānyaṃ tadā dhvaniḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:6268: tasya cāvivakṣitavācyo vivakṣitānyaparavācyaśceti dvau prabhedāvanukrāntau prathamataraṃ tau savistaraṃ nirṇītau /
GK16andhvc3u:6269: anyo brūyāt--nanu vivakṣitānyaparavācye dhvanau guṇavṛttitā locanam vyañjakatvaṃ vācakatvāmiti yadi paryāyau kalpyete tarhi vyañjakatvaṃ śabda ityapa paryāyatā kasmānna kalpyate,
GK16andhvc3u:6271: vyañjakatvasya tu viviktaṃ svarūpaṃ darśitaṃ tadviṣayāntare kathaṃ viparyastatām /
GK16andhvc3u:6272: evaṃ hi parvatagato dhūmo 'nagnijo 'pi syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6276: yadyapi ca tasya tadubhayāśrayatvena vyavasthānāditi brūvatā nirṇītacaramevaitat,
GK16andhvc3u:6277: tathāpi guṇavṛtteravivakṣitavācyasya ca durnirūpaṃ vailakṣaṇyaṃ yaḥ paśyati taṃ pratyāśaṅkānivāraṇārtho 'yamupakramaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6295: vācakāśrayaṃ vyañjakatvaṃ vācakatvādimūlaṃ na cetparvatagato dhūmo 'nagnijaśca syādato viparyāso na yukta iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6305: la avivakṣitavācyasyeti dhvaneśeṣa ritiḥ yo vailakṣaṇyaṃ durnirūpaṃ paśyati,
GK16andhvc3u:6311: na hi guṇavṛttau yadā nimittena kenacidviṣayāntare śabda āropyate atyantatiraskṛtasvārthaḥ yathā--'agnirmāṇavakaḥ' ityādau,
GK16andhvc3u:6315: guṇavṛttivyavahārābhāve hetuṃ darśayituṃ tasyā eva guṇavṛttestāvadvṛttāntaṃ darśayati--na hīti /
GK16andhvc3u:6316: guṇatayā vṛttirvyāpāro guṇavṛttiḥ guṇena nimittena sādṛśyādinā ca vṛttiḥ arthāntaraviṣaye 'pi śabdasya sāmānādhikaraṇyamiti gaumaṃ darśayati /
GK16andhvc3u:6317: yadā vā svārthamiti bālapriyā ayamupakramaḥ vṛttikāropakramaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6340: ata eva ca vivakṣitānyaparavācye dhvanau vācyavācakayodvayorapi svarūpapratītirarthāvagamanaṃ dṛśyata iti vyañjakatvavyavahāro yuktyanurodhī /
GK16andhvc3u:6342: tathāvidhe viṣaye vācakatvasyaiva vyañjakatvamiti guṇavṛttivyavahāro niyamenaiva na śakyate kartum /
GK16andhvc3u:6345: ata eva atyantatiraskṛtasvārthaśabdena viṣayāntaramākrāmati cetyanena śabdena tadeva bhedadvayaṃ darśayati--ata eva ceti /
GK16andhvc3u:6346: yata eva na tatroktatahetubalādguṇavṛttavyavahāro nyāyyastata ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6351: uktaguṇavṛttiśabdārthābhiprāyeṇa 'yadā nimittene' tyādigranthena gauṇīṃ 'yadā vā svārthami' tyādagranthena lakṣaṇāñca darśayatītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6352: nanu guṇavṛtterbahurūpatve 'pi kimitīdaṃ bhedadvayaṃ sodāharaṇaṃ darśitamityata āha--anenetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:6358: vivakṣitavācyatvaṃ tadā na hyupapadyata iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6361: gaṅgādiśabdo hi gaṅgātīratvādinā kevalatīratvādinā vā gaṅgāyāstīrameva lakṣayatītyatoṃ'śena svārthāparityāgaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6382: tasya prabhedadvaye guṇavṛttiprabhedadvayarūpatā lakṣyata eva yataḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6383: ayamapi na doṣaḥ. yasmādavivakṣitavācyo dhvanirgumavṛttimārgāśrayo 'pi bhavati na tu guṇavṛttirūpa eva /
GK16andhvc3u:6385: vyañjakatvaṃ ca yathoktacārutvahetuṃ locanam evamabhyupagamaṃ pradarśakṣepaṃ darśayati---avivakṣiteti /
GK16andhvc3u:6388: avivakṣitavācyasya yatprabhedadvayaṃ tasmin gaumalākṣaṇikatvātmakaṃ prakāradvayaṃ lakṣyate nirbhāsyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6390: gumavṛtteryomārgaḥ prabhedadvayaṃ sa āśrayo nimittatayā prākkakṣyāniveśī yasyetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6395: yataḥ pūrvamevoktam-- mukhyāṃ vṛttiṃ parityajya guṇavṛttyārthadarśanam /
GK16andhvc3u:6396: yaduddiśya phalaṃ tatra śabdo naiva skhaladgatiḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:6398_0: na hi prayojanaśūnya upacāraḥ prayojanāṃśaniveśī ca vyañjanavyāpāra iti bhavadbhirevābhyādhāyītyāśaṅkyābhimataṃ
GK16andhvc3u:6409_0: nanu guṇavṛttirhi vyañjakatvaśūnyāpi dṛśyata ityanenaivāvivikṣitavācyasya guṇavṛttirūpatvābhāve
GK16andhvc3u:6422: sā abedopacārarūpā yathetyādyanvayo yāpītyādivākye vācyetyādervyaṅgyetyādeścānuṣaṅgaśca bodhyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6423: tatra vācyadharmāśrayeṇetyetatprakṛtānuguṇaṃ vivṛṇoti locane---vācyaviṣayo yo dharma iti /
GK16andhvc3u:6428: yathā ca 'priye jane nāsti punaruktam' ityādau /
GK16andhvc3u:6429: yāpi lakṣaṇarūpā guṇavṛttiḥ sāpyupalakṣaṇīyārthasaṃbandhamātrāśrayeṇa cārurūpavyaṅgyapratītiṃ vināpi sambhavatyeva,
GK16andhvc3u:6444: yathā pīno devadatto divā na bhuṅkta ityādau śrutasya pīnatvāde rupapādakatayā rātribhojanādikaṃ kalpyate /
GK16andhvc3u:6445_0: kalpitasya tasyārthāntarasya pīnatvādyupapādana eva paryavasānañca tathā guṇavṛttisthale
GK16andhvc3u:6448: priya iti tīkṣṇatvādatyādivadguṇarūpahetukathanaṃ punaruktapadenānupādeyatvaṃ lakṣyata iti pūrvamevoktam /
GK16andhvc3u:6452: upalaṇīyo lakṣyo yo 'rtho mañjasthabālakādistena saha yassambandha ādhārādheyabhāvādirmañcādapadamukhyārthasya tanmātrāśrayeṇetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6455: atra mañcasthabālakānāṃ bahutvādakaṃ vyaṅgyaṃ tadapi na cārutvakāri /
GK16andhvc3u:6457: nanu vināpi cāruvyaṅgyapratītiṃ vyañjanāvyāpāro bhavatvityata āha--tadabhāva ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:6463: kṣaṇa eva dṛṣṭo naṣṭaśca divyavibhavo yasya saḥ tathāvidho yaḥ prākṛto daridraḥ puruṣaḥ tadvat /
GK16andhvc3u:6464: tasya yathā pratyāvṛtya prākṛtavibhāva eva tathā vyañjanāvyāpārasya yatra tu sā cārurūpavyaṅgyapratītihetustatrāpi vyañjakatvānupraveśenaiva vācakatvavat /
GK16andhvc3u:6466_0: yathā---'suvarṇapuṣpāṃ pṛthivīm' ityādau tatra cārurūpavyaṅgyapratītireva prayojiketi
GK16andhvc3u:6466_1: tathāvidhe 'pi locanam nanu yatra vyaṅgye 'rthe viśrāntistatra kiṃ kartavyamityāśaṅkyāha--yatra tviti /
GK16andhvc3u:6469: vācakatve hi tvayaivāṅgīkṛto vyañjanavyāpāraḥ prathamaṃ dhvaniprabhedamapratyācakṣaṇeneti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6470: kiñca vastvantare mukhye sambhavati sambhavadeva vastvantaraṃ mukhyamevāropyate viṣayāntaramātratastvāropavyavahāra iti jīvitamupacārasya,
GK16andhvc3u:6471: suvarṇapuṣpāṇāṃ tu mūlata evāsambhavāttaduccayanasya tatra ka āropavyavahāraḥ;
GK16andhvc3u:6477: vyaṅgyameva hi prayojanarūpaṃ pratītiviśrāmasthāmāropite tvasambhavati pratitiviśrāntirāśaṅkanīyāpi na bhavati /
GK16andhvc3u:6495: nanu tayorubhayossatve kuta āropavyavahāra ityata āha---viṣayāntaramātrata iti /
GK16andhvc3u:6506: nanu tarhi suvarṇapuṣpāṃ pṛthivīmiti prayogaḥ kathamupapadyata ityata āha--suvarṇetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:6507: ityāropassyāddhīti sambandhaḥ. tadāropaṃ vinā tasya mahākaviprayogasyānirvāhāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6515: nanvasambhavadapi viṣaye guṇavṛttau satyāmapi dhvanivyavahāra eva yuktyanurodhī /
GK16andhvc3u:6516_1: tu tadekarūpā sahṛdayahṛdayāhlādinī pratīyamānā pratītihetutvādviyaṣāntare locanam satyāmapīti /
GK16andhvc3u:6518: vyañjakatvalakṣaṇo yo viśeṣastenāviśiṣṭā avidyamānaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ viśeṣo bhedanaṃ yasyāḥ vyañjakatvaṃ na tasyā bheda ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6519: yadi vā vyañjakatvalakṣaṇena vyāpāraviśeṣemāviśiṣṭā nyakkṛtasvābhāvā āsamantādvyāptā /
GK16andhvc3u:6521: tena vyañjakatvalakṣaṇena sahaikaṃ rūpaṃ yasyāḥ sā tathāvidhā na bhavati /
GK16andhvc3u:6523: na hi guṇavṛtteścārupratītihetutvamastīti bālapriyā vyaṅgyamātrānvitamāropitameva pratītiviśrāntisthānamastu,
GK16andhvc3u:6537: yadvā viśiṣṭaṃ viśeṣaḥ ādaraḥ avidyamānaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ yasyāsseti vyatpattimabhipretyāha--nyakkṛtasvabhāveti /
GK16andhvc3u:6544: yato guṇavṛttiḥ sahṛdayahṛdayāhlādinī pratīyamānā ca na bhavatyato na tadekarūpeti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6545: vyaṅgyagataṃ sahṛdayahṛdayāhṇādakatvaṃ pratīyamānatvañca vyañjakatve samāropya guṇavṛttestanniṣedhapūrvaktaṃ tadekarūpatvaṃ niṣiddhamiti bodhyam /
GK16andhvc3u:6559: api ca vyañjakatvalakṣaṇo yaḥ śabdārthayorgharmaḥ sa prasiddhasambandhānurodhīti na kasyācidvimativiṣayatāmarbahati /
GK16andhvc3u:6560: śabdārtharyorhi prasiddho yaḥ sambandho vācyavācakabhāvākhyāstamanurundhāna eva vyañjakatvalakṣaṇo vyāpāraḥ sāmagrantarasambandhādaupādhikaḥ pravartate /
GK16andhvc3u:6561: ata eva vācakatvāttasya viśeṣaḥ vācakatvaṃ hi śabdaviśeṣasya niyata ātmā vyutpattikālādārabhya tadavinābhāvena tasya prasiddhatvāt /
GK16andhvc3u:6567: niyatasvabhāvācca vācyavācakatvādaupādhikatvenāniyataṃ vyañjakatvaṃ kathaṃ na bhinnanimittamiti darśayati--api ceti /
GK16andhvc3u:6572: athāpi cetyādigrantho 'bhāvavādinaḥ prati sthūṇānikhanananyāyena vyañjakatvasādhaka ityabhiprāyeṇāvatārayati--niyatetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:6583: nanu sāmagryantarasambandhajanitatve 'pyayaṃ vyāpāro vācakavyāpāratvādabhidhaivāstvityata āha--ata evetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:6606: tathaivedaṃ yathā darśitaṃ locanam saphuṭayati--ata eveti /
GK16andhvc3u:6643: yasya yaraya vyaṅgyo 'rtho vidyate tasya tasya vyañjakatvamityevamarthaviṣaye niyatatvaṃ vyañjakatvasyāstyevetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6657: śabdātmanyaniyatatvādeva ca tasya vācakatvaprakāratā na śakyā kalpayitum /
GK16andhvc3u:6658: yadi hi vācakatvaprakāratā tasya bhavettacchabdātmani niyatatāpi syādvācakatvavat /
GK16andhvc3u:6659: sa ca tathāvidha aupādhiko dharmaḥ śabdānāmautpattikaśabdārthasambanthavādinā vākyatattvavidā pauruṣāpauruṣeyayorvākyayorviśeṣamabhidadhatā niyamenābhyupagantavyaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:6660: tadanabhyupagame hi tasya śabdārthasambandhanityatve satyapyapauruṣeyapauruṣeyayorvākyayorarthapratipādane locanam svasminviṣaye ca gṛhīte trairūpyādau na vyabhicarati /
GK16andhvc3u:6664: janmanā dvitīyo bhāvavikāraḥ sattārūpaḥ sāmīpyāllaṇāto vānutpattiḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:6669: pakṣadharmatājijñāsādīnāmanumitiṃ prati prayojakatvaṃ prācīnābhyupagataṃ tadvārā ca liṅgatvasya tadadhīnatvaṃ bodhyam /
GK16andhvc3u:6677: tatra trairūpyasya liṅge abādhitatvādessādhye ca grahaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6678: na vyabhicaratīti jñāpakatvaṃ svaviṣaye na vyabhicaratītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6679: svaviṣayāvyabhicārīti vṛttestu jñāpakatvasya viṣaye jñāpye vahnyādau na vyabhicaratītyevārthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6684_0: nanvevaṃ vyañjakatvaṃ na kasya cidvimativiṣayatāmarhantītyuktamayuktaṃ vyaṅgyavyañjakabhāvalakṣaṇasya
GK16andhvc3u:6687_0: 'autpattikastu śabdasyārthena sambandha' ityādijaiminīyaṃ sūtraṃ manasi kṛtyoktam
GK16andhvc3u:6687_1: 'autpattikastu śabdasyārthena sambandha' ityādijaiminīyaṃ sūtraṃ manasi kṛtyoktam 'autpattike'tyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:6690: jāyate asti vardhate vipariṇamate apakṣīyate naśyatīti ṣaṅvikārā bhāvānāmuktāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6691: tatra dvitīyassattārūpo vikāraḥ utpattipadārthena janmanā sāmīpyānnimittāllakṣyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6694: tadabhyupagame tu pauruṣeyāṇāṃ vākyānāṃ puruṣecchānuvidhānasamāropitaupādhikavyāpārāntarāṇāṃ satyapi svābhidheyasambandhāparityāge mithyārthatāpi bhavet /
GK16andhvc3u:6695: locanam rūḍhyā vā autpattikaśabdo nityaparyāyaḥ tena nityaṃ yaḥ śabdārthayoḥ śaktilakṣaṇaṃ saṃbandhamicchati jaimineyastenetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6697: tataśca puruṣadoṣānupraveśasyākiñcitkaratvāttannibandhaṃ pauruṣeyeṣu vākyeṣu yadaprāmāṇyaṃ tanna sidhyet /
GK16andhvc3u:6698: pratipattureva hi yaditathā pratipattistarhi vākyasya na kaścidaparādha iti kathamaprāmāṇyam /
GK16andhvc3u:6700: bālapriyā ityanuṣaṅgaḥ virodharūpasambandhena nimittena janmanā tpattirlakṣyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6719: nirviśeṣatvaṃ syādityatreṣṭāpattiṃ parihartuṃ nirviśeṣatve doṣaṃ darśayati--tataścetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:6721: puruṣe vaktari yaḥ kādācitko doṣasya bhramāderanupraveśaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:6726: pauruṣeyeṣu laukikeṣu vākyeṣu ayathārthavākyeṣu aprāmāṇyam yathārthatvanimittakamaprāmāṇyam /
GK16andhvc3u:6737: puruṣecchāyāḥ vaktṛpuruṣābhiprāyasyānuvidhānāddhetoḥ samāropitaṃ kalpitamata evaupādhikañca yadvyāpārāntaraṃ yeṣu teṣāmityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6739: tathā hi--himamayūkhaprabhṛtīnāṃ nirvāpitasakalajīvalokaṃ śītalatvamudvahatāmeva priyāvirahadahanadahyamānamānasairjanairālokyamānānāṃ satāṃ santāpakāritvaṃ prasiddhameva /
GK16andhvc3u:6740: tasmātpauruṣeyāṇāṃ vākyānāṃ satyapi naisargike 'rthasambandhe mithyārthatvaṃ samarthayitumicchatā vācakatvavyatiriktaṃ kiñcadrūpamaupādhikaṃ vyaktamevābhidhānīyam /
GK16andhvc3u:6743: pauruṣeyāṇi ca vākyāni prādhānyena puruṣābhiprāyameva prakāśayanti /
GK16andhvc3u:6744: sa ca vyaṅgya eva locanam nanu dharmāntarābhyupagame 'pi kathaṃ mithyārthatā,
GK16andhvc3u:6745: na hi prakāśakatvalakṣaṇaṃ svadharmaṃ jahāti śabda ityāśaṅkyāha--duśyata iti /
GK16andhvc3u:6747: yadāha--“evamayaṃ puruṣā vedeti bhavati pratyayaḥ na tvevamayamartha” iti /
GK16andhvc3u:6749: na tu bālapriyā uktārthasyānubhavasiddhatvamuktaṃ dṛśyata ityādinā tadvacanaṃ kimarthamityatastadganthamavatārayati--nanvityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:6758: sāmagnyantarasampātena sampāditamata evaupādhikaṃ dharmāntaraṃ yeṣu teṣām /
GK16andhvc3u:6762: tathāvidhaṃ śītalatvamudvahatāmityanenāparityaktasvabhāvatvaṃ priyāvirahetyādanā sāmagryantaretyādyuktaṃ santāpakāritvamityanena viruddhakriyatvañca darśitam /
GK16andhvc3u:6765: pauruṣeyāṇi vākyāni prādhānyena puruṣābhiprāyameva prakāśayantītyatra jaiminisūtrabhāṣyakṛdvacanaṃ pramāṇayati--yadāheti /
GK16andhvc3u:6778: nanvaneva nyāyena sarveṣāmeva laukikānāṃ vākyānāṃ dhvanivyavahāraḥ prasaktaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6781: kiṃ tu vakrabhiprāyuprakāśanena yadvyañjakatvaṃ tatsarveṣāmeva laukikānāṃ vākyānāmaviśiṣṭam /
GK16andhvc3u:6782: tattu vācakatvānna bhidyate vyaṅgyaṃ hi tatra nāntarīyakatayā vyavasthitam /
GK16andhvc3u:6787: bālapriyā nanvastu puruṣābhiprāyo vyaṅgyaḥ vyāpārāntarañca vyañjakatvaṃ vākyasya,
GK16andhvc3u:6789: tathā abhiprāyavyañjakatvena prakāreṇa atra pauruṣeyavākye viṣaye /
GK16andhvc3u:6802: tathāvoktarūpasya śabdārthasambandhasya nityatve 'pi pauruṣeyavākyānāṃ puruṣābhiprāyānuvidhāyitvāttadabhipretaṃ yadvākyārthasyāsatyatvaṃ,
GK16andhvc3u:6804: apauruṣeyāṇāṃ vākyānāntu vakturabhāvena teṣāṃ sarveṣāmeva prāmāṇyañceti bodhyam /
GK16andhvc3u:6809: anena śabdasya vyaṅgyena saha yassambandhastasya vācyavācakabhāvatvaṃ nāstīti darśitaṃ,
GK16andhvc3u:6820: yadvyajakatvaṃ tattu vācakatvānna bhidyata iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6825: yasya tu vivakṣitatvena vyaṅgyasya sthitiḥ tadyvañjakatvaṃ dhvanivyavahārasya prayojakam /
GK16andhvc3u:6826: locanam gāmānayeti śrute 'pyabhiprāye vyakte tadabhiprāyaviśiṣṭo 'rtha evābhipretānayanādakriyāyogyo na tvabhiprāyamātreṇa kiñcitkṛtyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6834: nanvevamabhiprāyasyaiva vyaṅgyatvāttrividhaṃ vyaṅgyamiti yaduktaṃ tatkathamityāha--- bālapriyā 'nāntarīyakataye'ti /
GK16andhvc3u:6841: gokarmakānayanādikriyārūpārthaṃ vinā abhiprāyāsiddhirataśca na vācakatvātpṛthagvyañjakatvaṃ vācyādyvaṅgyamiveti ca bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6846: nanu dhvanyudāharaṇeṣvapi laukikavākyeṣviva vivakṣitatvāparaparyāyaṃ prādhānyaṃ vācyasya vidyata ityāśaṅkyāyāmabhiprāyamāha---kāvyavācakyebhya ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:6859: tanmūlakatvāditi kathaṃ vyaṅgyasya prādhānyamityata āha--sā cetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:6864: ataśca vācyasya na vivakṣitatvalakṣaṇaṃ prādhānyaṃ kāvyavākyeṣviti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6866: vṛttāvabhiprāyaviśeṣarūpaṃ yadyvaṅgyantu tātparyeṇa prakāśyamānaṃ sacchaśabdārthābhyāṃ prakāśyate tadvivakṣitaṃ bhavatīti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6876: yattvabhiprāyaviśeṣarūpaṃ vyaṅgyaṃ śabdārthābhyāṃ prakāśate tadbhavati vivakṣitaṃ tātparyeṇa prakāśyamānaṃ sat /
GK16andhvc3u:6877: kintu tadeva kevalamaparimitaviṣayasya ghvanivyavahārasya na prayojakamavyāpakatvāt /
GK16andhvc3u:6878_1: ca sarvameva dhvanivyavahārasya prayojakamiti yathoktavyañjakatvaviśeṣa dhavnilakṣaṇe
GK16andhvc3u:6879: tasmādvākyatattvavidhāṃ matena tāvadyvañjakatvalakṣaṇaḥ śābdo vyāpāro na virodhī pratyutānuguṇa eva lakṣyate /
GK16andhvc3u:6880_1: iti locanam evaṃ mīmāṃsakānāṃ nātra vimatiryukteti pradarśya vaiyākaraṇānāṃ naivātra
GK16andhvc3u:6881_0: paritaḥ niścitaṃ pramāṇena sthāpitaṃ nirapabhraṃśaṃ galitabhedaprapañcatayā avidyāsaṃskārarahitaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:6889: gokarmakānayanādikriyārūpārthaṃ vinā abhiprāyāsiddhirataśca na vācakatvātpṛthagvyañjakatvaṃ vācyādvyaṅgyamiveti ca bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6894: nanu dhvanyudāharaṇeṣvapi laukikavākyeṣviva vivakṣitatvāparaparyāyaṃ prādhānyaṃ vācyasya vidyata ityāśaṅkāyāmabhiprāyamāha--kāvyavākyebhya ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:6907: tanmūlakatvāditi kathaṃ vyaṅgyasya prādhānyamityata āha--sā cetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:6912: ataśca vācyasya na vivakṣitatvalakṣaṇaṃ prādhānyaṃ kāvyavākyeṣviti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6914: vṛttāvabhiprāyaviśeṣarūpaṃ yadyvaṅgyantu tātparyeṇa prakāśyamānaṃ sacchaśabdārthābhyāṃ prakāśyate tadvivakṣitaṃ bhavatīti śambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6923: guṇībhūtvayaṅgyasthale 'bhiprāyarūpavyaṅgyasya yattvabhiprāyaviśeṣarūpaṃ vyaṅgyaṃ śabdārthābhyāṃ prakāśate tadbhavati vivakṣitaṃ tātparyeṇa prakāśyamānaṃ sat /
GK16andhvc3u:6924: kintu tadeva kevalamaparimitaviṣayasya dhvanivyavahārasya ya prayojakamavyāpakatvāt /
GK16andhvc3u:6925_1: ca sarvameva dhvanivyavahārasya prayojakamiti yathoktavyañjakatvaviśeṣe dhvanilakṣaṇe
GK16andhvc3u:6926: tasmādvākyattvavidāṃ matena tāvadyvañjakatvalakṣaṇaḥ śābdo vyāpāro na virodhī pratyutānuguṇa eva lakṣyate /
GK16andhvc3u:6927_1: iti locanam evaṃ mīmāṃsakānāṃ nātra vimatiryukteti pradarśya vaiyākaraṇānāṃ naivātra
GK16andhvc3u:6928_0: paritaḥ niścitaṃ pramāṇena sthāpitaṃ nirapabhraṃśaṃ galitabhedaprapañcatayā avidyāsaṃskārarahitaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:6936: paritaḥ bahumukhānvādinaḥ prati doṣaviśeṣavācināpabhraṃśaśabdenātra sarvadoṣaheturavidyāsaṃskāro lakṣyata ityāśayena vyācaṣṭe--galitetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:6941: śabda ityartha iti cākhyā yasya tat /
GK16andhvc3u:6948: viśeṣāṇāṃ vyaṣṭirūpāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ śaktibhirnirbharatāpūrṇatā tayā cetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6952: viseṣāṇāṃ vyaṣṭirūpāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ śaktibhirnirbharatāpūrṇatā tayā cetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6957: viśvasya yāni nirmāṇāni tadviṣayā yāḥ śaktayaḥ taiḥ saha kiṃ virodhāvirodhau cintyete /
GK16andhvc3u:6958: kṛtrimaśabdārthasambandhavādināṃ tu yuktividāmanubhavasiddha evāyaṃ vyañjakabhāvaḥ śabdānāmarthāntarāṇāmivāvirodhaśceti na pratikṣepyapadavīmavatarati /
GK16andhvc3u:6959: locanam etaduktaṃ bhavati--vaiyākaraṇāstāvadbrahmapadenānyatkiñcidicchanti tatra kā kathā vācakatvavyañjakatvayoḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:6962: evaṃ vākyavidāṃ padavidāṃ cāvimativiṣayatvaṃ pradarśya māṇatattvavidāṃ tārkikāṇāmapi na yuktātra vimatiriti darśayitumāha--kṛtrimeti /
GK16andhvc3u:6963: kṛtrimaḥ saṅketamātrasvabhāvaḥ parikalpitaḥ śabdārthayoḥ sambandha iti ye vadanti naiyāyikasaugatādayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6997: asya śabdasyāyamartha ityupadeśassa iti ca kecit /
GK16andhvc3u:7009: vyañjakatve tu tatpṛṣṭhabhāvini bhāvāntarasādhāraṇe lokaprasiddha evānugamyamāne ko vimatīnāmavasaraḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7010: locanam nanvanubhavena dvicandrādyapi siddhaṃ tacca vimatipadamityāśaṅkyāha--avirodhaśceti /
GK16andhvc3u:7011: avidyamāno virodho nirodho bādhakātmako dvitīyena jñānena yasya tenānubhavasiddhaścābādhitaścetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7014: naitat; na hi vācakatve sā vimatiḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:7015: api tu vācakatvasya naisargikatvakṛtrimatvādau tadāha--vācakatve hīti /
GK16andhvc3u:7016: nanvevaṃ vyañjakatvasyāpi dharmāntaramukhena vipratipattiviṣayatāpi syādityāśaṅkyāha--vyañjakatve tviti /
GK16andhvc3u:7018: akṣinikocādeḥ sāṅketikatvaṃ cakṣurādikasyānādiryogyateti dṛṣṭvā bālapriyā yathā dīpādiḥ parikalpitanijaviṣayādanyaṃ viṣayamapi prakāśayati,
GK16andhvc3u:7019: tathā śabdo 'pi saṅketitādanyaṃ viṣayaṃ prakāśayatīti teṣāmapyanubhavasiddha evāyaṃ śabdānāṃ vyañjakabhāva iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7023: taccetyasya sthāne na ca neti ca pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7042: vācakatvasya vipratipattiviṣayatvaṃ vyañjakatvasya tadabhāvañca darśayan bhāvamāha--akṣītyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:7052: alaukike hyarthe tārkikāṇāṃ vimatayo nikhilāḥ pravartante na tu laukike /
GK16andhvc3u:7053: na hi nīlamadhurādhiṣvaśeṣalokendriyagocare bāghārahite tattve parasparaṃ vipratipannā dṛśyante /
GK16andhvc3u:7054: na hi bādhārahitaṃ nīlaṃ nīlamiti bruvannapareṇa pratiṣidhyate naitannīlaṃ pītametaditi /
GK16andhvc3u:7055_0: tathaiva vyañjakatvaṃ vācakānāṃ śabdānāmavācakānāṃ ca gītadhvanīnāmaśabdarūpāṇāṃ
GK16andhvc3u:7055_1: ca ceṣṭādīnāṃ locanam kāmamastu saṃśayaḥ śabdasyābhidheyaprakāśane vyañjakatvaṃ tu
GK16andhvc3u:7055_2: yādṛśamekarūpaṃ bhāvāntareṣu tādṛgeva prakṛte 'pīti niścataikarūpe kaḥ saṃśayasyāvakāśa ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7057: api tu prādhānikamidaṃ pāramāṇavamidaṃ jñānamātramidaṃ tucchadamiti tatsṛṣṭāvalaukikya eva vipratipattayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7060_1: saha sambandhasya sāṅkatikatvaṃ dvitīyasyārthena saha sambandhasya naisargikatvañca dṛṣṭverthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7062: śabdasya vācakatve kimidaṃ sāṅketikamāhosvinnaisargikamiti vācakatvadharmikassaṃśayaḥ kāmaṃ bhavatvityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7068: na tu laukika ityuktamupapādayati vṛttau 'na hī'tyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:7084: etanna nīlametatpītamiti na hi pratiṣidhyata iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7086: nīle etanna nīlamiti vipratipattirna hīti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7090: api tbityalaukikya eva vipratipattaya iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7110: aśabdamarthaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ hi sūcayanto vyāhārāstathā vyāpārā nibaddhāścānibaddhāśca vidagghapariṣatsu vividhā vibhāvyante /
GK16andhvc3u:7111: tānupahāsyatāmātmanaḥ pariharan ko 'tisandadhīta sacetāḥ locanam aśabdamiti /
GK16andhvc3u:7117: lakṣaṇe śatrādeśaḥ ātmanaḥ karmabhūtasya yopahasanīyatā tasyāḥ parihāreṇepalakṣitastāṃ parijīhīrṣurityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7133: tathābhūto vyāpāro vyañjakatvalakṣaṇo yeṣāṃ tathābhūtā ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7169: astyatisandhānāvasaraḥ vyañjakatvaṃ śabdānāṃ gamakatvaṃ tacca liṅgatvamataśca vyaṅgyapratītirliṅgipratītireveti liṅgiliṅgabhāva eva teṣāṃ vyaṅgyavyañjakabhāvo nāparaḥ kaścit /
GK16andhvc3u:7170: ataścaitadavaśyameva boddhavyaṃ yasmādvakrabhiprāyāpekṣayā vyañjakatvamidānīmeva tvayā pratipāditaṃ vakrabhiprāyaścānumeyarūpa eva /
GK16andhvc3u:7176: vyañjakatvaṃ nāpahnūyate tattvatiriktaṃ na bhavati api tu liṅgiliṅgabhāva evāyam /
GK16andhvc3u:7192: paroktaṃ svīkṛtyāpi svasiddhāntasthāpanāya yo vādassa prauñavādaḥ taṃ vadatīti prauḍhavādī,
GK16andhvc3u:7198: vṛttau 'tat kiṃ naḥ chinnam' ityuktasyaiva vivaraṇam--'vācakatve'tyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:7200: prasiddho yaśśabdasya prakāro dharmo 'bhidhā lakṣaṇā ca tadvilakṣaṇatvamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7208: vyañjakatvaṃ liṅgatvamastvityuktyā siddhaṃ nassamīhitamiti manyamānaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇaṃ pratyāha--'na punari'tyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:7210: na punarayaṃ paramārtho yadvyañjakatvaṃ liṅgatvameva sarvatra vyaṅgyapratītiśca liṅgipratītireveti /
GK16andhvc3u:7211_1: śabdānāṃ liṅgatvameveti tadetadyathāsmābhirabhihitaṃ tadvibhajyaṃ pratipādyate śrūyatām /
GK16andhvc3u:7214: vivakṣā ca śabdasvarūpaprakāśanecchā śabdenārthaprakāśanecchā ceti dviprakārā /
GK16andhvc3u:7218: te tu dve apyanumeyo viṣayaḥ śabdānām /
GK16andhvc3u:7221: prayoktā hi kadācitsvaśabdenārthe locanam śabdasya yo vyāpārastasya viṣayo viśeṣa ityāhuḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7223: pradīpālokādau liṅgiliṅgabhāvaśūnyo 'pi hi vyaṅgyañjakabhāvo 'stīti vyaṅgyavyañjakabhāvasya liṅgiliṅgabhāvo 'vyāpaka iti kathaṃ tādātmyam /
GK16andhvc3u:7225: śabda uccarite yāvati bālapriyā iti yadayaṃ punarna paramārthaṃ iti sambandhaḥ. atrābhiprāyamāha locane--pradīpetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:7227: liṅgiliṅgabhāvena liṅginirūpitaliṅgatvena śūnyaḥ vinā kṛtaḥ tadasamānādhikaraṇa iti yāvat /
GK16andhvc3u:7228: śūnye iti pāṭhe pradīpālokādāvityasya viśeṣaṇaṃ tat /
GK16andhvc3u:7235: yadi hi vyaṅgyavyañjakabhāvo liṅgiliṅgabhāva eva syānna tadatiriktaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:7236: tarhi yatra yatra vyaṅgyavyañjakabhāvastatra tatra liṅgiliṅgabhāvo 'pi bhavet,
GK16andhvc3u:7238: nanu vaktrabhiprāyasya vyañjakatvantu śabdasya liṅgatvameva vaktṛjñānānumāpakatvaṃ śabdasyeti vadatāṃ prābhākarāṇāṃ matasya saṃvādakatvādityāśaṅkāyāmuktaṃ vṛttau 'yadapī'tyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:7246: tatra śabdaprayuyukṣā arthapratipipādayiṣā cetyubhayyapi vivakṣānumeyā tāvat /
GK16andhvc3u:7247: yastu pratipipādayiṣāyāṃ karmabhūto 'rthasyatra śabdaḥ karaṇatvena vyavasthitaḥ na tvasāvanumeyaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:7249: na ca tatra śabdasyakaraṇatve yaiva liṅgasyetikartavyatā pakṣadharmatvagrahaṇādikā sāsti,
GK16andhvc3u:7256: śabdasvarūpaprakāśanecchayoccaritena śabdenāyaṃ prāṇīti śroturyā prāṇitvamātrasya pratipattiḥ mātrapadenārthasya vyavacchedaḥ sā phalaṃ yasyāssetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7260: śabdaviśeṣasya pratipipādayiṣitārthabodhānukūlasya vākyasya yadavadhāraṇaṃ vakturanusandhānaṃ tasminnavasitā paryavasitā tadutpādanena kṛtārtheti yāvat /
GK16andhvc3u:7261: ata eva vyavahitāpi śābdabodhaṃ prati vyavadhānavatyapi /
GK16andhvc3u:7263: śabdenārthaviśeṣasyāvadhāraṇe śroturbodhe avasitā paramparayā tadutpādiketi yāvat /
GK16andhvc3u:7281: pratipādanaṃ prati karaṇatvāttathāvidhārthaṃ prati karaṇatvaṃ bodhyam /
GK16andhvc3u:7288: pakṣadharmatvagrahaṇādikā liṅgasyetikartavyatā yā sā tatra śabdasya karaṇatvena cāstīti yojanā /
GK16andhvc3u:7295: tattacchabdasya tattadarthe yassaṅketastasya sphuraṇaṃ smaraṇaṃ sa tu dvividho 'pi pratipādyo viṣayaḥ śabdānāṃ na liṅgitayā svarūpeṇa prakāśate,
GK16andhvc3u:7297: vivakṣāviṣayatvaṃ hi tasyārthasya śabdairliṅgitayā pratīyate na tu svarūpam /
GK16andhvc3u:7298: yadi hi liṅgitayā tatra sabdānāṃ vyāpāraḥ syattacchabdārthe locanam tvanyaiva saṃketasphuraṇādikā tanna tatra śabdo liṅgam /
GK16andhvc3u:7299: itikartavyatā ca dvidhā--ekayābhidhāvyāpāraṃ karoti ditīyayā vyañjanāvyāpāram /
GK16andhvc3u:7325: gopanakṛtaṃ yatsaundaryaṃ sūkticārutvaṃ tadāderyo lābho niṣpattistadabhisandhānādikayetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7345: ayamarthassatyo mithyā vetyādisaṃśayāśca vastutaḥ pravartante tatpravṛttirna syādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7348: tatra yathā tadvivādā na pravartante tathetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7350: samyaṅ mithyātvāda vivādā eva na pravarteran dhūmādiliṅgānumitānumeyāntaravat /
GK16andhvc3u:7356: vaktricchā hi vācyāderarthasya bālapriyā kenacilliṅgena kasyacidarthasyānumitirniścayarūpaiva bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7359: nanu vyaṅgyatvenābhimatasyārthasya śabdena sambandhe sati tatra vyāpārassiddhyati,
GK16andhvc3u:7360: sa eva netyāśaṅkāyāmuktameva smārayati vṛttau 'vyaṅgyaścārthaṃ' ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:7366: nanu vācyasya sākṣātsambandhaḥ vyaṅgyasya tu taddvāraka ityata āha--'sākṣādi'tyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:7368: ata eva saṃyogasaṃyuktasamavāyādīnāṃ sannikarṣatvābhidhānaṃ saṅgacchata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7369: vyaṅgyasya vācyasāmarthyākṣiptatayā tena saha sambandhasya vācyadhaṭitatvamuktaṃ draḍhīkartuṃ pūrvoktaṃ smārayati--'vācye'tyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:7391: vyaṅgyatvenābhimato 'rtho na śabdasya liṅgaliṅgibhāvena sambandhī śabdapratipādyatvādvācyavadityanumānamanena darśitam /
GK16andhvc3u:7400: upādhiśabdo 'tra vyāvartakaparyāya ityāśayena vyācaṣṭe locane vaktricchetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:7402: anena vaktrāyamartho vivakṣita iti pratītau vivakṣā hyarthasya viśeṣeṇatvena bhāsate /
GK16andhvc3u:7403: tasmādityuktaṃ draḍhayituṃ pūrvoktameva smārayati eva vyaṅgye liṅgtayā śabdānāṃ vyāpāraḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7405: pratiyamāne tasminnabhiprāyarūpe 'nabhiprāyarūpe ca vācakatvenaiva vyāpāraḥ samnbandhāntareṇa vā /
GK16andhvc3u:7408: na ca vyañjakatvaṃ liṅgatvarūpameva ālokādiṣvanyathā dṛṣṭatvāt /
GK16andhvc3u:7409: tasmātpratipādyo viṣayaḥ śabdānāṃ na liṅgitvena sambandhī vācyavat /
GK16andhvc3u:7410: yo hi liṅgitvena teṣāṃ sambandhī yathā darśito viṣayaḥ sa na vācyatvena pratīyate,
GK16andhvc3u:7412: pratipādhasya ca viṣayasya liṅgitve tadviṣayāṇāṃ vipratipattīnāṃ laukikaireva kriyamāṇānāmabhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7421: icchāyāṃ loko na vipratipadyate 'rthe tu vipratipattimāneva /
GK16andhvc3u:7422: nanu yadā vyaṅgyo 'rthaḥ pratipannastadā satyatvaniścayo 'syānumānādeva pramāṇāntarāt kriyata iti punarapyanumeva evāsau /
GK16andhvc3u:7443: pratipādyasya vyaṅgyasya śabdāpekṣayā liṅgitvābhāve 'pi saṃvādakapramāṇāntarāpekṣayā liṅgitvaṃ bhavatyeveti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7448: yathā ca vācyaviṣaye pramāṇāntarānugamena samyaktvapratītau kvacitkriyamāṇāyāṃ tasya pramāṇāntaraviṣayatve styapi na śabdavyāpāraviṣayatāhānistadyvaṅgyasyāpi /
GK16andhvc3u:7450: na caitāvatā vācyasya pratotirānumānikī kiṃ tu tadgatasya tato 'dhikasya satyatvasya tadvyaṅgye 'pi bhaviṣyati /
GK16andhvc3u:7468: ebhirvacanairvākyārthasya satyatvamevāptoktatvarūpānumānena niścetavyamiti labhyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7486: kāvyaviṣaye ca vyaṅgyapratītināṃ satyāsatyanirūpaṇasyāprayojakatvameveti tatra pramāṇāntaravyāpāraparīkṣopahāsāyaiva sampadyate /
GK16andhvc3u:7487: tasmālliṅgipratītireva sarvatra vyaṅgyapratītiriti na śakyate vaktum /
GK16andhvc3u:7497: nāyaṃ sahṛdayaḥ kevalaṃ śuṣkatarkopakramakarkaśahṛdayaḥ pratītiṃ parāmarṣṭuṃ nālamityeṣa upahāsaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7498: nanvevaṃ tarhi mā bhūdyatra yatra vyañjakatā tatra tatrānumānatvam;
GK16andhvc3u:7499: yatra yatrānumānatvaṃ tatra tatra vyañjakatvamiti kathamapahnūyata ityāśaṅkyāha--yattvanumeyeti /
GK16andhvc3u:7501: nanvabhiprāyaviṣayaṃ yadvyañjakatvamanumānaikayogakṣemaṃ taccenna prayojakaṃ dhvanivyavahārasya tarhi kimarthaṃ bālapriyā teṣāṃ kāvyarūpāṇām /
GK16andhvc3u:7520: vṛttau tadvyañjakatvaṃ dhvanivyavahārasyāprayojakamityevoktamaprayojakatve heturnokta ityato 'bhipretaṃ hetuṃ darśayannāha--tadityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:7531: api tu vyañjakatvalakṣaṇaḥ śabdānāṃ vyāpāra autpattikaśabdārthasambandhavādināpyabhyupagantavya iti pradarśanārthamupanyastam /
GK16andhvc3u:7532: tadbhi vyañjakatvaṃ kadācilliṅgatvena kadācidrūpāntareṇa śabdānāṃ vācakānāmavācakānāṃ ca sarvavādibhirapratikṣepyamityayamasmābhiryatna ākhdhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7533: tadevaṃ guṇavṛttivācakatvādibhyaḥ śabdaprakārebhyo niyamenaiva tāvadvilakṣaṇaṃ vyañjakatvam /
GK16andhvc3u:7536_0: yata eva hi kvacidanumānānenābhiprāyādau kvacitpratyakṣeṇa dīpālokādau kvacitkāraṇatvena
GK16andhvc3u:7536_2: vyañjakatvaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tata eva tebhyaḥ sarvebhyo vilakṣaṇamasya rūpaṃ nassidhyati tadāha--tadevamiti /
GK16andhvc3u:7537: nanu prasiddhasya kimarthaṃ rūpasaṃkocaḥ kriyate abhidhāvyāpāraguṇavṛttyādeḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7547: yata eva hi abhiprāyadiviṣayaṃ śabdasya vyañjakatvamanumānainānumityā /
GK16andhvc3u:7551: avivakṣitavācyagataṃ vyañjakatvaṃ guṇavṛtyā ca anugṛhyamāṇaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ,
GK16andhvc3u:7558: anenāyaṃ prayogaḥ pradarśitaḥ--vimataṃ vyañjakatvamanumānādiprakārebhyo vilakṣaṇaṃ teṣu vyāvartamāneṣvapi anuvartamānatayāvabhāsamānatvāt,
GK16andhvc3u:7559: yadyeṣu vyāvartamāneṣvapyanuvartamānatayāvabhāsate tattebhyo bhinnaṃ yathā kusumebhyaḥ sūtramiti /
GK16andhvc3u:7563: prasiddhasyābhidhāvyāpāragumavṛtyāde rūpasaṅkocaḥ kimarthaṃ kriyata iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7571: tadantāpātitve 'pi tasya haṭhādabhidhīyamāne tadviśeṣasya dhvaneryatprakāśanaṃ vipratipattinirāsāya sahṛdayavyutpattaye vā tatkriyamāṇamanatisandheyameva /
GK16andhvc3u:7574: evaṃ hi sati sattāmātralakṣaṇe kṛte sakalasadvastulakṣaṇānāṃ paunaruktyaprasaṅgaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7577: na vayaṃ saṃjñāniveśanādi niṣedhāma iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7583: tripadārthasaṅkarī sattetyanenaiva dravyaguṇakarmaṇāṃ lakṣitatvācchrutismṛtyāyurvadadhanurvedaprabhṛtīnāṃ bālapriyā viśiṣṭaṃ rūpamiti /
GK16andhvc3u:7594: vastuni hi samucitā vimatirna nāmamātra iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7615: yatra vyaṅgyānvaye vācya-cārutvaṃ syāt prakarṣavat // DhvK_3.34 //
GK16andhvc3u:7621: ata evādhunātra na kasyacidvimatiretasmātkṣaṇātprabhṛtīti pratipādayitum--āsīt ityuktam // 3.3 //
GK16andhvc3u:7622_0: evaṃ yāvaddhvanerātmīyaṃ rūpaṃ bhedopabhedasahitaṃ yacca vyañjakabhedamukhena rūpaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:7622_2: viniveśayituṃ vyañjakavādasthānaṃ racitamiti dhvaniṃ prati yadvaktavyaṃ taduktameva /
GK16andhvc3u:7623_0: adhunā tu guṇaibhūto 'pyayaṃ vyaṅgyaḥ kavivācaḥ pavitrayatītyamunā dvāreṇa tasyaivātmatvaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:7643: nanu kāvyasyātmā dhvanirityabhyupagamena kāvyātmabhūtadhvanisvarūpapratipādanamātravṛttatvāt kimarthaṃ guṇībhūtavyaṅgyapratipādanaṃ kṛtaṃ,
GK16andhvc3u:7654: cārutvaprakarṣahetutvena vyaṅgyānvayasya kārikāyāndarśitatvānna vyaṅgyasambandhamātraṃ vyaṅgyo 'rtho lalanālāvaṇyaprakhyo yaḥ pratipāditastasya prādhānye dhvanirityuktam /
GK16andhvc3u:7655: tasya tu guṇībhāvena vācyacārutvaprakarṣe guṇībhūtvayaṅgyo nāma kāvyaprabhedaḥ prakalpyate /
GK16andhvc3u:7656: tatra vastumātrasya vyaṅgyasya tiraskṛtavācyebhyaḥ prīyamānasya kadācidvācyarūpavākyārthāpekṣayā guṇībhāve sati guṇībhūtavyaṅgyatā /
GK16andhvc3u:7657: yathā-- lāvaṇyasindhuraparaiva hi keyamatra yatrotpalāni śaśinā saha samplavante /
GK16andhvc3u:7658: unmajjati dviradakumbhataṭī ca yatra yatrāpare kadalikāṇḍamṛṇāladaṇḍāḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:7664: 'yatrārthaḥ śabdo vā' ityatrāntare vyaṅgyaṃ ca vastvāditrayaṃ tatra vastuno vyaṅgyasya ye bhedā uktāsteṣāṃ krameṇa guṇabhāvaṃ darśayati---tatreti /
GK16andhvc3u:7673: tatra caiṣāṃ svārthasya sarvathānupapatterandhaśabdoktena nyāyena tiraskṛtavācyatvam /
GK16andhvc3u:7690: vastumātrasya vyaṅgyasyetyādivṛttyuktaṃ sarvaṃ krameṇa pradarśayiṣyannadau bhūmikāṃ racayati locane--abhilāṣetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:7707_1: locanam sa ca pratīyamāno 'pyarthaviśeṣaḥ 'aparaiva hi keyaṃ' ityuktigarbhīkṛte vācyeṃ'śe
GK16andhvc3u:7711: niḥśvāsāndha ivādarśa ityatrāndhaśabdavyākhāyane ya ukto nyāyastenetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7712: pratīyamāno 'pītyapiśabdena svataḥ prāptapradhānabhāvasya vaiparītyena guṇībāvāpattirviruddheti darśayati /
GK16andhvc3u:7715: aparaiva hīti keyamiti coktibhyāṃ sāmānyātmanākroḍīkṛta ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7723: svasya vācyasya ya ātmā svarūpantasya yadunmajjanamuddhurakandharatayāvasthānaṃ tayā upalakṣitasya /
GK16andhvc3u:7724: tathā nimajjinaṃ vyaṅgyajātaṃ pūrvoktaṃ yena tasya /
GK16andhvc3u:7730: tathā sakalalokasārabhūtāśca ye kuvalayādayo bhāvāḥ padārthasteṣāṃ vargasya /
