GK16andhvc3u:7731: atisumagaṃ yadekādhikaraṇaṃ nāyikārūpaṃ tatra yā viśrāntiḥ saṃśliṣyāvasthitistāyā labdhaṃ samuccarūpaṃ saṅghātarūpatvaṃ yena tasya bhāvastattā tayā hetunā /
GK16andhvc3u:7732: yā vismayavibhāvatāprāptistasyāḥ puraskāreṇa purassarīkāreṇeti ca pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7737: tarhi vyaṅgyasya prādhānyamāpatitaṃ tasyaiva vibhāvatāprāptau prayojakatvādityata āha--vācyarūponmajjaneneti /
GK16andhvc3u:7742: yathohāhṛtam---'saṅketakālamanasam' locanam ata eveyati yadyapi vācyasya prādhānyaṃ ,
GK16andhvc3u:7743: tathāpi rasadhvanau tasyāpi guṇateti sarvasya guṇībhūtavyaṅgyasya prākare mantavyam /
GK16andhvc3u:7750: bālapriyā vyaṅgyasya kaṭākṣavadanādervācyakuvalayacandrādirūpatvena darśanaṃ hyabhilāṣādijanane nimittamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7759: yadi guṇībhūtavyaṅgyaprabhede vācyārthasyaiva prādhānyaṃ syāttdā dhvaniḥ kāvyasyātmeti tatra tatroddhoṣyamāṇamasaṅgataṃ syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7760: śokasyāsya kvacitprabandhe 'nupalambhānmuktakasyaucityānusāreṇa varṇyaviśeṣanirvarṇanāvidheyeti darśayan pakṣāntaramāha--anye tvityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:7761: lāvaṇyadravasundarīkṛtanadīviṣayetyanena lāvaṇyasindhurityetadvivṛtaṃ lāvaṇyamayī lāvaṇyasundarīkṛtā vā sindhuriti vigrahaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:7762: sindhuśabdo na tiraskṛtavācyo vyañjaka iti ca bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7764: asmin pakṣe kuvalayādīnāmatisubhagaikādhikaraṇasamāveśakṛtasaubhāgyalābho na sāmañjasyena bhavatītyasvarasamanya ityanena sūcayan pakṣāntaramāha--yadi vetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:7767: na ca prāguktadoṣastaruṇyā eva varṇanīyatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7771_2: vaktavyatayā kathamatiraskṛtavācyatvamiti śaṅkāṃ parijihīrṣuḥ pratyuta tatpadasya
GK16andhvc3u:7776: locanam etacca prathamoddyota eva nirūpitam anurāgaśabdasya cābhilāṣe taduparaktatvalakṣaṇayā lāvaṇyaśabdavatpravṛttirityabhiprāyeṇātiraskṛtavācyatvamuktam /
GK16andhvc3u:7782: guṇībhāve vā kathamacārutvaṃ na syādityāśaṅkya pratyuta sundaratā bhavatīti prasiddhadṛṣṭāntamukhena darśayati---tatra ceti /
GK16andhvc3u:7784: evaṃ vastuno rasādeśca guṇībhāvaṃ pradarśyālaṅkārātmano 'pi tṛtīyasya vyaṅgyaprakārasya taṃ darśayati---vyaṅgyālaṅkārasyeti /
GK16andhvc3u:7786: evaṃ prakāratrayasyāpi guṇabhāvaṃ pradarśya bahutaralakṣyavyāpakatāsyeti darśayitumāha---tatheti /
GK16andhvc3u:7790: tatpadārthastadvastu taduparaktaṃ yena tattvaṃ vastūparañjakatvaṃ tena nimittena lakṣaṇayetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7796: rasavadalaṅkāraviṣayaḥ prākdarśita iti ca vṛttau pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7801: nanu pradhānasyāpi sato rasādeḥ kavivivakṣāvaśādguṇībhāvaḥ kinna syādityata āha--guṇībhāve veti /
GK16andhvc3u:7805: pratyuta bhṛtyotkarṣaviśeṣo 'pi rājotkarṣātiśayāyaiva kalpiṣyata iti cārutvameva puṣṇātīti bhāvaḥ // 3.4 //
GK16andhvc3u:7809: sukhāvahā ityanena teṣu prakāro 'yameva yojya tathā---
GK16andhvc3u:7812: ye ca teṣu prakāro 'yam eva yojyāḥ sumedhasā // DhvK_3.35 //
GK16andhvc3u:7815: ye ca teṣu prakāro 'yameva yojyaḥ sumedhasā // 35 //
GK16andhvc3u:7816: ye caite 'parimitasvarūpā api prakāśamānāstathāvidhārtharamaṇīyāḥ santo vivekināṃ sukhāvahāḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:7817: kāvyabandhāsteṣu sarveṣvevāyaṃ prakāro guṇībhūtavyaṅgyo nāma yojanīyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7819: lacchī duhidā jāmāuo harī taṃsa dhariṇiā gaṅgā /
GK16andhvc3u:7820: locanam prasannāni prasādaguṇayogādgabhīrāṇi ca vyaṅgyārthakṣepakatvātpadāni yeṣu /
GK16andhvc3u:7824: yastvetaṃ prakāraṃ tatra yojayituṃ na śaktaḥ sa paramalīkasahṛdayabhāvanāmukulitalocanoktyopahasanīyaḥ syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7827: tathā gṛhiṇī gaṅgā yasyāḥ samabhilaṣaṇīye sarvasminvastunyapahata upāyabhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7830_1: mukhyeṃ phalamiti trailokyasārabhūtatā bālapriyā ityatra tatprakārasya cārutvehetutvaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:7832: sahṛdayatvapratiṣṭālābhaścaitatprakārayojanakauśalaśālitānibandhana eveti tadarthibhistadviṣaye mahāprayatna ādheya iti darśayituṃ sumedhasetyuktamityāha--yastvetamityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:7834: ayaṃ na sahṛdayaḥ kintvalīkasahṛdayabhāvanayā asatyasya sahṛdayatvastha bhāvanayā rasāsvādavaivaśyaṃ manasaḥ prakaṭayituṃ mukulitalocana āste,
GK16andhvc3u:7850: yasyāṃ snānādyadārādhanāditaśca yā labhyate sā gaṅgāsya gṛhiṇyeva,
GK16andhvc3u:7853: labdhāyā āmiamiaṅkā a suā aho kuḍumbaṃ mahoahiṇo //
GK16andhvc3u:7856: prāyeṇaiva parāṃ chāyāṃ bibhral lakṣye nirīkṣyate // DhvK_3.36 //
GK16andhvc3u:7860: vācyālaṅkāravargo 'yaṃ vyaṅgyāṃśasyālaṅkārasya vastumātrasya vā yathoyogamanugame sati cchāyātiśayaṃ vibhrallakṣaṇakārairekadeśena darśitaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7861: sa tu tathārūpaḥ prāyeṇa sarva eva parīkṣyamāṇo lakṣye nirīkṣyate /
GK16andhvc3u:7863: locanam pratīyamānā satī aho kuṭumbaṃ mahodadherityahośabdācca guṇībhāvamanubhavati // 3.5 //
GK16andhvc3u:7864: evaṃ niralaṅkāreṣūttānatāyāṃ tucchatayaiva bhāsamānamamunāntaḥsāreṇa kāvyaṃ pavitrīkṛtamityuktvālaṅkārasyāpyanenaiva ramyataratvamiti darśayati--vācyeti /
GK16andhvc3u:7868: bālapriyā lakṣmyāssampadrūpāyā upabhogābhāve cālabdhakalpatvāccandrodayakāle vāruṇyupabhogo hi mukhyaṃ phalaṃ,
GK16andhvc3u:7869: sa candrassā vāruṇī cāsya putrabhāvameva bhajata iti mahodadhireva trailokyasāra itīyānartho 'tra dhvananavyāpārādavagamyate /
GK16andhvc3u:7870: sa cāvagatassannaho kuṭumbamiti śabdaspṛṣṭatayā guṇībhāvamavalambate yataḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:7871: tadvyaṅgyārthajātopaskṛta eva vācyārtho vismayavibhāvatāṃ prāpnoti camatkārātiśayañca vidhatta iti // 3.4//
GK16andhvc3u:7874: lakṣmīrityādyuktodāharaṇe na kaścidalaṅgāraḥ sphuṭo 'vagamyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7888: vyaṅgyāṃśānugama ityatra vyaṅgyasya vācyaṃ pratyaṃśatvaṃ guṇībhūtatvamevetyāha--aṃśatvaṃ guṇamātratvamiti /
GK16andhvc3u:7890: nāmagrahaṇe nāmaikadeśagrahaṇamiti nyāyenaikadeśaśabda ekadeśavivartirūpakapara iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7892: kṛtaiva ca sā mahākavibhiḥ kāmapi kāvyaccharvipuṣyati,
GK16andhvc3u:7893_0: kathaṃ hyatiśayayogitā svaviṣayaucityena kriyamāṇā satī kāvye locanam tadayamarthaḥ--ekadeśavivartirūpake---
GK16andhvc3u:7893_1: rājasaṃsairavījyanta śaradaiva saronṛpāḥ ityatra haṃsānāṃ yaccāmaratvaṃ pratīyamānaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:7893_2: tannṛpā iti vācye 'rthe vācye 'rthe guṇatāṃ prāptamalaṅkārakārairyāvadeva darśitaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:7895: vyaṅgyaṃ yadalaṅkārāntaraṃ vastvantaraṃ ca saṃspṛśanti ye svātmanaḥ saṃskārāyāśliṣyantīti te tathā /
GK16andhvc3u:7898: kāvyaśobhāṃ puṣyatīti yaduktaṃ tatra hetumāha---kathaṃ hīti /
GK16andhvc3u:7900: atiśayayogitā kathaṃ notkarṣamāvahet kāvye nāstyevāsau prakāra ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7901: svaviṣaye yadaucityaṃ tena ceddhṛdayasthitena tāmatiśayoktiṃ kaviḥ karoti /
GK16andhvc3u:7902: yathā bhaṭṭendurājasya-- yadviśramya vilokiteṣu bahuśo niḥsthemanī locane yadgātrāṇi daridrati pratidinaṃ lūnābjinīnālavat /
GK16andhvc3u:7932: karoti cettadā nāstyevāsau prakāra iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7934: bhāmahenāpyatiśayoktilakṣaṇe yaduktam--- locanam dūrvākāṇḍaviḍambakaśca nibiḍo yatpāṇḍimā gaṇḍayoḥ kṛṇṇe yūni sayauvanāsu vanitāsveṣaiva veṣasthitiḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:7935: atra hi bhagavato manmathavapuṣaḥ saubhāgyaviṣayaḥ sambhāvyata evāyamatiśaya iti tatkāvye lokottaraiva śobhollasati /
GK16andhvc3u:7940: nanvatiśayoktiḥ sarvālaṅkāreṣu vyaṅgyatayāntalīṃnaivāsta iti yaduktaṃ tatkatham?
GK16andhvc3u:7942: na ca sāmānyaṃ śabdādviśeṣapratīteḥ pṛthagbhūtatayā paścāttanatvena cakāstīti kathamasya vyaṅgyatvamityāśaṅkyāha--bhāmaheneti /
GK16andhvc3u:7967: atrātimahato 'pyavakāśātmakākāśasyālpatvena nirmāṇoktyā tato 'pyatiśayitaṃ mahatvaṃ stanayoḥ pratīyata iti atiśayoktirvyaṅgyā,
GK16andhvc3u:7968: parantviyaṃ stanayostathāvidhamahatvasyāsambhāvyamānatvenānaucityavatīti kāvyotkarṣaṃ sampādayituṃ na kṣamata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7979: 'saiṣā' yeyamuktātiśayoktiḥ saiveti tattadalaṅkārāṇāṃ viśeṣatvaṃ tatsāmānyarūpatvañcātiśayokteriti tadarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7980: bhavatvevaṃ tāvatā prakṛte kimāyātamityata āha--na cetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:7982: vyaṅgyaṃ hi vācyāta pṛthaktayā tatpratītyuttaraṃ śabdātpratīyate samānyantvanyathā gaurityādiśabdena saiṣā sarvaiva vakroktiranayārtho vibhāvyate /
GK16andhvc3u:7985: tatrātiśayoktiryamalaṅkāramadhitiṣṭhati kavipratibhāvaśāttasya cārutvātiśayayogo 'nyasya locanam bhāmahenāpi yaduktaṃ tatrāyamevārtho 'vagantavya iti dūreṇa sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7987: yātiśayoktirlakṣitā saiva sarvā vakroktiralaṅkāra prakāraḥ sarvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7989: śabdasya hi vakratā abhidheyasya ca vakratā lokottīrṇena rūpeṇāvasthānamityayamevāsāvalaṅkārasyālaṅkārabhāvaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:7995_1: tatpṛthaktayā bhāsamānatvaṃ vyāpakaṃ vyāpakaṃ nivartamānaṃ svavyāpyaṃ vyaṅgyatvamapi
GK16andhvc3u:8032: tasyāścālaṅkārāntarasaṃkīrṇatvaṃ locanam viśeṣeṇa ca bhāvyate rasamayīkriyate,
GK16andhvc3u:8038: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ---yadi tāvadatiśayokteḥ sarvālaṅkāreṣu sāmānyarūpatā sā tarhi tādātmyaparyavasāyinīti tadyvatirikto naivālaṅkāro dṛśyata iti kavipratibhānaṃ na tatrāpekṣaṇīyaṃ syāt /
GK16andhvc3u:8063: yathā khaṇḍamuṇḍādiviśeṣeṣu gotvāderanuvṛttatayā sāmānyarūpatvantathā upamādiviśeṣeṣvatiśayokteranuvṛttatayā sāmānyātmakatvātsarvā vakroktissaivetyabhedavyapadeśo mukhyo vā,
GK16andhvc3u:8064_1: kāvyajīvitatvaṃ vā vivakṣitamiti vikalpaṃ manasi kṛtyādyandūṣayati--yadi tāvadityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8066: tathāca yathā khaṇḍamuṇḍādayo gotvādyātmakāstathā sarve 'laṅkārā atiśayoktyātmāna eva bhaveyuriti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8071_0: yathā khaṇḍādīnāṃ svata eva gotvādyākāraśālitvaṃ nānyāpekṣaṃ tathā upamāderatiśayayogitvamapīti
GK16andhvc3u:8072: vyaṅgyatvamapi locanam alaṅkāramātraṃ ca na kiñciddṛśyeta /
GK16andhvc3u:8075: aucityavatī jīvitamiti cet--aucityanibandhanaṃ rasabhāvādi muktvā nānyatkiñcidastīti tadevāntaryāmi mukhyaṃ jīvitamityabhyupagantavyaṃ na tu sā /
GK16andhvc3u:8076: etena yadāhuḥ kecit--aucityaghaṭitasundaraśabdārthamaye kāvye kimanyena dhvaninātmabhūteneti te svavacanameva dhvanisadbhāvabhyupagamasākṣibhūtaṃ manyamānāḥ pratyuktāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8088: kāvyajīvitatvenetthaṃ vivakṣitā kāvyajīvitatvapradarśanāya sarvā vakroktisyaiṣetyuktā tathāpītyaṅgīkṛtya vādasūcakam /
GK16andhvc3u:8110: sarvā vakroktissaiṣeti nirdeśo mukhaṃ candra ityādivadabhedopacāra evetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8117: tasyā ityasya vācyatvenetyanenāpi sambandha iti vyācaṣṭe--sāpītyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8129_0: yeṣu cālaṅkāreṣu sādṛśyamukhena tattvapratilambhaḥ yathā rupakopamātulyayogatānidarśanādiṣu
GK16andhvc3u:8129_1: teṣu gamyamānadharmamukhenaiva yatsādṛśyaṃ tadeva śobhātiśayaśāli bhavatīti te sarve
GK16andhvc3u:8131: teṣu prakāreṣu madhye ya ādyaḥ prakārastasmin /
GK16andhvc3u:8132: nanvatiśayoktireva cedevambhūtā tatkimapekṣayā prathamaṃ tāvaditi kramaḥ sūcita ityāśaṅkyāha--ayaṃ cati /
GK16andhvc3u:8135: evamalaṅkāreṣu tāvadvyaṅgyasparśo 'stītyuktyā tatra kiṃ vyaṅgyatvena bhātīti /
GK16andhvc3u:8138: nidarśanāyāstu 'kriyayaiva tadarthasya bālapriyā vyaṅgyatayā sthātumārabdhāyā api aparaiveti śabdena spṛṣṭatvādvācyatvamāpatitamiti dvayorvācyatvamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8151: kramo hi satsveva bahuṣu kramikeṣu ghaṭeta,
GK16andhvc3u:8166: rūpakādau sādṛśyaṃ vyaṅgyamupamā tu tatsvarūpaiveti bodhyam /
GK16andhvc3u:8180: tathā hi 'prabhāmahatyā śikhayeva dīpaḥ' ityādau sphuṭaiva dīpakacchāyā lakṣyate /
GK16andhvc3u:8187: upamāgarbhatva ityapamāśabdena sarva eva tadviśeṣā rūpakādayaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:8190: 'tayā sa pūtaśca vibhūṣitaśca' ityetena dīpasthānīyena dīpanāddīpakamatrānupraviṣṭaṃ pratīyamānatayā,
GK16andhvc3u:8213: anena dīpa iveti dīpayatīti vā dīpakaśabdavyutpattirdarśitā /
GK16andhvc3u:8218: tadevaṃ vyaṅgyāṃśasaṃsparśe saṃti cārutvātiśayayogino rūpakādayo 'laṅkārāḥ sarva eva guṇībhūtavyaṅgyasya mārgaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8219: guṇībhūtavyaṅgyatvaṃ ca teṣāṃ tathājātīyānāṃ sarveṣāmevoktānuktānāṃ sāmānyam /
GK16andhvc3u:8220: tallakṣaṇe sarva evaite locanam hyetadupamāyāṃ spaṣṭenābhidhāprakāreṇaiva /
GK16andhvc3u:8223: sulakṣitā iti yatkilaiṣāṃ tadvinirmuktaṃ rūpaṃ na tatkāvye 'bhyarthanīyam /
GK16andhvc3u:8233: aprastutapraśaṃsā sarvāṇi jñāpakāni yathā padasaṃjñāyāmantavacanam--'anyatra saṃjñāvidhau pratyayagrahaṇe tadantavidhirna' iti /
GK16andhvc3u:8234: ākṣepaścobhayatra vibhāṣāsu vikalpātmakaviśeṣābhidhitsayā iṣṭasyāpi vidheḥ pūrvaṃ niṣedhanātpratiṣedhena bālapriyā atra hetundarśayannāha---sādhāraṇetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8244: mālopamātiriktopāttadharmakopamāsthale tu dharmasyobhayatra sambandhaḥ spaṣṭamabhidhīyata iti na dīpakasya vyaṅgyatayānupraveśa iti mālopametyuktam /
GK16andhvc3u:8247: anye copamādayo 'laṅkārāstatkathaṃ guṇībhūtavyaṅgyalakṣaṇe kṛte teṣāṃ lakṣitatvasiddhirityato 'bhiprāyamudbhedayannāha--yatkiletyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8266: ekaikasya svarūpaviśeṣakathanena tu sāmānyalakṣaṇarahitena pratipādapāṭheneva śabdā na śakyante tattvato nirjñātum, ānantyāt /
GK16andhvc3u:8272: guṇībhūtavyaṅgyataivātrālaṅkāratāyāṃ marmabhūtā lakṣitāḥ tān suṣṭu lakṣayati /
GK16andhvc3u:8273: yayā supūrṇa kṛtvā lakṣitāḥ saṅgṛhītā bhavanti,
GK16andhvc3u:8279: rasasya svātmanaiva viśrāntidhāmna ānandātmakatvamiti nānavasthā kāciditi tātparyam /
GK16andhvc3u:8286: jalabāhulyapradarśanāya kuṇḍikāṃ viṣayīkṛtya samudra iti nirdeśādbhede abhedarūpātiśayoktiriti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8292: tallakṣaṇe sarva evaite sulakṣitā bhavantītyetasya vivaraṇam--guṇībhūtetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8296: uktena sāmānyalakṣaṇena vinā tattadviśeṣalakṣaṇasyaiva kathana ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8297: kvacadgranthe tūpamā hītyādikassaṅgṛhītā bhavantītyanto grantho na dṛśyate /
GK16andhvc3u:8298_0: nanu guṇībhūtavyaṅgyatvemeva sarveṣāmalaṅkārāṇāṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ tallakṣaṇena teṣāṃ
GK16andhvc3u:8303: nanvalaṅkāracārutvaprayojakaṃ guṇībhūtavyaṅgyasya cārutvaṃ vaktavyantadapyanyena prayuktantadapyanyenetyanavasthāprasaṅga ityata āha--vyaṅgyasyetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8304: yaduktantallakṣaṇe sarva ete sulakṣitā iti tadākṣipya tatsamādhānaparatayottaragranthamavatārayati--nanvityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8306: dīpakādau kvacideva cakāstyākṣepādau tu guṇībhūtavyaṅgyasya ca prakārāntareṇāpi vyaṅgyārthānugamalakṣaṇena viṣayatvamastyeva /
GK16andhvc3u:8307: tadayaṃ dhvaniniṣyandarūpo dvitīyo 'pi mahākaviviṣayo 'tiramaṇīyo lakṣaṇīyaḥ sahṛdayaiḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8308: sarvathā nāstyeva sahṛdayahṛdayahāriṇaḥ kāvyasya sa locanam lakṣitena sarveṣāṃ saṃgrahaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8309: maivam; vastumātraṃ vā raso vā vyaṅgyaṃ sadguṇībhūtaṃ bhaviṣyati tadevāha-guṇībhūtavyaṅgyasya ceti /
GK16andhvc3u:8311: yadi vetthamavataraṇikā--nanu guṇībhūtavyaṅgyenālaṅkārā yadi lakṣitāstarhi lakṣaṇaṃ vaktavyaṃ kimiti noktamityāśaṅkyāha--guṇībhūteti /
GK16andhvc3u:8313: kena lakṣaṇīyatvaṃ dhvanivyatirikto yaḥ prakāro vyaṅgyatvenārthānugamo nāma tadeva lakṣaṇaṃ tenetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8314: vyaṅgye lakṣite tadguṇībhāve ca nirūpite kimanyadasya lakṣakriyatāmiti tātparyam /
GK16andhvc3u:8322: yatra guṇībhūtavyaṅgyasthale 'laṅkāro na cakāsti tatreti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8325: sa lakṣaṇamasādhāraṇadharmaḥ svarūpaṃ vā yasya prakārāntarasya teneti tadarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8341: nanvetallakṣaṇanna prāguktamataḥ kathaṃ siddhavadabhidhānamityata āha--vyaṅgya ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8343: yatra vyaṅgyānvaya ityādinā guṇībhāvaśca nirūpita iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8355: locanam yatprāguktaṃ sakalasatkavikāvyopaniṣadbhūtamiti tanna pratāraṇamātramarthavādarūpaṃ mantavyamiti darśayitum--tadidamiti // 3.6 //
GK16andhvc3u:8367: kārikāyāṃ mukhyetyasya bhūṣetyanena sambandha iti darśayati--mukhyā bhūṣeti /
GK16andhvc3u:8374: gopanaiva sāro yasya tattathāvidhaṃ saundaryameva prāṇā yasyāstasyā bhāvastattā,
GK16andhvc3u:8381: kintu yoṣitāṃ yauvanārambhasambhāvinī kāpi hṛdayasya daśetyāha--antarityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8382: antarmadanodbhedajaṃ tadghṛdayasaundaryantadeva rūpaṃ yasyāssā madanodbhedarūpamanovikārātmiketi yāvat /
GK16andhvc3u:8388: prakārāntareṇāpi tadyathā---- visrambhotthā manmathājñāvidhāne ye mugdhākṣyāḥ ke 'pi līlāviśeṣāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8389: akṣuṇṇāste cetasā kevalena sthitvaikānte santataṃ bhāvanīyāḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:8391: tathā pratīyamānasya priyatamābhilāṣānunāyanamānaprabhṛteḥ cāyā kāntiḥ yayā /
GK16andhvc3u:8392: śṛṅgārarasataraṅgiṇī hi lajjāvaruddhā nirbharatayā tāstān vilāsānnetragātravikāraparamparārūpān prasūta iti gopanāsārasaundaryalajjāvijṛmbhitametaditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8394_0: manmathācāryeṇa tribhuvanavandyamānaśāsanena ata eva lajjāsādhvasadhvaṃsinā dattā
GK16andhvc3u:8403: rājā jñāto 'pyanatilaṅghanīyā hyācāryājñā “gurau ruṣṭe na kaścane“tyādivacanādata ācāryatvarūpaṇam /
GK16andhvc3u:8412: akṛtakāḥ akṛtrimāḥ tathā sambhogasya yā paribhāvanā āsvādaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:8422: ityatra ke 'pītyanena padena vācyamaspaṣṭamabhidadhatā pratīyamānaṃ vastvakliṣṭamanantamarpayatā kā chāyā nopapāditā /
GK16andhvc3u:8425: sā vyaṅgyasya guṇī-bhāve prakāram imam āśritā // DhvK_3.38 //
GK16andhvc3u:8429: yā caiṣā kākvā kvacidarthāntarapratītirdṛśyate sā vyaṅgyasyārthasya guṇībhāve sati guṇībhūtavyaṅgyalakṣaṇaṃ kāvyaprabhedamāśrayate /
GK16andhvc3u:8434: tatra hi sākāṅkṣanirākāṅkṣādikrameṇa paṭhyamāno 'sau śabdaḥ prakṛtārthātiriktamapi vāñchatīti laulyamasyābhidhīyate /
GK16andhvc3u:8435: yadi vār iṣadarthe kuśabdastasya bālapriyā arhā ityasyaiva vivaraṇam--ucitā iti /
GK16andhvc3u:8441: uktaṃ vyaṅgyaṃ vācyārthopaskārakaṃ satkāvyasya cārutvaṃ sampādayatītyarthaḥ // 3.7 //
GK16andhvc3u:8444: nanu laulyamicchā tatkathamatra ghaṭata ityata āha--tatra hītyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8447: yathoktaṃ kāvyānuśāsane--“sā ca kākurdvidhā sākāṅkṣā nirākāṅkṣā ca,
GK16andhvc3u:8451: kintu nyūnābhyadhikaḥ pramāṇabalena nirṇayayogyastadvākyaṃ sākāṅkṣaṃ tadviparītaṃ nirākāṅkṣam. vaktṛgāta hyākāṅkṣā vākye upacaryate /
GK16andhvc3u:8454: viṣayo 'pi trividhaḥ arthāntaraṃ tadarśagata eva viśeṣastadarthābhāvo ve“tyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8470: tena hṛdayasthavastupratīterīṣadbhūmiḥ kākuḥ tayā yār'thāntaragatiḥ sa kāvyaviśeṣa imaṃ guṇībhūtavyaṅgyaprakāramāśritaḥ. atra heturvyeṅgyasya tatra guṇībhāva eva bhavati /
GK16andhvc3u:8474: anye tvāhuḥ---vyaṅgyasya guṇībhāve 'yaṃ prakāraḥ anyathā tu tatrāpi dhvanitvameveti /
GK16andhvc3u:8475: taccāsat; kākuprayoge sarvatra śabdaspṛṣṭatvena vyaṅgyasyonmīlitasyāpi guṇībhāvāt kākurhi śabdasyaivala kaściddharmastena spṛṣṭaṃ 'gaupyaivaṃ gaditaḥ saleśaṃ' iti,
GK16andhvc3u:8477: ata eva 'bhama dhammia' ityādau kākuyojane guṇībhūtavyaṅgyataiva vyaktoktatvena tadābhimānāllokasya /
GK16andhvc3u:8481: ghārtarāṣṭrā iti ca sākāṅkṣadīptagadgadatārapraśamanoddīpanacitritā bālapriyā kaścidupāya ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8485: arthāntaragatirityanenārthāntarāvagamakaḥ kāvyaviśeṣo vivakṣita iti vakṣyati tadāśayena setyetadvyācaṣṭe--sa kāvyaviśeṣa iti /
GK16andhvc3u:8486: guṇībhāva iti saptamī nimitte guṇībhāvaddhetorityartha ityāha--tatretyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8488: arthāntaragātirityasya arthāntarasya pratītiriti yathāśrutārthakatve arthāntarapratītereva guṇībhūtavyaṅgyatvaṃ vaktavyaṃ bhavati,
GK16andhvc3u:8492: anye tu kākusthale yatra tadvyaṅgyasya prādhānyantatra dhvanitvaṃ,
GK16andhvc3u:8493: yatra guṇībhāvastatra guṇībhūtavyaṅgyatvaṃ tadetadvyaṅgyasya guṇībhāva ityanena darśitamiti vyācakṣate;
GK16andhvc3u:8513: sākāṅkṣā dīptā gadgadena tārāpraśamanoddīpanābhyāṃ citritā viśeṣavatī cetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8515: āma asaio orama paivvae ṇa tueṃ maliṇiaṃ sīlam /
GK16andhvc3u:8516: kiṃ uṇa jaṇassa jāa vva cāndilaṃ taṃ ṇa kāmemo //
GK16andhvc3u:8517: śabdaśaktireva hi svābhidheyasāmarthyākṣiptakākusahāyā satyarthaviśeṣapratipattiheturna kākumātram. viṣayāntare svecchākṛtātkākumātrāttathāvidhārthapratipattyasambhavāt /
GK16andhvc3u:8518: sa cārthaḥ kākuviśeṣasahāyaśabdavyāpāropārūḍho 'pyarthasāmarthyalabhya iti vyaṅgyarūpa eva /
GK16andhvc3u:8519_1: vyaṅgyamarthaṃ spṛśantī tenaivopakṛtā satīkrodhānubhāvarūpatāṃ vyaṅgyopaskṛtasya vācyasyaivādhatte /
GK16andhvc3u:8521: āma asatyaḥ uparama pativrate na tyā malinitaṃ śīlam /
GK16andhvc3u:8522: kiṃ punarjanasya jāyeva nāpitaṃ taṃ na kāmayāmahe //
GK16andhvc3u:8529: candilaṃ nāpitamiti pāmaraprakṛtiṃ na kāmayāmahe iti nirākāṅkṣagadgadopahāsagarbhā /
GK16andhvc3u:8530: eṣā hi kayācinnāpi tānuraktayā kulavadhvā dṛṣṭāvinayāyā upahāsyamānāyāḥ pratyupahāsāveśagarbhoktiḥ kākupradhānaiveti /
GK16andhvc3u:8532: bālapriyā dīptatārāvalaṅkārāntargatau praśamanoddīpane tvaṅgāntargate iti vivekaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8534: mayi jīvati dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ svasthā bhavantīti vācyārtha ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8554: pativrata iti na malinitamityatra ca kākvā tattadabhāvo vyaṅgya ityabhiprāyeṇāha--pativrata ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8559: anugama ityasya tadviśiṣṭavācyapratītistadā guṇībhūtavyaṅgyatayā tathāvidhārthadyotinaḥ kāvyasya vyapadeśaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8562: prabhedasyāsya viṣayo yaś ca yuktyā pratīyate /
GK16andhvc3u:8563: vidhātavyā sahṛdayair na tatra dhvani-yojanā // DhvK_3.38 //
GK16andhvc3u:8567: saṅkīrṇo hi kaściddhvanerguṇībhūtavyaṅgyasya ca lakṣye dṛśyate mārgaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8570: vācakatve 'nugamo guṇatvaṃ vyaṅgyavyañjakabhāvasya vyaṅgyaviśiṣṭavācyapratītyā tatraiva kāvyasya prakāśakatvaṃ kalpyate;
GK16andhvc3u:8571: tena na tathā vyapadeśa iti kākuyojanāyāṃ sarvatra guṇībhūtavyaṅgyataiva /
GK16andhvc3u:8572: ata eva 'mathnāmi kauravaśataṃ samare na kopāt' ityādau viparītalakṣaṇaṃ ya āhuste na samyakyarāmamṛśuḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8574: 'darśe yajeta' ityatra tu tathāvidhakākvādyupāyāntarābhāvadbhavatu viparītalakṣaṇā ityalamavāntareṇa bahunā // 3.8 //
GK16andhvc3u:8585: pratijñātakauravaśatavadhasya kruddhasya bhīmasenasya vacanamidamata eva na mathnāmītyādau viparītalakṣaṇeti kecittadāha--viparītetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8590: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ--na mathnāmītyādirūpasya mathanādiniṣedhasyādau pratītiḥ paścāttu mathnāmyevetyādirūpasya tanniṣedhaniṣedhasya pratītiritina,
GK16andhvc3u:8591: kintūccāraṇakāla eva kākubalānmathanādiniṣedhasya niṣeṣapratiyogitvenaiva na mathnāmi netyākārikā pratītirato mathanādiniṣedhasya vācyasya niṣedho vyaṅgya eveti /
GK16andhvc3u:8593: na dṛśyate candro 'treti vyutpattyā darśaśabdo 'māvāsyāyāṃ prayujyate /
GK16andhvc3u:8597: pramukha evānyatarāvadhāraṇaniyamāsambhavo yatra yuktiparāmarśaṃ tatra yasya yuktisahāyatā tatra tena vyapadeśaḥ kartavyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8599: yathā--- patyuḥ śiraścandrakalāmanena spṛśeti sakhyā parihāsapūrvam /
GK16andhvc3u:8600: sā rañjayitvā caraṇau kṛtāśīrmākhyena tāṃ nirvacanaṃ jaghāna //
GK16andhvc3u:8603: alaktakoparaktasya hi candramasaḥ parabhāgalābho 'navaratapādapatanaprasādanairvinā na patyurjhaṭiti yatheṣṭānuvartinyā bhāvyamiti copadeśaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8604: śirodhṛtā yā candrakalā tāmapi paribhaveti sapatnīlokāpajaya uktaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8614: yadā tu vyaṅgyādeva nyakkṛtavācyāttadā dhvanitvamiti cārutvapratītirūpakāryabalādeva tadanyatarāvadhāraṇasiddhirityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8624: 'nirvacanam' ityadivṛttigranthena darśataṃ vyaṅgyaṃ tasya guṇībhāvaṃ ca pradarśayati--anenetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8635: yathā ca--- prāyacchatoccaiḥ kusumāni māninī vipakṣagotraṃ dayitena lambhitā /
GK16andhvc3u:8636: na kiñcidūce caraṇena kevalaṃ lileśa bāṣpākulalocanā bhuvam //
GK16andhvc3u:8637: ityatra 'nirvacanaṃ jaghāna' 'na kiñjidūce' iti pratiṣedhamukhena vyaṅgyasyārthasyoktyā kiñcidviṣayīkṛtatvādguṇībhāva eva śobhate /
GK16andhvc3u:8638: yadā vakroktiṃ vinā vyaṅgyo 'rthastātparyeṇa pratīyate tadā tasya prādhānyam /
GK16andhvc3u:8649: evaṃvidheṣu śṛṅgārāvasareṣutāmevāyaṃ smaratīti mānanapradarśanamevātra na yuktamiti sātiśayamanyusaṃbhāro vyaṅgyo vacananiṣedhasyaiva vācyasya saṃskāraḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8665: 'na kiñcidūca' ityasya prayojanaṃ darśayan vyaṅgyamāha--evaṃ vidheṣvityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8683: yathā ca--- durārādhā rādhā subhaga yadanenāpi bhṛjata- stavaitatprāṇeśājadhanavasanenāśru patitam /
GK16andhvc3u:8689: he subhaga / yat patitametadaśru anena prāṇeśājadhanavasanenāpi mṛjatastava rādhā durārādhā strīcetaḥ kaṭhoraṃ tadupacārairalaṃ,
GK16andhvc3u:8703: mṛjata iti vartamānārthakapratyayena mārjanasyāvirāmatvokyā vyaṅgyamāha--anena hi pratyutetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8708: kaṭhoraṃ strīcetastadalamupacārairvirama he kriyātkalyāmaṃ vo hariranunayaṣvevamuditaḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:8709: locanam yanmāṃ vismṛtya tāmeva kupitāṃ manyase /
GK16andhvc3u:8713: yadi tūcyate iyatāpyādareṇa kimiti kopaṃ na muñcasi,
GK16andhvc3u:8717: ātmani caitatsukumārahṛdayā yoṣita iti na kiṃñcidvajrasārādhikamāsāṃ hṛdayaṃ yadevaṃvidhavṛttāntasākṣātkāre 'pi sahasradhā na dalati /
GK16andhvc3u:8720: anunayeṣviti bahuvacanenavāraṃ vāramasya bahuvallabhasyeyameva sthitiriti saubhāgyātiśaya uktaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8723: yastu triṣvapi ślokeṣu pratīyamānasyaiva rasāṅgatvaṃ vyācaṣṭe sma /
GK16andhvc3u:8725: evaṃ hi vyaṅgyasya yā guṇībhūtatā prakṛtā saiva samūlaṃ truṭyet /
GK16andhvc3u:8726: rasādivyatiriktasya hi vyaṅgyasya rasāṅgabhāvayogitvameva bālapriyā patitamiti bhūtanirdeśena vyaṅgyamāha--gata ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8735: evaṃ bodhanīyaṃ prati vyaṅgyamuktvā rādhagataṃ vyaṅgyamāha--ātmanītyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8742: uktasya vyaṅgyajātasya vācyaṃ prati tasya rasaṃ prati cāṅgabhāvamāha--evamityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8747_0: vyākhyāturasyāyamāśayaḥ- yasya hi mukhyaṃ prādhānaṃ taṃ pratyevaṃ guṇībhāvo 'nyāyyaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:8747_1: rasasyaiva ca tatprādhānyamiti nedaṃ vyākhyānaṃ sādhīyaityupahāsoktyā darśayati--sa devamityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8748: yathā kaścinnirdhanatayā devaṃ vikrīya dhanaṃ sampādya tadyātrotsavaṃ kartumārabhate,
GK16andhvc3u:8749: tathā guṇībhūtavyaṅgyopapādanāya pravṛttastadvirodhinaṃ kañcitprakāramāśrita iti mahattaramasya kauśalamityupahāsaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8756: evaṃ sthite ca 'nyakkāro hyayameva' ityādiślokanirdiṣṭānāṃ padānāṃ vyaṅgyaviśiṣṭavācyapratipādane 'pyetadvākyārthībhūtarasāpekṣayā vyañjakatvamuktam /
GK16andhvc3u:8759: teṣu hi vyaṅgyaviśiṣṭatvaṃ vācyasya pratīyate na tu vyaṅgyarūpapariṇatatvam /
GK16andhvc3u:8762: na ca kevalaṃ guṇībhūtavyaṅgyānyeva padānyalakṣyakramavyaṅgyadhvanervyañjakāni yāvadarthāntarasaṃkramitavācyāni dhvaniprabhedarūpāṇyapi /
GK16andhvc3u:8764: yatra tu vākye rasāditātparye nāsti guṇībhūtavyaṅgyaiḥ padairudbhāsite 'pi tatra guṇībhūtavyaṅgyataiva samudāyadharmaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8766: ramante ca saha strībhiḥ kuśalāḥ khalu mānavāḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:8767: locanam prādhānyaṃ nānyatkiñcidityalaṃ pūrvavaṃśyaiḥ saha vivādena /
GK16andhvc3u:8771: eṣa ca ślokaḥ pūrvameva vyākhyāta iti na punarlikhyate /
GK16andhvc3u:8775: vyaṅgyaṃ tvasambhāvyatvaviparītakāritvādi bālapriyā ato vācyaṃ pratyeva guṇībhāvo vaktavya iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8786: rājasevādivyavahāropalakṣitasya viṣopabhogatulyasya sarvasyāpi laukikavyavahārasya viṣayavairasyāpādakatayā śāntarasavyañjakatvāditi śaṅkāmanūdya pariharati--yadyapītyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8791: tato mānavāḥ kuśalāḥ salviti vācyārthaprayukta ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8794: yena dhvanirguṇībhūtavyaṅgyayoralaṅkārāṇāṃ cāsaṅkīrṇe viṣayaḥ sujñāto bhavati /
GK16andhvc3u:8795: anyathā tu prasiddhālaṅkāraviṣaya eva vyāmohaḥ pravartate /
GK16andhvc3u:8797: taccāpiśabdābhyāmubhayato yojitābhyāṃ caśabdena sthānatrayayojitena khaluśabdena cobhayato yojitena mānavaśabdena spṛṣṭameveti guṇībhūtam /
GK16andhvc3u:8800: yatra vyaṅgyaṃ nāstyeva tatra teṣāṃ śuddhānāṃ prādhānyam /
GK16andhvc3u:8806: tata eva ca camatkāra ityata āha--vyaṅgyantvityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8815: rājānamapi sevante api viṣamapi upabhuñjate api iti karmaṇā kriyayā ca yojitābhyāmityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8817: sevākriyāyā kṣaṇe kṣaṇe sulabhāpāyatayā samāhitamatibhirapi duranuṣṭheyā /
GK16andhvc3u:8820: eko dyotako bahuṣvantya iti nyāyādramante ceti cakārasya samuccayārthakasya kriyātrayeṇa yojanetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8822: khaluśabdaḥ kuśalaśabdena mānavaśabdena ca yojanīya ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8830: prasiddhālaṅkāraviṣaya evetyevakāreṇa kimuta vyaṅgyaviṣaya ityartho darśita ityāha--vyaṅgyaprakārastvityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8843: lāvaṇyadraviṇavyayo na gaṇitaḥ kleśo mahān svīkṛtaḥ svacchandasya sukhaṃ janasya vasataḥ cintānalo dīpitaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8844: eṣāpi svayameva tulparamaṇābhāvādvarākī hatā ko 'rthaścetasi vedhasā vinihitastanvyāstanuṃ tanvatā //
GK16andhvc3u:8845: ityatra vyājastutiralaṅkāra iti vyākhyāyi kenacittanna cuturastram;
GK16andhvc3u:8852: cireṇa hi yo vyayaḥ sampadyate na tu vidyudiva jhaṭiti tatrāvaśyaṃ gaṇanayā bhavitavyam /
GK16andhvc3u:8858: yatsvayaṃ nirmīyate tadeva ca nihanyata iti mahadvaiśasamapiśabdena vakāreṇa coktam /
GK16andhvc3u:8860: na svātmano na lokasya na nirmitasyetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8862: rāgiṇo hi varākī hateti kṛpaṇatāliṅgitamamaṅgalopahataṃ cānuvitaṃ vacanam /
GK16andhvc3u:8869: pādatrayoktānaṃ trayāṇāmekena yogyo na kaścidartho nirūpyamāṇo dṛśyata ityāha--na svātmana ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8881: varākīti kṛpaṇatāliṅgitaṃ hatetyamaṅgalopahataṃ ca vacanaṃ rāgiṇo hyanucitamiti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8882: rāgī hi tannimagnacittavṛttitayā tāmeva bahumanyamānastadrūpasuṣamāsudhāmāsvādayan kathaṅkāraṃ tasyāḥ śocyatvamamaṅglatvaṃ ca paryālocayediti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8887: ātmanyapi tadrūpāsambhāvanāyāṃ rāgatāyāṃ ca paśuprāyatvaṃ syāt /
GK16andhvc3u:8888_1: vā sītādiviṣaye duṣyantaprāyasya vānirjñātajātiviśeṣe śakuntalādau kimiyaṃ svasaubhāgyābhimānagarbhā
GK16andhvc3u:8889: vītarāgasya vā anādakālābhyastarāgavāsanāvāsitatayā madhyasthatvenāpi tāṃ vastutastathā paśyato neyamuktiḥ na saṃbhāvyā /
GK16andhvc3u:8890: na hi vītarāgo viparyastān bhāvān paśyati /
GK16andhvc3u:8897: kāmamastu svātmavyatiriktajanāpekṣayā tulyaramaṇābhāvasya sambhāvanā svātmāpekṣayāpi tatsambhāvanā na yuktetyatastadvacanamatyantānucitamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8912: vītarāgasya vā iyamuktina na sambhāvyeti sambandhathaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:8937: atra vyaṅgyopaskṛtasya vācyārthasyaiva prādhānyamityato 'prastutapraśaṃsālaṅkāra iti bodhyam /
GK16andhvc3u:8939: na cāyaṃ ślokaḥ kvacitprabandha iti śrūyate,
GK16andhvc3u:8942_1: viśeṣajñamātmano na kañcidevāparaṃ paśyataḥ paridevitametaditi prakāśyate /
GK16andhvc3u:8943: tathā cāyaṃ dharmakīrteḥ śloka iti prasiddhiḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8946: locanam dhikte kārṣṇyamiti sā paraṃ prastutaparatayeti nātrāsambhava ityāśaṅkyāha--na ceti /
GK16andhvc3u:8947: nissāmānyeti nijamahimeti viśeṣajñamiti paridevitamityetaiścaturbhirvākyakhaṇḍaiḥ krameṇa pādacatuṣṭayasya tātparyaṃ vyākhyātam /
GK16andhvc3u:8949: nanu kimiyatetyāśaṅkya tadāśayena nirvivādatadīyaślokārpitenāsyāśayaṃ saṃvādayati--sambhāvyata iti /
GK16andhvc3u:8950: avagāhanamadhyavasitamapi na yatra āstāṃ tasya sampādanam /
GK16andhvc3u:8954: ahamiti mahīyānavalepaḥ parisphuṭaṃ gamyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8959: yato 'yaṃ dharmakīrteḥ śloka iti prasiddhiratastathāpūrvoktārthaka ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8960: viniścayavṛttyante sthito 'yaṃ śloka iti prasiddhiratastathāpūrvoktārthaka ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8967: prakṛtodāharaṇe hi vivādo vyājastutyaprastutapraśaṃsāviṣayo na vakṣyamāṇatadīyaśloka iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8971_0: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ--yo yasyāśayo 'nyatra suspaṣṭapratipattikassa eva sambhavan anyatrāparisphuṭapratītike
GK16andhvc3u:8977: payaḥpakṣe yadā dānāyāntaḥ praveśo yasya tat /
GK16andhvc3u:8978: analpā dhīśaktirbuddhisāmarthyaṃ yasya tenāpyanyena kenacit kartrā /
GK16andhvc3u:8983: mataṃ mama jagatyalabdhasadṛśapratigrāhakaṃ prayāsyati payonidheḥ paya iva svadehe jārām //
GK16andhvc3u:8986: alabdhaṃ prayatnaparīkṣitamapi na prāptaṃ sadṛśaṃ yasya tathābhūtaṃ pratigrāhamekaiko grāho jalacaraḥ prāṇī airāvatoccaiḥśravodhanvantariprāyo yatra tadalabdhasadṛśapratigrāhakam /
GK16andhvc3u:8991: parasya bālapriyā evaṃ bhūtaṃ mama mataṃ matapratipādako granthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8992: alabdhaḥ sadṛśaḥ svatulyaḥ pratigrāhako 'nyān pratibodhayitā svayaṃ bo /
GK16andhvc3u:8999: adṛṣṭaṃ paramaṃ yasmāttathāvidhamarthatattvaṃ kaustubhādiṃ yatra tat /
GK16andhvc3u:9024: tattacchalokena piratipāditāyāstathāvidhasya svasya svamatasya ca tathāvidhaśocyāvasthāyāḥ svapne 'pyasambhāvyāyāḥ sambhavāt svasya vismayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9031: tatra vivakṣitatvaṃ yathā-- parārthe yaḥ pīḍāmanubhavati bhaṅge 'pi madhuro yadīyaḥ sarveṣāmiha khalu vikāro 'pyabhimataḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9032: na samprāpto vṛrddhi yadi sa bhṛśamakṣetrapatitaḥ kimikṣordeṣo 'sau na punaraguṇāyā marubhuvaḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:9033: yathā vā mamaiva--- amī ye dṛśyaneti nanu subhagarūpāḥ saphalatā bhavatyeṣāṃ yasya kṣaṇamupagatānāṃ viṣayatām /
GK16andhvc3u:9034_2: vīrarase viśrāntiriti mantavyam anyathā paridevitamātreṇa kiṃ kṛtaṃ syāt /
GK16andhvc3u:9037: iha tu saṅgatirastyevetyāśaṅkya saṅgatāvapi bhavatyevaiṣeti darśayitumupakramate---aprastuteti /
GK16andhvc3u:9040: yasya cakṣuṣo viṣayatāṃ kṣaṇaṃ gatānāmeṣāṃ saphalatā bhavati tadidaṃ bālapriyā śrotṛjanasyotsāhajanane hetudvayam--atyādaretyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:9053: nanvaprekṣāpūrvakatvamātmano 'nena darśitaṃ svaviṣayaparidevitasya sarvatra tadāvedakatvāditi na kiñcitkaratvaviraha ityāśaṅkya pariharati--aprekṣetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:9054: nanvaprastutapraśaṃsāyāmityādigranthasya kā saṃgatirityataḥ prāsaṅgikī seti darśayannavatārayati--nanvityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:9064: nirāloke loke kathamidamaho cakṣuradhunā samaṃ jātaṃ sarvairna samamathavānyairavayavaiḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:9065: anayorhi dvayoḥ ślokayorikṣucakṣuṣī vivakṣitasvarūpe eva na ca prastute /
GK16andhvc3u:9067: avivakṣitatvaṃ yathā-- kastvaṃ bhoḥ kathayāmi daivahatakaṃ māṃ viddhi śākhoṭakaṃ vairāgyādiva vakṣi,
GK16andhvc3u:9075: aprāptaḥ para utkṛṣṭo bhāgo 'rthalābhātmakaḥ svarūpaprathanalakṣaṇo vā yena tasya /
GK16andhvc3u:9077: anena padenedamāha--akathanīyametat śrūyamāṇaṃ hi nirvedāya bhavati,
GK16andhvc3u:9079: kākvā devahatakamityādinā ca sūcitaṃ te vairāgyamiti bālapriyā aprastutārthavarṇanasthala ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9083: pīḍā nāmākṣau niṣpīḍanaṃ satpuruṣe tu kleśaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9092: ye ityasya pratinirdeśaḥ--'eṣām' iti 'yasyetyasyedam' iti ca /
GK16andhvc3u:9094: viveko 'pītyapiśabdena prakāśarūpārthasya saṅgrahaḥ sāmyābhāve vivakṣitaṃ hetuṃ darśayati--hastā hītyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:9098: bhāgaśabdena dhanādilābhaḥ kīrtiprasaralābho vā grāhyo dvayorapi bhajanīyatvena bhāgaśabdavācyatvādityāha--arthalābhaityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:9103: śrūyamāṇaṃ na tu śravaṇottaramevetyatiśayitanirvedahetutvaṃ śravaṇasya dyotayituṃ śatṛpratyena nirdeśaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9108: vāmenātra vaṭastamadhvagajanaḥ sarvātmanā sevata na cchāyāpi paropakārakariṇī mārgasthitasyāpi me //
GK16andhvc3u:9109_0: na hi vṛkṣaviśeṣeṇa sahoktipratyuktī sambhavata ityavivakṣitābhidheyenaivānena ślokena
GK16andhvc3u:9112: verīeṃ vaiṃ dento pāmara ho ohasijjihasi //
GK16andhvc3u:9125: smṛtiviṣayavastuno nirvedapradatvātsmaraṇasahabhāvī nirveda iti sanirvedatvaṃ smaraṇasya /
GK16andhvc3u:9137: he pāmara tathābhūtāyā badaryāḥ vṛti dadāttvaṃ janairapahasiṣyasa ityanvayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9140: sambhavītyasyānantaraṃ na cāsambhavīti ca kvacit atra hi vācyāratho nātyantaṃ sambhavī nā casambhavī /
GK16andhvc3u:9144: kāvye ubhe tato 'nyad yat tac citram abhidhīyate // DhvK_3.41 //
GK16andhvc3u:9146: tatra kiṃcic chabda-citraṃ vācya-citram ataḥ param // DhvK_3.42 //
GK16andhvc3u:9153: locanam iti pāṭhe samṛddhena ṛddhimātreṇa sātpuruṣo na tu guṇādineti vyākhyeyam /
GK16andhvc3u:9155: vācyabhāvaniyamo nāsti nāstīti na śakyaṃ vaktuṃ,
GK16andhvc3u:9157: tathā hi utpathajātāyā iti na tathākulodbhūtāyāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9159: phalakusumapatrrarahitāyā ityevambhūtāpi kācitputriṇī vā bhrātrādipakṣaparipūrvatayā sambandhivargapoṣitā vā parirakṣyate /
GK16andhvc3u:9162: evamaprastutapraśaṃsāṃ prasaṅgato nirūpya prakṛtameva yannirūpaṇīyaṃ tadupa saṃharati--tasmāditi /
GK16andhvc3u:9163: aprastutapraśaṃsāyāmapi lāvaṇyetyatra śloke yasmādyvāmoho loksya dṛṣṭastato hetorityarthaḥ // 40 //
GK16andhvc3u:9164: evaṃ vyaṅgyasvarūpaṃ nirūpya sarvathā yattacchūnyaṃ tatra kā vārteti nirūpayitumāha--pradhānetyādinā /
GK16andhvc3u:9168: vācyārtha ityādigranthaṃ tātparyato vivṛṇoti locane--vācyabhāvaniyamo nāstīti /
GK16andhvc3u:9171: vācyārtho na bhambhavatīti vaktuṃ ca na śakyamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9176: evaṃ bhūtāpi akulīnā lāvaṇyādiguṇarahitā ca bhavantyapi /
GK16andhvc3u:9179: iyaṃ tu putrādirahitā ca ato 'syā rakṣāṃ kurvaṃstvaṃ parihāsāspadaṃ bhaviṣyasītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9188: vibhāgapradarśanamātreṇa siddhe śabdacitraṃ vācyacitramiti samaśīrṣikayā vyaṅgyasyārthasya prādhānye dhvanisaṃjñitakāvyaprakāraḥ guṇabhāge tu guṇībhūtavyaṅgyatā /
GK16andhvc3u:9189: tato 'nyadrasabhāvāditātparyarahitaṃ vyaṅgyārthaviśeṣaprakāśanaśaktiśūnyaṃ ca kāvyaṃ kevalavācyavācakavaicitryamātrāśrayeṇopanibaddhamālekhyaprakhyaṃ yadābhāsate taccitram /
GK16andhvc3u:9193: vācyacitraṃ tataḥ śabdacitrādanyadvyaṅgyārthasaṃsparśarahitaṃ prādhānyena vākyarthatayā sthitaṃ rasāditātparyarahitamutprekṣādi /
GK16andhvc3u:9197: tatra yatra vastvalaṅgārāntaraṃ vā vyaṅgyaṃ nāsti sa nāma citrasya kalpayatāṃ viṣayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9198: yatra tu rasādīnāmavaliṣayatvaṃ sa kāvyaprakāro na sambhavatyeva /
GK16andhvc3u:9200: vastu ca sarvameva jagadgatamavaśyaṃ kasyacidrasasya bhāvasya vāṅgtvaṃ pratipadyate antato vibhāvatvena /
GK16andhvc3u:9202: na ca tadasti vastu kiñcidyanna cittavṛttiviśeṣamupajanayati tadanutpādane vā locanam prasiddhameva tattulyamevārthacitraṃ mantavyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9223: na tanmukhyaṃ kāvyaṃ kāvyānukāro hyasāviti vacanāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9226: kaviviṣayataiva tasya na syāt kaviviṣayaśca citratayā kaścinnirūpyate /
GK16andhvc3u:9228: kiṃ tu yadā rasabhāvādivivakṣāśūnyaḥ kaviḥ śabdālaṅkāramarthālaṅkāraṃ vopanibadhnāti tadā tadvivakṣāpekṣayā rasādiśūnyatārthasya parikalpyate /
GK16andhvc3u:9230: vācyasāmarthyavaśena ca kavivivakṣāvirahe 'pi tathāvidhe viṣaye rasādipratītirbhavantī paridurbalā locanam nanu mā bhūtkaviviṣaya ityāśaṅkyāha--kaviviṣayaśceti /
GK16andhvc3u:9231_0: kāvyarūpatayā yadyapi na nirdiṣṭastathāpi kavigocarīkṛta evāsau vaktavyaḥ anyasya
GK16andhvc3u:9231_2: sā cāvaśyaṃ vibhāvānubhāvyabhicāriparyavasāyanīti bhāvaḥ kiṃ tviti /
GK16andhvc3u:9235: naiva tatra rasapratītirasti yathā pākānabhijñasūdaviracate māṃsapākaviśeṣe /
GK16andhvc3u:9247: tathāpi kathaṃ rasādiśūnyatvābhāva ityata āha--sā cetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:9265: bhavatītyanenāpa prakāreṇa nīrasatvaṃ parikalpya citraviṣayo vyavasthāpyate /
GK16andhvc3u:9269: tadā nāstyeva tatkāvyaṃ dhvaneryatra na gocaraḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:9270: ' etacca citraṃ kavīnāṃ viśṛṅkhalagirāṃ rasāditātparyamanapekṣyaiva kāvyapravṛttidarśanādasmābhiḥ parikalpitam /
GK16andhvc3u:9271: idānīntanānāṃ tu nyāyye kāvyanaya vyavasthāpane kriyamāṇe nāstyeva dhvanivyatiriktaḥ kāvyaprakāraḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9272: yataḥ paripākavatāṃ kavīnāṃ rasāditātparyavirahe vyāpāra eva naśobhate /
GK16andhvc3u:9273: rasāditātparye ca nāstyeva tadvastu yadabhimatarasāṅgatāṃ nīyamānaṃ na praguṇībhavata /
GK16andhvc3u:9274: acetanā api hi bhāvā yathāyathamucitarasavibhāvatayā cetanavṛttāntayojanayā vā na santyeva te ye yānti na rasāṅgatām /
GK16andhvc3u:9276: ajñakṛtāyāṃ ca śikhariṇyāmaho khikhariṇīti na tajjñānāccamatkāraḥ api tu dadhiguḍamaricaṃ caitadasamañjasayojitamiti vaktāro bhavanti /
GK16andhvc3u:9282: heyatayā tadupadiśyata iti cet--ghaṭe kṛte kavirna bhavatatyetadapi vaktavyamityāśaṅkya kavibhiḥ khalu tatkṛtamato heyatayopadiśyata ityetannirūpayati--etaccetyādinā /
GK16andhvc3u:9285: bālapriyā iti vaktāro bhavantītyanena rasāsvādasya daurbalyaṃ darśitam /
GK16andhvc3u:9300: śṛṅgārī cetkaviḥ kāvye jātaṃ rasamayaṃ jagat /
GK16andhvc3u:9304: tasmānnāstyeva tadvastu yatsarvātmanā rasatātparyavataḥ kavestadicchayā tadabhimatarasāṅgatāṃ na dhatte /
GK16andhvc3u:9305: tathopanibadhyamānaṃ vā na cārutvātiśayaṃ locanam yatpadāni tyajantyeva parivṛttisahiṇṇutām /
GK16andhvc3u:9311: ata eva bharatamuniḥ--'kaverantargataṃ bhāvaṃ' 'kāvyārthān bhāvayati' ityādiṣu kaviśabdameva /
GK16andhvc3u:9325: iti ślokaḥ, kāvyārthānityādivākyaṃ ca nāṭyaśāstre saptamādhyāye vartete /
GK16andhvc3u:9330: koḥ kavatervā kavanīyaṃ kāvyaṃ tatra ca padārthavākyārthau raseṣvevaṃ paryavasyata ityasādhāraṇyātprādhānyacca kāvyasyārthā rasāḥ arthyante pradhānyenetyarthā,
GK16andhvc3u:9337: sthite caivaṃ sarva eva kāvyaprakāro na dhvanidharmatāmatipatati rasādyapekṣāyāṃ kaverguṇībhūtavyaṅgyalakṣaṇo 'pi prakārastadaṅgatāmavalambata ityuktaṃ prāk /
GK16andhvc3u:9338_0: yadā tu cāṭuṣu devatāstutiṣu vā rasādīnāmaṅgatayā vyavasthānaṃ hṛdayavatīṣu ca saprajñakagāthāsu
GK16andhvc3u:9338_1: kāsucidyvaṅgyaviśiṣṭavācye prādhānyaṃ tadapi guṇībhūtavyaṅgyasya dhvaniniṣpandabhūtatvemevetyuktaṃ prāk /
GK16andhvc3u:9339: tadevamidārnīntanakavikāvyanayopadeśe kriyamāṇe prāthamikānāmabhyāsārthināṃ yadi paraṃ citreṇa vyavahāraḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:9342: yāvadrasiko na bhavati tadā paridṛśyamāno 'pyayaṃ bhāvavargo yadyapi sukhaduḥkhamohamādhyasthyamātraṃ laukikaṃ vitarati,
GK16andhvc3u:9343: tathāpi kavivarṇanopārohaṃ vinā lokātikrāntarasāsvādabhūvaṃ nādhiśeta ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9354: madhye tiṣṭhatīti madhyasthaḥ tasya bhāvo mādhyasthyaṃ sukhaduḥkhamohānāṃ yanmādhyasthyaṃ tadekānubhavaṃ tanmātramityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9369: bhavantu iti hālikasyāśiṣaṃ vardhayantyā punaḥ punaḥ kurvatyā kayācit /
GK16andhvc3u:9373: kārpāsalatānāṃ paripoṣe tatsthale niśśaṅkaṃ hālikena saha ramaṇaṃ bhaviṣyatīti baddhathā nirvṛtirityanena taccauryasambhogābhilāṣo vadhvā vyajyate,
GK16andhvc3u:9377: tadayamatra saṃgrahaḥ--- yasmin raso vā bhāvo vā tātparyeṇa prakāśate /
GK16andhvc3u:9380: locanam atra godāvarīkacchalatāgahane bhareṇa jambūphaleṣu pacyamāneṣu /
GK16andhvc3u:9381: hālikavadhūḥ paridhatte jambūphalarasaraktaṃ nivasanamiti tvaritayauryasaṃbhogasaṃbhāvyamānajambūphalarasaraktatvaparabhāganihnavanaṃ guṇībhūtavyaṅgyamityalaṃ bahunā /
GK16andhvc3u:9383: ātmātminorabheda eva vastuto vyutpattaye tu vibhāgaḥ bālapriyā prātiveśyiko nirvṛtiṃ prāpita iti ca locane pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9386_0: atra pakṣe saṅketasthānārthinaṃ svānuraktaṃ prātiveśyikaṃ tatsambhogābhilāṣiṇī kācidyadṛcchayā
GK16andhvc3u:9386_1: dṛṣṭaṃ hālikaṃ pratyevamāśīrvādena saṅketasthānaṃ jñāpitavatīti tatsammogābhilāṣo vyaṅgyo bodhyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9394_0: tvaritaḥ patitajambūphale nikuñcadeśe sicayāstaraṇe tvarayā kṛto yaścauryasambhogastena
GK16andhvc3u:9394_1: sambhāvyamānaḥ samutpādyamāstaddhetukatayā tarkyamāṇo vā yo jambūphalarasaraktatvena
GK16andhvc3u:9394_2: parabhāgaḥ sicyasya tattadbhāge varṇāntaraprāptiḥ tasya nihnavanaṃ gopanecchetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9396: sarvāvayavāvacchedena jambūphalarasaraktasya sicayasya paridhānena tannihnavanaṃ gamyate,
GK16andhvc3u:9398: nanu dhvanikāvyayorātmaśarīrasthānīyayorbhedādvṛttau ' dhvanireva kāvyam' iti sāmānādhikaraṇyena nirdeśo 'nupapanna ityata āha--ātmātminorityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:9402: dhvaniḥ kāvyasyātmā sarvatra tatra viṣayī jñeyaḥ sahṛdayairjanaiḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:9405: saṅkara-saṃsṛṣṭibhyāṃ punar apy uddyotate bahudhā // DhvK_3.43 //
GK16andhvc3u:9409: tasya ca dhvaneḥ svaprabhedairguṇībhūtavyaṅgyena vācyālaṅkāraiśca saṅkarasaṃsṛṣṭivyavasthāyāṃ kriyamāṇāyāṃ bahuprabhedatā lakṣye dṛśyate /
GK16andhvc3u:9418: sa trividhasya dhvaneḥ kāvyamārgo viṣaya ita yāvat // 41//
GK16andhvc3u:9421: sahaguṇībhūtavyaṅgyena sahālaṅkārairye vartante sve dhvaneḥ prabhedāstaiḥ saṃkīrṇatayā saṃsṛṣṭyā vānantaprakāro dhvanirita tātparyam /
GK16andhvc3u:9424: tatrāpi pratyekaṃ saṃkareṇa saṃsṛṣṭyā ceta ṣaṭ /
GK16andhvc3u:9425: saṃkarasyāpi trayaḥ prakārāḥ anugrāhyanugrāhakabhāvena saṃdehāspadatvenaikapadānupraveśeneti dvādaśa bhedāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9426: pūrvaṃ ca ye pañcatriṃśadbhedā uktāste guṇībhūtavyaṅgyasyāpi bālapriyā śabdārthamayaṃ kāvyaṃ śarīramiti vibhāga ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9433: prakāśate sarvatra tatra vyaṅgyaprādhānyaikanibandhano dhvaniḥ viṣayī san sahṛdayairjanairjeya ityanvayaḥ // 41//
GK16andhvc3u:9436: udyātata ityatra dhvaniriti śeṣa iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9437: saguṇībhūtavyaṅgyaissālaṅkāraissvaprabhedaiḥ saha saṅkarasaṃsṛṣṭyoruktyā pratyekaṃ taistribhissaha te labhyete ityāśayena vibhāgān darśayati--svaprabhedairityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:9438: prakāśyata iti sammiśnyata iti ca pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9442: pūrvaṃ ca ye pañcatriṃśadbhedā uktā iti /
GK16andhvc3u:9443: dvitīyodyotāvasāna 'evaṃ dhvaneḥ prabhedān pratipādye'ti vṛttigranthavyākhyānāvasare ye pañcatriśadbhedāḥ tatra svaprabhedasaṅkīrṇatvaṃ kadācidanugrāhyānugrāhakabhāvena /
GK16andhvc3u:9448: khaṇapāhuṇiā deara esā jāāeṃ kiṃpi de bhaṇidā /
GK16andhvc3u:9452: tatra saṃkaratrayeṇa saṃsṛṣṭyā ca guṇane dve śate caturaśītyadhike /
GK16andhvc3u:9453: tāvatā pañcatriṃśato mukhyabhedānāṃ guṇane saptasahastrāṇi catvāri śatāni viśatyadhikāni bhavanti /
GK16andhvc3u:9455: tatrā vyutpattaye katipayabhedeṣūdāharaṇāni ditsuḥ svaprabhedānāṃ kārikāyāmanyapadārthatvena pradhānatayoktatvāttadāśrayāṇyeva catvāryudāharaṇānyāha--tatreti /
GK16andhvc3u:9460: eṣā te jāyayā kimapi bhaṇitā roditi /
GK16andhvc3u:9462: sā tāvaddevarānuraktā tajjāyayā viditavṛttāntayā kimapyuktetyeṣoktistadvṛttāntaṃ bālapriyā svayaṃ pratipāditā ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9473: dve śate caturaśītyadhike ityasyānantaraṃ 'tāvatā pañcatriśato mukhyabhedānāṃ guṇane saptasahasrāṇi catvāri viṃśatyadhikāni bhavantīti pāṭho bahuṣu grantheṣu dṛśyate,
GK16andhvc3u:9477: ato 'laṅkāratvāvacchi eka eva grāhya iti bhāva- /
GK16andhvc3u:9496: (kṣaṇaprādhuṇikā devara eṣā jāyayā kimapi te bhaṇitā /
GK16andhvc3u:9501: ekavyañjakānupraveśena tu vyaṅgyatvamalakṣyakramavyaṅgyasya svaprabhedāntarāpekṣayā locanam dṛṣṭavatyā anyasyāstaddevaracaurakāminyāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9502: tatra tava gṛhaṇyāyaṃ vṛttānto jñāta ityubhayataḥ kalahāyitumicchantyevamāha /
GK16andhvc3u:9504: yadi vā tvaṃ tāvadetasyāmevānurakta itīrṣyākopatātparyādanunayanamanyaparaṃ vivakṣitam /
GK16andhvc3u:9506: vayaṃ tvidānīṃ garhaṇīyāḥ saṃvṛttā ityetatparatayā ubhayathāpi ca svābhiprāyaprakāśanādekataraniścaye pramāṇābhāva ityuktam /
GK16andhvc3u:9511: vidito vṛttāntastasyā devarasya ca parasparānurāgādiryayā tayetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9515: jāyayā kimapi bhaṇiteti rodanahetupradarśanamātraṃ na tatkathanasya phalāntaramapyastītyāha--tatretyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:9528: sa cātra sambhogatvena rūpeṇa lakṣyo vivakṣita ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9529: tasyāṃ tavānurāgo mayā jñāta ityādirarthaścātra vyaṅgyo bodhyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9553: guṇībhūtavyaṅgya saṅkīrṇatvaṃ yathā--'nyakkāro hyayameva me yadarayaḥ' ityādau /
GK16andhvc3u:9554: yathā vā-- kartā dyūtacchalānāṃ jatumayaśaraṇoddīpanaḥ so 'bhimānī kṛṣṇākeśottarīyavyapanayanapaṭuḥ pāṇḍavā yasya dāsāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9555: rājā duḥśāsanādergururanujaśatasyāṅgarājasya mitraṃ kkāste duryodhano 'sau kathayata na ruṣā draṣṭumabhyāgatau svaḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:9557: yadi vā devarānuraktāyā eva taṃ devaramanyayā sahāvalokitasaṃbhogavṛtāntaṃ pratīyamuktiḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:9561_0: sarvatra kāvye rasāditātparyaṃ tāvadasti tatra rasadhvanerbhāvadhvaneścaikena vyañjakenābhivyañjanaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:9566: evaṃ svaprabhedaṃ prati caturbhedānudāhṛtya guṇībhūtavyaṅgyaṃ pratyudāharati--guṇībhūteti /
GK16andhvc3u:9581_1: saṃyogastadātmakasya lepasya vācyārthasya bādhāllipidhātuḥ samparkaṃ lakṣayaṃstadatiśayaṃ dyotayati /
GK16andhvc3u:9582: evaṃ payodāssuhṛdo yeṣāmityatra vācyārthasya bādhātsuhṛtpadamupakāritvena rūpeṇa lakṣayattadatiśayaṃ vyanaktītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9590: atra hyalakṣyakramavyaṅgyasya vākyārthībhūtasya vyaṅgyaviśiṣṭavācyābhidhāyibhiḥ padaiḥ sammiśratā /
GK16andhvc3u:9591: ata eva ca padārthāśrayatve guṇībhūtavyaṅgyasya vākyārthāśrayatve ca dhvaneḥ saṅkīrṇatāyāmapi na virodhaḥ svaprabhedāntaravat /
GK16andhvc3u:9596: tena tadupalakṣitā yo 'rtho vyaṅgyaguṇībhāvena vartate tena saṃmiśratā saṃkīrmatā /
GK16andhvc3u:9597: sā cānugrāhyānugrāhakabhāvena saṃdehayogenaikavyañjakānupraveśena ceti yathāsaṃbhavamudāharaṇadvaye yojyā /
GK16andhvc3u:9598: tathā hi-me yadaraya ityādibhi- sarvaireva padārthauḥ kartetyādibhiśca vibhāvādirūpatayā raudra evānugṛhyate /
GK16andhvc3u:9599: kartetyādau ca pratipadaṃ pratyavāntaravākyaṃ pratisamāsaṃ ca vyaṅgyamutprekṣituṃ śakyameveti na likhitam /
GK16andhvc3u:9605: ekavyañjakānupraveśastu taireva padaiḥ guṇībhūtavya vyaṅgyasya pradhānībhūtasya carasasya vibhāvādidvāratayābhivyañjanāt /
GK16andhvc3u:9608: nyakkāra ityādau rāvaṇagatasya kartetyādau bhīmasenagatasya ca krodhasya pratīteriti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9627: kartetyādau tu te kiṃ na santītyata āha--kartetyādāviti /
GK16andhvc3u:9630: raudra evānugṛhyata ityanenānugrāhyānugrāhakabhāvena saṅkaraṃ pradarśya sandehayogena taṃ darśayati--tatretyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:9636: tathā ca guṇībhūtavyaṅgyasya dhvaneśca sandehasaṅkara iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9640: ata evetyetadvyākhyāyā ta evetyādi na yathāhi dhvaniprabhedāntarāṇi parasparaṃ saṅkīryante padārthavākyārthāśrayatvena ca na viruddhāni /
GK16andhvc3u:9641: kiṃ caikavyaṅgyāśrayatve tu pradhānaguṇabhāvo virudhyate na tu vyaṅgyabhedāpekṣayā tato 'pyasya na virodhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9642: ayaṃ ca saṅkarasaṃsṛṣṭivyavahāro bahūnāmekatra vācyavācakabhāva iva vyaṅgyavyañjakabhāve 'pi nirvirodha eva mantavyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9643: yatra tu padāni kānicidavivakṣitavācyānuramanarūpavyaṅgyavācyāni vā tatra dhvaniguṇībhūtavyaṅgyayoḥ saṃsṛṣṭatvam /
GK16andhvc3u:9645: atra hi 'vilāsasuhṛdā' 'rādhārahaḥsākṣiṇām' ityete pade dhvaniprabhedarūpe 'te' 'jāne' ityete ca pade guṇībhūtavyaṅgyarūpe /
GK16andhvc3u:9648: nanu vyaṅgyaṃ guṇībhūtaṃ pradhānaṃ ceti viruddhameva taddṛśyamānamapyuktatvānna śraddheyamityāśaṅkya vyañjakabhedāttāvanna virodha iti darśayati--ata eveti /
GK16andhvc3u:9654: nanu vyañjakabhedātprathamabhedayoḥ parihāro 'stu ekavyañjakānupraveśe tu kiṃ vaktavyamityāśaṅkya pāramārthikaṃ parihāramāha--kiñcetiḥ tato 'pīti /
GK16andhvc3u:9656: nanu vācyālaṅkāraviṣaye śruto 'yaṃ saṃkarādivyavahāro na tu vyaṅgyaviṣaya ityāśaṅkyāha--ayaṃ ceti /
GK16andhvc3u:9658: mananena pratītyā tathā niśceyaḥ ubhayatrāpi pratītereva śaraṇatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9667: anugrāhyānugrāhakabhāvena sandehayogena ca yau saṅkarau tayorityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9678: mukhyārthayoḥ vācyālaṅkārasaṅkīrṇatvamalakṣyakramavyaṅgyāpekṣayā rasavati sālaṅkāre kāvye sarvatra suvyavasthitam /
GK16andhvc3u:9681: suhṛcchabdena sākṣiśabdena cāvivakṣitavācyo dhvaniḥ 'te' itipadenāsādhāraṇaguṇagaṇo 'bhivyakto 'pi guṇatvamavalambate,
GK16andhvc3u:9690: 'vivakṣā tatparatvena' iti dvitīyoddyotamūlodāharaṇebhyaḥ saṃkaratrayaṃ saṃsṛṣṭiśca labhyata eva /
GK16andhvc3u:9691: 'calāpāṅgāṃ dṛṣṭim' ityatra hi rūpakavyatirekasya prāgvyākhyātasya śṛṅgārānugrāhakatvaṃ svabhāvokteḥ śṛṅgārasya caikānupraveśaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9692: 'uppaha jāyā' iti gāthāyāṃ pāmarasvabhāvoktirvā dhvanirveti prakaraṇādyabhāve ekataragrāhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ nāsti /
GK16andhvc3u:9694: tathāpi 'nāti nirvahaṇaiṣitā' iti yadabhiprāyeṇoktaṃ tatra saṅkārāsambhavātsaṃsṛṣṭirevālaṅkārema rasadhvaneḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9698: bālapriyā suhṛtvasākṣitvayoracetaneṣu latāveśmasu bādhātsuhṛtpadamupakāritvena sākṣipadamāsannatvena rūpeṇa ca lakṣayati /
GK16andhvc3u:9723: yā vyāpāravatī rasān rasayituṃ kācatkavīnāṃ navā dṛṣṭiryā pariniṣṭhitārthaviṣayonmeṣā ca vaipaścitī /
GK16andhvc3u:9732: ata eva te kavayaḥ varṇanāyogāt teṣām /
GK16andhvc3u:9737: tatra dṛṣṭiścākṣuṣaṃ jñānaṃ ṣāḍavādi rasayatīti virodhālaṅkāro 'ta eva navā /
GK16andhvc3u:9762_1: vyāpāravatīti viruddhārthasya pratītyā virodhābhāsālaṅkāra ityāha--tatra dṛṣṭirityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:9776: aindriyakaṃ vijñānaṃ laukikatattadviṣayakacākṣuṣajñānaṃ tasyābhyāsa āvṛttiḥ tenollasite prakāśite ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9778: te dve apyavalambya viśvamaniśa nirvarṇayanto vayaṃ śrāntā naiva ca labdhamabdhiśayana tvadbhaktitulyaṃ sukham //
GK16andhvc3u:9779: locanam yā caivaṃvidhā dṛṣṭiḥ pariniṣṭito 'calaḥ arthaviṣaye niścetavye viṣaye unmeṣo yasyāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9780: tathā pariniṣṭhite lokaprasiddhe 'rthe na tu kavivadapūrvasminnarthe unmeṣo yasyāḥ sā /
GK16andhvc3u:9783: kavīnāmiti vaipaścitīti vacanena nāhaṃ kavirna paṇḍita ityātmano 'nauddhatyaṃ dhvanyate /
GK16andhvc3u:9791: tathā niścitārthaṃ varṇayantaḥ idamitthamiti parāmarśanumānādinānirbhajya nirvarṇanaṃ kimatra sāraṃ syāditi tilaśastilaśo vicayanam /
GK16andhvc3u:9792: yacca nirvarṇyate tatkhalu madhye vyāpāryamāṇayā madhye cārthaviśeṣu niścitonmeṣayā niścalayā dṛṣṭyā samyaṅnirvarṇitaṃ bhavati /
GK16andhvc3u:9796: na kevalaṃ sāraṃ na labdhaṃ yāvatpratyuta khedaḥ prāpta iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9799: yoganidrayā tvamata eva sārasvarūpavedī svarūpāvasthita ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9802: tvameva paramātmasvarūpoviśvasārastasya bhaktiḥ śraddhādipūrvaka upāsanākramajastadāveśastena bālapriyā arthaviṣaya ityasyārthamāha--niścetavya ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:9819: mithyādṛṣṭiḥ kavidṛṣṭiḥ tatvadṛṣṭiḥ vipaściddṛṣṭiḥ tayorāṇe vyasaninastātparyavanta ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9833: yatra hi kānicitpadāni locanam tulyamapi na labdhamāstāṃ tāvattajjātīyam /
GK16andhvc3u:9834: evaṃ prathamameva parameśvarabhaktibhājaḥ kutūhalamātrāvalambitakaviprāmāṇikobhayavṛtteḥ punarapi parameśvarabhaktiviśrāntireva yukteti manvānasyeyamuktiḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9836: yadapi vā lokottaraṃ rasacarvaṇātmakaṃ tata ubhayato 'pi parameśvaraviśrāntyānandaḥ prakṛṣyate tadānandavipruṇmātrāvabhāso hi rasāsvāda ityuktaṃ prāgasmābhiḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9837: laukikaṃ tu sukhaṃ tato 'pi nikṛṣṭaprāyaṃ bahutaraduḥkhānuṣaṅgāditi tātparyam /
GK16andhvc3u:9840: andhapadanyāsena dṛṣṭiśabdo 'tyantatiraskṛtavācyo vāstu ityekataraniścaye nāsti pramāṇam,
GK16andhvc3u:9845_0: sakalavākye hi yadyalaṅkāro 'pi vyaṅgyārtho 'pi vyaṅgyārtho 'pi pradhānaṃ tadānugrāhyanugrāhakatvasaṅkarastadabhāve
GK16andhvc3u:9845_1: tvasaṅgatirityalaṅkāreṇa bālapriyā tasya paramānandarūpatvaṃ ca bhaktirasāyanādigrantheṣu pradarśitam /
GK16andhvc3u:9849: vṛttau saṅkīrṇatvamityanenānugrāhyānugrāhakabhāvena saṅkaraḥ ekapadānupraveśaśaṅkaraśca vivakṣita iti darśayati--tatretyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:9855: te avalambya nirvarṇayanta ityatra te iti tatpadena dṛṣṭipadavācyārthasya darśanasya parāmarśe darśanamavalambya paśyanta iti viruddhārthasya pratītyā virodhālaṅkāro vetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9858: niḥśvāsāndha ityādāvandhādipadenevātyantatiraskṛtavācyena dṛṣṭipadena lakṣyasya pratibhārūpārthasya parāmarśe 'tyantatiraskṛtavācyo dhvanirvetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9872: yathā-- dīrdhīkurvan paṭu madakalaṃ kūjitaṃ sārasānāṃ pratyūṣeṣu sphuṭitakamalāmodamaittrīkaṣāyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9873: locanam vā dhvaninā vā paryāyeṇa dvābhyāmapi vā yugapatpadaviśrāntābhyāṃ bhāvyamiti trayo bhedāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9875: yatrānugrāhyānugrāhakabhāvaṃ pratyāśaṅkāpi nāvatarati taṃ tṛtīyameva prakāramudāhartumupakramate--yatra hīti /
GK16andhvc3u:9880: atratyo hiśabdo maitrīpadamityasyānantaraṃ yojya iti grantha saṅgatiḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9886: tathāsau sukumāro vāyuryena tajjaḥ śabdaḥ sārasakūjitamapi nābhibhavati pratyuta tatsabrahmacārī tadeva dīpayati /
GK16andhvc3u:9887: na ca dīpanaṃ tadīyamanupayogi yatastanmadena kalaṃ madhuramākarṇanīyam /
GK16andhvc3u:9900: vācyālaṅkārasaṃsṛṣṭatatvaṃ padāpekṣayaiveti padānāmāvṛttiḥ tatra padāpekṣayetyasya tathāvidhapadāpekṣayetyarthaśceti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9902: dīrghīkuvannityanenoktaṃ siprāvātahetukaṃ kūjitasya dīrghatvaṃ daiśikaṃ kālikaṃ svasajātīyasaṃvalanakṛtaṃ ceti trividhamiti vivṛṇoti--saprāvātenetyādi dīrghatvamityantena /
GK16andhvc3u:9911: sphuṭitānītyasya truṭitānītyarthaṃ manasivṛtya tatra hetuṃ gamyaṃ darśayati--antarityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:9913: yatra strīṇāṃ harati surataglānimaṅgānukūlaḥ siprāvātaḥ priyatama iva prārthanācāṭukāraḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:9914_0: locanam tathā sphuṭitāni vikasitāni nayanahārīṇi yāni kamalāni teṣāṃ ya āmodastena
GK16andhvc3u:9916: sarvasya tathāvidhasya trailokyasārabhūtasya ya evaṃ karoti suratakṛtāṃ glāniṃ tāntiṃ harati,
GK16andhvc3u:9917: atha ca tadviṣayāṃ glāniṃ punaḥ sambhogābhilāṣoddīpanena harati /
GK16andhvc3u:9918: na ca prasahyaprabhutatayāpi tvaṅgānukūlo hyadyasparśaḥ hṛdayāntarbhūtaśca /
GK16andhvc3u:9921: prārthanārthaṃ cāṭūni karotīti tena tathā kāryata iti parasparānurāgaprāṇaśṛṅgārasarvasvabhūto 'sau pavanaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9922: yuktaṃ caitattasya yataḥ siprāparicito 'sau vāta iti nāgariko na tvavidagdho bālapriyā bhāvārthamāha--nayaneti /
GK16andhvc3u:9925: tena parasparānukūlyasya parasparopakāritvasya lābha ityartha-. atrāvicchinnassaṃśleṣo lakṣyārthaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:9941: priyatame iti ca padacchedamabhipretya priyatame prārthanā cāṭukāra iti vātaviśeṣaṇatayāpi yojayati--priyatama ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:9945: cāṭukāra iti ṇyantātkartari pratyaya ityāha--cāṭūni atra hi maitrīpadamavivakṣitavācyo dhvaniḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9948: priyatamo 'pi ratānte 'ṅgānukūlaḥ saṃvāhanādinā prārthanārthaṃ cāṭukāra evameva surataglāniṃ harati /
GK16andhvc3u:9950: cāṭukaraṇāvasare ca sphuṭitaṃ vikasitaṃ yatkamalakāntidhārivadanaṃ tasya yāmodamaitrī sahajasaurabhaparicayastena kaṣāya uparakto bhavati /
GK16andhvc3u:9952: evaṃ śabdarūpagandhasparśā yatra hṛdyā yatra ca pavano 'pa tathā nāgarikaḥ sa tavāvaśyamabhigantavyo deśa iti meghaḍhūte meghaṃ prati kāmina iyamuktiḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9959: ityetadantaṃ vyākhyāyodāharaṇāni ca nirūpya 'punarapi' iti yatkārikābhāge padadvayaṃ tasyārthaṃ prakāśayatyudāharaṇadvāreṇaiva---saṃsṛṣṭetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:9960: punaḥśabdasyāyamarthaḥ---na kevalaṃ dhvaneḥ svaprabhedādibhiḥ saṃsṛṣṭisaṅkarau vivakṣitau yāvatteṣāmanyonyamapi svaprabhedānāṃ bālapriyā kārayatīti /
GK16andhvc3u:9995: dantakṣatāni karajaiśca vipāṭitāni prodbhinnasāndrapulake bhavataḥ śarīre /
GK16andhvc3u:9997: atra hi samāsoktisaṃsṛṣṭena virodhālaṅkāreṇa saṃkīrṇasyālakṣyakamavyaṅgyasya dhvaneḥ prakāśanam /
GK16andhvc3u:9999_0: locanam svaprabhedairguṇībhūtavyaṅgyena vā saṅkīrṇānāṃ saṃsṛṣṭānāṃ ca dhvanīnāṃ saṅkīrṇatvaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:9999_1: saṃsṛṣṭatvaṃ ca durlakṣamiti vispaṣṭodāharaṇaṃ na bhavatītyabhiprāyeṇālaṅkārasyālaṅkāreṇa
GK16andhvc3u:9999_2: saṃsṛṣṭasya saṃkīrṇasya vā dhvanau saṃkarasaṃsargau pradarśanīyau /
GK16andhvc3u:10001: bodhisattvasya svakiśorabhakṣaṇapravṛttāṃ siṃho prati nijaśarīraṃ vitīrṇavataḥ kenaciccāṭukaṃ kriyate /
GK16andhvc3u:10006: jātaspṛhairiti ca vayamapi kadācidevaṃ kāruṇikapadavīmadhirokṣyāmastadā satyato munayo bhaviṣyāma iti manorājyayuktaiḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:10034: dharmasya dayāprayuktatvādatra dayāvīraśabdena dharmavīra evokta iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:10037: sa rasaḥ dharmavīraśśānto vā saṃsṛṣṭālaṅkārasaṃsṛṣṭatvaṃ ca dhvaneryathā---
GK16andhvc3u:10041_1: jātapulakastathā tvaṃ parārthasampādanāya svaśarīradāna ita karuṇātiśayo 'nubhāvavibhāvasampadoddīpitaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:10044: yadi vā pathikānāṃ śyāmāyitaṃ duḥkhavaśena śyāmikā yebhyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:10046: abhinayaprayogarasikeṣu pathikasāmājakeṣu satsu mayūravṛndānāṃ prasāritagītānāṃ prakṛṣṭasāraṇānusārigītānāṃ tathā grīvārecakāya prasāritagrīvāṇāṃ nṛttaṃ śobhate /
GK16andhvc3u:10055: munibhirapi jātaspṛhairavalokitānītyanena dayāvīrasya paripoṣapratītyā virodhasyānugrāhakatvaṃ spaṣṭamiti manasi kṛtya samāsoktestadupapādayati--samāsoktimahimnetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:10083: evaṃ dhvaneḥ prabhedāḥ prabheda-bhedāś ca kena śakyante /
GK16andhvc3u:10084: saṅkhyātuṃ diṅ-mātraṃ teṣām idam uktam asmābhiḥ // DhvK_3.44 //
GK16andhvc3u:10086: evaṃ dhvaneḥ prabhedāḥ prabhedabhedāśca kena śakyante /
GK16andhvc3u:10088: anantā hi dhvaneḥ prakārāḥ sahṛdayānāṃ vyutpattaye teṣāṃ diṅmātraṃ kathitam /
GK16andhvc3u:10090: ity ukta-lakṣaṇo yo dhvanir vivecyaḥ prayatnataḥ sadbhiḥ
GK16andhvc3u:10091: sat-kāvyaṃ kartuṃ vā jñātuṃ vā samyag abhiyuktaiḥ // DhvK_3.45 //
GK16andhvc3u:10094: satkāvyaṃ kartuṃ vā jñātu vā samyagabhiyuktaiḥ // 45 //
GK16andhvc3u:10095: uktasvarūpadhvaninirūpaṇanipuṇā hi satkavayaḥ sahṛdayāśca niyatameva locanam sandehāspadatvena saṅkīrṇābhyāmabhinayaprayoge,
GK16andhvc3u:10096: abhinavaprayoge ca rasikeṣviti prasāritagītānāmiti yaḥ śabdaśaktyudbhavasta saṃsargamātramanugrāhyatvābhāvāt /
GK16andhvc3u:10097: 'pahiasāmāiesu' ityatra tu pade saṅkīrṇābhyāṃ tābhyāmupamārūpakābhyāṃ śabdaśaktimūlasya dhvaneḥ saṅkīrṇatvamekavyañjakānupraveśāditi saṅkīrṇālaṅkārasaṃsṛṣṭaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:10101: atha 'sahṛdayamanaḥprītaye' iti yatsūcitaṃ tadidānīṃ na śabdamātramapi tu nirvyūḍhamityāśayenāha--ityukteta /
GK16andhvc3u:10102_0: yaḥ prayatnato vivecyaḥ asmābhiścoktalakṣaṇo dhvaniretadeva kāvyatattvaṃ yathoditena
GK16andhvc3u:10104: 'ahiṇaa' ityasya abhinaya abhinava ityubhayathāpi cchāyeti darśayan dhvaniṃ darśayati--abhinayetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:10115: yathoditamityasya vyākartumityanena sambandha iti darśayan vivṛṇoti--yathoditenetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:10125: etaddhvanipravartanena nirṇītaṃ kāvyatattvamasphuṭasphuritaṃ sadaśaknuvadbhiḥ pratipādayituṃ vaidarbhī gauḍī pāñcālī ceti rītayaḥ pravartitāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:10126: rītilakṣaṇavidhāyināṃ hi kāvyatattvametadasphuṭatayā manāksphuritamāsāditi lakṣyate tadatra sphuṭatayā sampradarśitenānyena rītilakṣaṇenana kiñcit /
GK16andhvc3u:10133_0: asmin vyaṅgyavyañjakabhāvavivecanamaye kāvyalakṣaṇe jñāte sati yāḥ kāścitprasiddhā
GK16andhvc3u:10136: yatra śabdānāmarthānāṃ ca keṣāñcitpratipattṛviśeṣasaṃvedyaṃ locanam pravartitā ityuttarakārikayā sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:10143: yadāha--viśeṣo guṇātmā guṇāśca rasaparyavasāyina eveti hyuktaṃ prāgguṇanirūpaṇe 'śṛṅgāra eva madhuraḥ' ityatreti // 45//
GK16andhvc3u:10148: bālapriyā ityuktetyādikamekaṃ vākyamasphuṭetyādivākyāntaraṃ tatraitadityanena dhvaneḥ parāmarśaśceti bodhyam /
GK16andhvc3u:10155: anubhavasiddhatvamiti vṛttau vakṣyamāṇaṃ phalitamarthaṃ manasikṛtya vivṛṇoti---anubhavetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:10156: jātyatvamiva ratnaviśeṣāṇāṃ cārutvamanākhyeyamavabhāsate kāvye tatra dhvanivyavahāra iti yallakṣaṇaṃ dhvanerucyate kenācittadayuktamiti nābhidheyatāmarhati /
GK16andhvc3u:10159: arthānāṃ ca sphuṭatvenāvabhāsanaṃ vyaṅgyaparatvaṃ vyaṅgyāṃśaviśiṣṭatvaṃ ceti viśeṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:10160: tau ca viśeṣau vyākhyātuṃ śakyete vyākhyātau ca bahuprakāram /
GK16andhvc3u:10168: tathā--'vṛttayaḥ kāvyamātṛkāḥ' iti yaduktaṃ muninā tatra rasocita eva ceṣṭāviśeṣo vṛttiḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:10170: iyatā 'tasyābhāvaṃ jagadurapare' ityādābhāvavikalpeṣu 'vṛttayo rītayaśca gatāḥ śravaṇagocaraṃ,
GK16andhvc3u:10172: tatra kathañcidabhyupagamaḥ kṛtaḥ kathañcicca dūṣaṇaṃ dattamasphuṭasphuritamiti vacanena /
GK16andhvc3u:10173: idānīṃ vācāṃ sthitamaviṣaye' iti yadūce tattu prathamoddyote dūṣitamapi dūṣayat sarvaprapañcakathane hi asambhāvyamevānākhyeyatvamityabhiprāyeṇa /
GK16andhvc3u:10180: kiñca rītipadavīmavatarantītyatra kāvyalakṣaṇajñānasya hetutvamapi durghaṭamityato 'nyathaivātra pāṭha ityāha--pratītipadavīmiti /
GK16andhvc3u:10183: ratnaviśeṣāṇāṃ jātyatvamiva pratipattṛviśeṣasaṃvedyaṃ yatra keṣāñcicchabdānāmarthānāṃ ca cārutvamanākhyeyamevāvabhāsata ityanvayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:10186: cārutvaṃ nāma kaścidviśeṣa iti vaktavyamityabhipretya nābhidheyatāmarhatītyuktamupapādayati--'yata' ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:10197: prakāśamānatvaṃ tu yadanākhyeyatvamucyate kvacit tadapi kāvyaviśeṣāṇāṃ ratnāviśeṣāṇāmiva na sambhavati /
GK16andhvc3u:10202: sahṛdayā eva hi kāvyānāṃ rasajñā iti kasyātra vipratipattiḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:10203: yattvanirdeśyatvaṃ sarvalakṣaṇaviṣayaṃ bauddhānāṃ prasiddhaṃ tattanmataparīkṣāyāṃ granthāntare nirūpayiṣyāmaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:10204: iha tu granthāntaraśravaṇalavaprakāśanaṃ sahṛdayavaimanasyapradāyīti na prakriyate /
GK16andhvc3u:10205: bauddhamatena vā yathā pratyakṣādilakṣaṇaṃ tathāsmākaṃ dhvanilakṣaṇaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GK16andhvc3u:10208: sāmānyasparśī yo vikalpastato yaḥ śabdaḥ dṛṣṭānte 'pi anākhyeyatvaṃ nāstīti darśayati--ratnaviśeṣāṇāṃ ceti /
GK16andhvc3u:10213: evaṃ hi sarvabhāvavṛttāntatulya eva dhvaniriti dhvanisvarūpamanākhyeyamityativyāpakaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:10214: granthāntara iti viniścayaṭīkāyāṃ dharmottaryāṃ yā vivṛtiramunā granthakṛtā kṛtā tatraiva tadvyākhyātam /
GK16andhvc3u:10224: ratnaviśeṣāṇāṃ jātyatvādisāmānyasya sambhāvanayaiva mūlyaparikalpanāyā darśanāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:10227: tadgranthāntare nirūpayiṣyāma ityuktyā sūcitamanirdeśyatvarūpalakṣaṇasya doṣaṃ darśayati--evaṃ hītyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:10236: kvacit granthe bhāva iti ca pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:10237: tatpakṣe anākhyeyāṃśabhāvitvamiti śloke tasyoktameva dhvanilakṣaṇaṃ sādhīyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:10244: anākhyeyāṃśasyābhāso vidyate yasmin kāvye tasya bhāvastanna lakṣaṇaṃ dhvaneriti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:10247: anyastu 'nirvācyārthatayā' ityatra niso nañarthatvaṃ parikalpyānākhyeyāṃśabhāsitve 'yaṃ heturiti vyācaṣṭe,
GK16andhvc3u:10271: āsūtritānāṃ bhedānāṃ samyaksūtrairnirdiṣṭānāṃ dhvanyādibhedarūpāṇāṃ kāvyavāṇīnāṃ yā sphuṭatāpattiḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:10276: śubhamastu sarvaṃ śivam iti śrīrāmaśārakaracitāyāṃ locanaṭippaṇyāṃ tṛtīya uddyotaḥ //
